Sprinkle with cheese and seasoning.", "Bake for 20 to 25 minutes. Cut into wedges or squares and serve warm."]

title: A Capella Chicken Enchilada("Right On Key Even Without Accompaniment")
ingredients: ["1 medium onion, chopped", "2 to 3 Tbsp. butter", "1 (10 1/2 oz.) can cream of chicken soup", "1 (10 1/2 oz.) can cream of mushroom soup", "1 c. chicken broth", "1 (4 oz.) can green chilies, chopped", "1 whole chicken (or 8 breasts), boiled and boned", "1 1/2 pkg. corn tortillas", "1 lb. Longhorn cheese, grated (I use Colby)"]
instructions: ["Brown onion in skillet with butter.", "Add the soups, broth and chilies.", "Add the chicken and mix well.", "In a large baking dish (13 x 9-inch) layer some of the corn tortillas, part of chicken mixture and layer of cheese.", "Repeat the layers until the dish is filled, ending with cheese.", "Let the dish stand for several hours before baking.", "Bake in a 350\u00b0 oven for 1 hour."]

title: Low Cholesterol Mayonnaise
ingredients: ["2 medium egg whites", "1/2 tsp. sugar", "1/2 tsp. mustard", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/8 tsp. garlic powder", "1/8 tsp. white pepper", "1 c. vegetable oil", "2 Tbsp. white vinegar"]
instructions: ["In beater bowl, beat the whites with the sugar, salt, mustard, garlic powder and pepper until quite foamy.", "Slowly begin to add 1/2 cup oil while beating on high.", "You must add oil slowly or the mixture will not emulsify.", "Now add 1 tablespoon of vinegar. Continue beating and adding oil on high until all of the oil is used.", "Then beat in the last tablespoon vinegar.", "Pour into covered jar and keep refrigerated.", "This thickens more on chilling and is excellent for all salads."]

title: Indian Bread(Ideal When Camping Out.)
ingredients: ["3 c. flour", "2 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. salt", "water"]
instructions: ["Mix dry ingredients together.", "Add water to make a workable, sticky dough.", "Pull off just enough to make about 1/2 handful. Stretch and pull, then drop into hot grease and fry until golden brown (about 3 minutes).", "Repeat until dough is used up.", "Drain well."]

title: Chicken Breasts Baked In Mushroom Soup
ingredients: ["salt (to taste)", "flour (for dredging chicken)", "2 (4 halves) chicken breasts, skinless", "1/4 inch oil (for browning chicken)", "10 oz. (1 can) soup, cream of mushroom", "1 soup can of water"]
instructions: ["Preheat oven to 350\u00b0."]

title: Easy Cheesy Tuna Rotini
ingredients: ["1/2 pkg. rotini", "2 Tbsp. butter", "1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen vegetables", "1 can mushroom soup", "3/4 c. milk", "1 1/2 c. cheese", "1/8 tsp. pepper", "2 cans tuna, drained"]
instructions: ["Prepare rotini according to package. In skillet, melt butter. Add frozen vegetables.", "Cook until vegetables are tender.", "In a bowl, blend soup and milk. Add mixture to the skillet along with cheese and pepper.", "Cook, stirring constantly, until cheese melts. Stir in rotini and tuna.", "Heat.", "Serves 4."]

title: Manhattan Clam Chowder
ingredients: ["1 c. onions, chopped", "1 c. celery, chopped", "1/2 c. green pepper, chopped", "olive oil spray", "2 (6 1/2 oz.) cans clams", "1 c. water", "2 c. potatoes, peeled and diced", "2 Tbsp. fresh sage, minced", "1 Tbsp. fresh thyme, minced", "3 c. (24 oz.) canned, crushed low sodium tomatoes with juice", "dash of Tabasco sauce"]
instructions: ["Spray a large saucepan with olive oil spray.", "Add onions, celery and green pepper and saute until tender.", "Drain clams, reserving juice.", "Add juice, water, potatoes, sage and thyme to vegetable mixture.", "Cook until potatoes are tender, about 20 minutes.", "Add clams, tomatoes and Tabasco.", "Heat until warmed through.", "Makes 4 servings."]

title: Cottage Cheese Jello Salad
ingredients: ["1 (8 oz.) cottage cheese", "1 (3 oz.) pkg. orange jello", "1 can crushed pineapple, drained", "1 can mandarin oranges", "6 oz. Cool Whip"]
instructions: ["Mix together.", "Refrigerate at least 2 hours."]

title: Angel Biscuits(Self-Rising Flour)
ingredients: ["3 c. self-rising flour", "1 c. buttermilk", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1 yeast cake, dissolved in 1/4 c. warm water", "1 c. Crisco", "1 Tbsp. sugar"]
instructions: ["Sift dry ingredients.", "Cut in Crisco.", "Add milk and yeast to make a stiff dough.", "Make into biscuits and bake.", "Store remainder of dough in refrigerator until ready to use."]

title: Pickled Mushrooms
ingredients: ["3 lb. small fresh button mushrooms", "2 large cloves garlic, chopped", "2 onions, chopped very fine", "25 crushed peppercorns", "2 tsp. dried thyme", "3 lemons, juice and rind", "6 c. white wine", "2 c. cider vinegar", "4 bay leaves", "2 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. snipped parsley", "1 c. olive oil"]
instructions: ["Cover the mushrooms with water containing 3 tablespoons salt. Soak for", "10", "minutes; drain, then cover with the marinade containing", "all other ingredients.", "Heat to boiling, then turn down heat", "and", "simmer for 10 minutes.", "Discard the lemon rinds and chill."]

title: Cheese Mushroom Frittata
ingredients: ["1 c. cream of mushroom soup", "1/2 c. Mozzarella cheese, shredded", "1/8 tsp. pepper", "1 c. mushrooms, sliced", "1 medium onion", "tomato wedges", "6 eggs, slightly beaten", "1/4 tsp. dried basil leaves", "2 Tbsp. margarine or butter", "fresh parsley, chopped", "fresh basil leaves"]
instructions: ["In medium bowl with wire whisk, beat soup until smooth. Gradually blend in eggs, 1 cup of cheese, basil and pepper.", "In 10-inch oven-safe omelet pan or skillet over medium heat in hot margarine, cook mushrooms and onion until mushrooms are tender and liquid is evaporated, stirring occasionally.", "Pour mixture into skillet.", "Reduce heat to low.", "Cook 6 minutes or until edges are set 1-inch from edge.", "Do not stir.", "Remove from heat and serve. For garnish, use tomato wedges, chopped fresh parsley or fresh basil leaves."]

title: Beef Tips In Mushroom Sauce
ingredients: ["1 1/2 lb. tenderized boneless roast", "1 1/2 Tbsp. cooking oil", "2 large onions", "1 1/2 tsp. garlic salt", "1 (4 oz.) can sliced mushrooms, drained (save liquid)", "1 can cream of mushroom soup", "1/2 c. dry sherry or red wine"]
instructions: ["Brown meat in oil.", "Slice the onions in rings and cook with the meat.", "Combine soup, sherry, garlic salt and liquid from mushrooms.", "Pour over beef and onions.", "Pour in mushrooms.", "Let boil and then simmer for at least one hour."]

title: Turmeric Slaw
ingredients: ["1 average size head cabbage", "1 large bell pepper", "1 large onion", "1 c. vinegar", "1 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. turmeric", "1 tsp. mustard seed or 1/2 tsp. dry mustard"]
instructions: ["Chop cabbage, pepper and onion together; set aside.", "Bring vinegar, sugar, salt, turmeric and mustard to a boil.", "Pour over the cabbage, pepper and onion and mix well.", "Put in refrigerator and chill 3 hours or overnight."]

title: Brown Flour Potato Soup
ingredients: ["4 cups potatoes, cubed", "1/4 cup onion, chopped", "1/2 cup celery, chopped", "1/2 tsp. garlic powder", "2 chicken bouillon cubes", "1 tsp. salt", "1/8 tsp. pepper", "2 cups milk", "1/2 cup butter or margarine", "1/2 cup flour"]
instructions: ["Cook first 7 ingredients in 2 cups of water until soft.", "DO NOT DRAIN.", "In separate frying pan, melt butter or margarine.", "Stir in the flour using a wire whisk, if possible.", "Stir in about one half to 1 cup of the water from the potatoes.", "Add milk and stir until bubbly.", "Add to the potatoes.", "If soup seems to thick, add a little more milk or tap water."]

title: Stuffed Mushrooms(Microwave)
ingredients: ["8 oz. fresh mushrooms (about twelve 1 1/2-inch mushrooms)", "3 slices bacon, chopped", "1/3 c. finely chopped green onions", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. pepper", "2 to 4 drops red pepper sauce", "1 Tbsp. all-purpose flour", "1/4 c. whipping cream", "2 Tbsp. shredded Cheddar cheese"]
instructions: ["Wash mushrooms; remove stems and chop fine.", "Place mushroom caps on paper towel on carousel or dinner plate.", "Microwave at Medium-high 1 minute.", "Drain and set aside."]

title: Party Mushrooms
ingredients: ["fresh mushrooms", "10 slices cooked bacon", "3/4 c. mayonnaise", "3 pieces bread", "seasoned salt", "1 onion, grated fine", "1 1/2 c. grated cheese"]
instructions: ["Mix mayonnaise, bacon, onion and salt.", "Take bread and soak up bacon drippings and add to mixture.", "Stuff mushrooms and place in baking dish.", "Sprinkle with cheese and cover with foil.", "Bake at 325\u00b0 for 15 to 20 minutes."]

title: Lima Beans With Mushrooms And Celery
ingredients: ["2 pkg. frozen lima beans", "2 cans mushrooms or 1/2 lb. fresh", "1 medium onion, minced", "5 stalks crisp celery", "1/4 lb. butter", "2 Tbsp. flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. nutmeg", "1/8 tsp. pepper", "1/2 c. heavy cream (I use half and half)", "paprika (for garnish)", "a little sherry (if desired)"]
instructions: ["Cook beans.", "Mince onion.", "Cut celery into 1/2-inch pieces as thick as a matchstick.", "Saute the onion and celery in butter until golden.", "Add mushrooms.", "Sprinkle flour, mixed with salt, nutmeg and pepper.", "Toss until well blended.", "Reduce heat and stir cream in.", "Add to cooked beans.", "I serve in a vegetable dish.", "Garnish with lots of paprika.", "Stir in a little sherry just before serving if desired."]

title: Creamy Mushroom Topper
ingredients: ["1/4 c. chopped onion", "2 Tbsp. butter", "1 Tbsp. flour", "1/2 c. light cream", "1 (3 oz.) can broiled sliced mushrooms, drained", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. pepper", "sour cream"]
instructions: ["Cook the onion in the butter until just tender. Stir in the flour. Add the cream, mushrooms, salt and pepper. Add the sour cream and heat through.", "Makes about 1 1/2 cups.", "Good with chicken."]

title: Beef Patties With Mushrooms And Potatoes
ingredients: ["1 lb. extra-lean ground beef", "1/2 c. dry fine bread crumbs", "1/3 c. water", "1/4 c. catsup", "1 egg, slightly beaten", "1 envelope onion soup mix", "4 medium potatoes", "1 (4 oz.) can sliced mushrooms, drained"]
instructions: ["Combine first 5 ingredients and 1/2 of the envelope of soup mix; mix lightly, but well.", "Shape into 4 patties; set aside. Grease shiny side of four 18 x 18-inch sheets of heavy-duty foil. Spread out 1 potato (sliced) in center of each sheet.", "Sprinkle potatoes with remaining soup mix.", "Place meat on potatoes and top with mushrooms.", "Close both ends of foil tightly.", "Put on cookie sheet.", "Bake at 400\u00b0 for 35 minutes."]

title: Mushroom Pot Roast In Red Wine
ingredients: ["3 lb. boneless chuck roast", "1 Tbsp. flour", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. coarsely ground black pepper", "2 cloves garlic, minced or pressed", "2 Tbsp. vegetable oil", "1/4 tsp. each: dried thyme leaves, rosemary, marjoram leaves and dry mustard", "1/4 c. tomato ketchup", "1 c. dry red wine", "1/4 c. water", "1 bay leaf", "1/2 lb. whole fresh mushrooms", "2 Tbsp. flour", "2 Tbsp. water", "salt and freshly ground pepper to taste", "fresh herbs or parsley for garnish (optional)"]
instructions: ["Rub roast on all sides with flour.", "Sprinkle with salt and pepper.", "Heat oil in deep, heavy, nonstick Dutch oven.", "Add beef. Brown about 10 minutes at medium heat, turning roast often.", "Turn heat to lowest setting.", "Add herbs, mustard, ketchup, red wine, water and bay leaf.", "Cover and cook slowly for 1 1/2 hours, adding water if liquid boils down too dry.", "Add mushrooms and cover. Simmer 1/2 hour or until beef is tender.", "Remove meat and mushrooms to platter.", "Keep warm."]

title: Mediterranean Chicken And Mushrooms
ingredients: ["1/2 lb. mushrooms", "1/4 c. flour", "3 lb. chicken", "4 Tbsp. oil", "1 c. chopped onion", "1 c. quartered green pepper", "1 clove garlic, finely chopped", "1 (1 lb.) can tomatoes, broken up", "1 c. water", "1 1/4 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. Italian dressing", "1/16 tsp. ground red pepper", "1/2 c. raw rice"]
instructions: ["Slice mushrooms. Dredge chicken with flour; shake off excess. Heat oil in large saucepan. Add chicken and brown well. Remove chicken.", "To oil remaining, add onion, green pepper and garlic. Saute 3 minutes. Add mushrooms and saute 4 minutes. Stir in tomatoes, water, salt, Italian dressing and red pepper.", "Bring to a boil.", "Stir in rice.", "Return chicken to saucepan.", "Cover, reduce heat and simmer for 45 minutes or until chicken is tender.", "Serves 4."]

title: Low Cholesterol But Not Low-Fat Pie Crust
ingredients: ["1 3/4 c. all-purpose flour", "1/4 c. sugar", "3/4 tsp. salt", "1 stick unsalted oleo", "1/4 c. apple or orange juice"]
instructions: ["In processor, blend flour, sugar and salt.", "Cut in oleo and blend until mixture resembles meal.", "Transfer to bowl; add juice and combine to form dough.", "Make into ball; wrap in Saran and chill for one hour or freeze until ready to use.", "Makes one double crust pie."]

title: Baked Chicken With Sherry-Mushroom Sauce
ingredients: ["1 lb. ready-to-serve chicken pieces (4 or 5) or 1 ready-to-serve chicken, split into halves, boil chicken first", "1 (10 1/2 oz.) can condensed cream of chicken or mushroom soup", "1 (2 oz.) can mushrooms stems and pieces", "1/4 c. dry sherry or water", "1/4 to 1/2 tsp. tarragon leaves", "1/8 tsp. garlic powder", "1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce"]
instructions: ["Heat oven to 400\u00b0.", "Place chicken in ungreased baking pan, 9 x 9 x 2-inches. Mix soup, mushrooms (with liquid) and remaining ingredients.", "Pour over chicken.", "Bake until chicken is hot and sauce is bubbly, about 20 minutes.", "Yields 2 servings."]

title: Cake Frosting(Flour In Filling)
ingredients: ["1 c. milk", "1 stick butter", "1 c. sugar", "dash of salt", "1/4 c. flour", "1/2 c. shortening", "1 tsp. vanilla"]
instructions: ["Cook flour with milk over low heat until thickened, stirring constantly.", "Let cool.", "Cream butter and shortening.", "Add sugar, salt and vanilla.", "Beat at high speed with mixer.", "Gradually, add thickened milk mixture and beat well.", "May be used on any type of cake or cream rolls.", "Freezes well."]

title: Round Steak And Mushroom Gravy
ingredients: ["1 round steak", "vinegar", "salt and pepper", "flour", "oil or shortening", "1 can cream of mushroom", "1 can water"]
instructions: ["Pat round steak with vinegar.", "Salt and pepper.", "Beat with mallet or side of metal lid.", "Let it stand for about 1/2 hour. Cut into serving size pieces.", "Pat with flour.", "Fry slowly in oil until brown.", "Pour off oil.", "Add cream of mushroom and water. Cover and cook slowly until it is tender.", "(I cook at least an hour on low.)", "Add water to gravy, if necessary."]

title: Indian Corn Dinner
ingredients: ["1 medium onion, chopped fine", "1/2 green pepper, chopped fine", "2 Tbsp. butter or shortening", "1 (No. 2) can whole kernel corn", "1 lb. ground beef", "1 can condensed tomato soup", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. sugar", "2 Tbsp. flour, mixed with 2 Tbsp. water"]
instructions: ["Saute chopped onions and peppers in butter until tender, about 5 minutes at low heat.", "Add meat and brown well.", "Add corn, soup and seasonings.", "Thicken with flour mixture and pour into greased casserole dish and bake in 350\u00b0 oven for 20 minutes."]

title: Marinated Mushrooms
ingredients: ["1 lb. fresh mushrooms", "1 medium onion", "1 bottle red Italian wine sauce"]
instructions: ["Wash mushrooms and slice in half.", "Saute onion and mushrooms until tender.", "Pour into dish and pour Italian wine over the mushrooms.", "Let stand overnight."]

title: Easy Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: ["1 lb. large fresh mushrooms, stems removed", "6 bacon strips, fried crisp and crumbled", "dash of garlic powder", "6 oz. cream cheese", "2 Tbsp. minced onion"]
instructions: ["Mix all ingredients except mushrooms.", "Fill mushroom caps with mixture.", "Bake on cookie sheet at 350\u00b0 for 10 to 15 minutes."]

title: Italian Sauteed Chicken With Italian Mushroom Rice
ingredients: ["6 chicken breast halves, skinned and boned", "1/2 c. flour", "1/8 tsp. white pepper", "1 1/2 sticks butter", "1 Tbsp. olive oil", "1 garlic clove, minced", "1/2 tsp. crushed rosemary", "1/2 tsp. sweet basil", "1/2 c. white wine", "Italian Mushroom Rice"]
instructions: ["Cut each chicken breast into 3 long strips.", "Dredge strips with mixture of flour and white pepper.", "In a heavy skillet, melt 1 stick butter and add olive oil, garlic, rosemary and basil.", "Saute chicken in this mixture and lightly brown.", "Add wine and cook on low heat until 1/2 of wine has been reduced.", "This may be done 3 or 4 hours before serving.", "When ready to serve, reheat on low heat; remove the chicken and add 1/2 stick butter to remaining gravy. When hot, place chicken pieces on bed of hot Italian Mushroom Rice and spoon on gravy.", "Serve immediately.", "Serves 4."]

title: Cholesterol-Free Lemon Chiffon Cake
ingredients: ["5 large egg whites (room temperature)", "2 Tbsp. sifted powdered sugar", "1 1/2 c. sifted cake flour (5 1/4 oz.)", "1 c. granulated sugar", "2 tsp. baking powder", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. vegetable oil or corn oil", "grated rind of 2 lemons", "1/2 c. fresh squeezed lemon juice"]
instructions: ["In a large bowl using electric mixer, whip egg whites with powdered sugar until fluffy, but not dry.", "Set whites aside.", "In another bowl, sift flour, granulated sugar, baking powder and salt.", "Scoop out a well in the center of the flour and add oil, lemon rind and juice.", "With medium speed on mixer, beat until well blended and smooth.", "Fold the batter into the whites.", "Spread solid shortening on bottom and sides of 9-inch tube pan and dust with flour.", "Pour batter into pan and bake in a 350\u00b0 oven for 35 to 40 minutes or until lightly browned on top.", "(Should spring back to touch.)", "Cool cake right side up in pan for 5 minutes. Invert onto wire rack and lift off the pan.", "Cool completely and ice, if desired."]

title: Curry Canaps
ingredients: ["rye or pumpernickel party sliced bread", "1 tsp. curry powder", "1/2 c. chopped green onions", "1/2 c. Cheddar cheese", "1 c. chopped ripe olives", "1/2 c. mayonnaise"]
instructions: ["Mix ingredients and spread on bread. Broil in oven until bubbly. Can be made earlier and broiled when time to serve. Spread can be refrigerated for 1 month. Makes 48 pieces."]

title: Beef & Rice With Mushroom Gravy
ingredients: ["1 pkg. beef stew meat", "1 - 2 cans (small) mushrooms", "1 - 2 pkg. mushroom gravy or 1 can of cream of mushroom soup", "1 pkg. rice"]
instructions: ["Simmer beef stew meat in crock pot or skillet.", "Add mushroom gravy mix or soup.", "Add mushrooms, heat until soup and mushrooms are hot.", "Cook rice.", "Pour gravy over rice."]

title: Chopped Sirloin And Mushroom Gravy
ingredients: ["6 chopped sirloin steaks", "1 c. flour", "1 tsp. black pepper", "1 1/2 tsp. salt", "1 can golden mushroom soup"]
instructions: ["Mix flour, pepper and salt together in a pan. Roll sirloin steak in flour mixture. Place in an electric skillet at 350\u00b0. Brown on each side. Place in oblong baking dish. Add one can golden mushroom soup. Place in preheated oven at 350\u00b0 for 25 minutes until hot through and through."]

title: Curry Chicken
ingredients: ["3 lb. chicken", "3 Tbsp. milk", "3 Tbsp. melted butter", "1/4 c. prepared mustard", "1/2 c. honey (optional)", "1 tsp. curry powder", "1 tsp. salt"]
instructions: ["Mix milk, butter, mustard, honey, curry and salt in bowl until blended.", "Roll chicken in mixture, making sure it is well coated. Place chicken in roasting pan and place in 350\u00b0 oven."]

title: Mushroom-Artichoke Casserole
ingredients: ["3 c. fresh halved mushrooms", "1/2 c. sliced green onions", "4 Tbsp. butter", "2 Tbsp. flour", "1/4 c. milk", "1 tsp. instant chicken bouillon granules", "1 tsp. lemon juice", "1/8 tsp. nutmeg", "1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen artichoke hearts, cooked and drained", "3/4 c. soft bread crumbs (optional)", "1 Tbsp. butter"]
instructions: ["Cook mushrooms and onions in 4 tablespoons butter.", "Remove vegetables with slotted spoon.", "Put aside.", "Blend flour, salt (1/8 teaspoon) and dash of pepper into pan drippings.", "Add 3/4 cup water, milk, bouillon, lemon juice and nutmeg.", "Cook and stir until bubbly.", "Add all vegetables.", "Turn into 1-quart casserole. Combine bread crumbs and melted butter.", "Sprinkle around edge. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 20 minutes.", "Makes 6 servings."]

title: Southern Lassies
ingredients: ["1 stick butter", "1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 c. flour"]
instructions: ["Mix and roll into a ball.", "Put small amount in each cup and press around to make a shell.", "In the bottom of each, put chopped walnuts."]

title: Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: ["large mushrooms", "1 clove garlic", "1 onion (medium size)", "1/4 c. bread crumbs", "1/4 c. Parmesan cheese", "1 can crab meat"]
instructions: ["Chop onion, garlic and mushroom stems; saute until just softened.", "Add crumbs, cheese and crabmeat.", "Fill mushroom caps and sprinkle with more Parmesan and dot tops with butter.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 until mushrooms are tender."]

title: Potatoes And Mushrooms
ingredients: ["8 to 10 small new potatoes", "1/4 c. butter, melted", "2 Tbsp. green onions or chives, chopped", "1/2 lb. mushrooms, chopped", "1 c. meat stock", "2 egg yolks", "1 tsp. lemon juice", "salt and pepper"]
instructions: ["Cook potatoes in jackets until tender.", "Drain and dry.", "Place in a casserole, adding butter and chopped onion.", "Beat egg yolks and add lemon juice, mushrooms and meat stock.", "Season with salt and pepper.", "Pour over potatoes in casserole.", "Bake, uncovered, in preheated 350\u00b0 oven for 30 to 40 minutes."]

title: Tandoori Chicken
ingredients: ["2 to 3 lb. assorted chicken parts", "1 onion (optional)", "1 pt. plain yogurt", "dry tandoori mix (available at Indian grocery stores)"]
instructions: ["Remove skin from chicken and place in casserole dish.", "Place 1 teaspoon tandoori mix on each piece of chicken.", "Pour yogurt into dish and mix chicken, spice and yogurt until there is a uniform orange color.", "Place in refrigerator 2 hours up to 12 hours.", "Bake in oven at 375\u00b0 for 1 hour."]

title: Love Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: ["25 to 30 mushrooms (medium to large size)", "1/2 lb. breakfast sausage", "1/4 c. minced water chestnuts", "1/2 c. minced green onions", "1 small can shrimp (broken pieces)", "1 egg", "1 tsp. soy sauce", "1/2 tsp. salt", "ground pepper", "chopped mushroom stems", "sesame seed"]
instructions: ["Brush mushrooms and remove stems.", "Mix all ingredients together and stuff mushrooms. Coat with a little melted butter. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 35 minutes or until done. Serve warm."]

title: Fried Mushrooms
ingredients: ["1/2 c. all-purpose flour", "1/8 tsp. salt", "1/8 tsp. pepper", "3 eggs, beaten", "1 1/2 tsp. vegetable oil", "1 1/2 tsp. water", "32 large fresh mushrooms", "1 c. Italian seasoned breadcrumbs", "vegetable oil", "Tartar Sauce (recipe follows)"]
instructions: ["Combine flour, salt and pepper in a small bowl; set aside. Combine eggs, 1 1/2 teaspoons oil and water; mix well.", "Clean mushrooms with damp paper towels.", "Dredge mushrooms in flour mixture; dip in egg mixture.", "Roll in breadcrumbs.", "Chill at least 1 1/2 hours.", "Deep fry mushrooms in hot oil (375\u00b0) until golden brown.", "Drain on paper towels.", "Serve mushrooms with Tartar Sauce.", "Yields 32 appetizers."]

title: Marinated Rotini Vegetable Salad
ingredients: ["4 ears corn", "1 1/2 c. rotini, cooked", "2 c. cherry tomatoes", "1 c. sliced zucchini (1 medium)", "1 c. pitted ripe olives", "1/3 c. tarragon vinegar", "1/4 c. oil", "1 to 2 tsp. dill weed", "1 1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. dry mustard", "1/4 tsp. pepper", "1/4 tsp. garlic powder"]
instructions: ["Cook corn; cut into 12 chunks.", "Combine the cooked corn, rotini, tomatoes, zucchini and olives in a large bowl.", "In a small bowl, combine remaining ingredients.", "Pour over vegetable mixture. Cover and refrigerate 2 hours, stirring occasionally.", "Serves 8."]

title: Indiana Lemon Angel Pie
ingredients: ["3 egg whites", "1/4 tsp. cream of tartar", "1 c. sugar", "5 egg yolks", "2/3 c. sugar", "1 Tbsp. grated lemon rind", "1/3 c. lemon juice", "1 c. heavy cream, whipped"]
instructions: ["Meringue shell:", "Beat egg whites with cream of tartar in medium bowl until foamy.", "Beat in sugar, one tablespoon at a time, until meringue forms, still glossy peaks.", "Lightly butter a 9 inch pie plate.", "Spoon meringue over bottom and side", "to form a shell. Bake in a slow oven at 275 degrees for 1 hour.", "Turn oven off and allow meringue to cool in the oven."]

title: Mushroom Wine Sauce
ingredients: ["2 Tbsp. butter", "2 Tbsp. flour", "1 c. chicken stock", "1/2 c. dry white wine", "1/2 tsp. tarragon", "salt and pepper", "4 oz. can mushroom pieces or 1/4 lb. fresh, sliced and sauteed for 5 minutes in butter", "1/2 c. half and half", "1 egg yolk"]
instructions: ["Melt butter in saucepan and add flour.", "Cook, without browning, stirring constantly, for several minutes.", "Slowly add stock, wine and spices. Simmer several minutes and add mushrooms. Simmer for 5 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in creamed mixed with egg yolk.", "Cook, stirring, until heated through. Do not let boil.", "May be made a day ahead and reheated."]

title: Apple Cake(Low Cholesterol - Low-Fat)
ingredients: ["2 c. diced apples", "2/3 c. sugar", "1/3 c. vegetable oil", "1 tsp. vanilla", "2 egg whites, beaten", "1 1/2 c. unsifted flour", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. baking soda", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. raisins", "1/2 c. finely grated lemon rind"]
instructions: ["Preheat oven to 350\u00b0.", "Combine apples and sugar in a mixing bowl.", "Blend oil, vanilla and egg whites with apples and sugar. Combine the dry ingredients and mix in well.", "Stir in raisins and lemon rind.", "Pour into 8-inch square cake pan.", "Bake 35 to 40 minutes in a lightly greased pan until toothpick comes out dry."]

title: Mushroom Sauced Meatballs
ingredients: ["1 lb. ground beef", "1 egg", "1/2 c. fresh whole wheat bread crumbs", "1 c. (4 oz.) Kraft natural shredded sharp Cheddar cheese", "1/4 c. finely chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley", "1/2 tsp. dried basil leaves", "1/4 tsp. pepper", "1 Tbsp. oil", "1 c. sliced mushrooms", "2 Tbsp. flour", "1/2 c. beef broth", "1/2 c. dry white wine or beef broth"]
instructions: ["Mix meat, egg, bread crumbs, cheese, onion, Worcestershire sauce, parsley, basil and pepper.", "Shape mixture into 12 meatballs. Brown on all sides in oil in a large skillet about 5 minutes. Remove meatballs from skillet.", "Cook and stir mushrooms in same skillet 2 to 3 minutes or until tender."]

title: Microwave Scallops In Mushroom-Cream Sauce
ingredients: ["2 Tbsp. butter or margarine", "4 green onions, chopped", "1/4 lb. medium mushrooms, sliced", "1 large carrot, shredded", "1/2 c. milk", "2 Tbsp. white wine or lemon juice", "1 (1 oz.) pkg. white sauce mix", "1 c. (4 oz.) shredded Swiss cheese", "chopped parsley", "1 lb. bag scallops"]
instructions: ["In 2-quart glass casserole, melt butter on High 1 minute.", "Add onions, mushrooms and carrot; cover with plastic wrap and vent. Cook on High 3 minutes.", "Stir in milk, wine and white sauce mix until blended.", "Cover; vent and cook on High 3 more minutes, stirring once.", "Stir in scallops; cover and vent.", "Cook on High 2 minutes.", "Add cheese; stir until melted.", "Spoon into four large scallop shells.", "Garnish with parsley."]

title: Bea Steven'S Cottage Cheese Souffle Salad
ingredients: ["1 (3 oz.) pkg. lemon Jell-O", "1 c. hot water", "1/2 c. cold water", "1 Tbsp. vinegar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. mayonnaise", "1 c. chopped raw spinach or thawed frozen", "3/4 c. cottage cheese", "1/3 c. diced celery", "1 Tbsp. finely chopped onion"]
instructions: ["Dissolve Jell-O in water, vinegar and salt.", "Add mayonnaise and beat until smooth.", "Pour into refrigerator tray and place in freezing compartment 15 to 20 minutes until mixture is set about 1-inch from edges, but soft in center.", "Turn into bowl and beat again until fluffy.", "Fold in spinach, cottage cheese, celery and onion.", "Turn into mold and chill until firm."]

title: Philadelphia Classic New York Cheesecake
ingredients: ["1 cup graham cracker crumbs", "3 Tbsp. sugar", "3 Tbsp. butter, melted", "5 (8 oz. each) pkg. Philadelphia Cream Cheese, softened", "1 cup sugar", "3 Tbsp. flour", "1 Tbsp. vanilla", "1 cup sour cream", "4 eggs"]
instructions: ["Mix crumbs, 3 Tbsp. sugar and butter; press onto bottom of 9 inch spring foam pan. Bake at 325 degrees for 10 minutes."]

title: Stratta
ingredients: ["1 lb. ground meat", "1 lb. spring macaroni", "6 slices Provolone cheese", "6 slices Mozzarella cheese", "8 oz. sour cream", "1 large jar Ragu sauce"]
instructions: ["Brown ground meat.", "Cook macaroni according to package directions.", "Drain macaroni; add ground meat and Ragu sauce.", "Put 1/2 of mixture in 9 x 13-inch pan.", "Cover with sour cream.", "Place Provolone cheese slices next; put remaining macaroni mixture next and top with Mozzarella cheese.", "Bake in 300\u00b0 oven for 1/2 hour."]

title: Crab Stuffed Portabella Mushrooms
ingredients: ["imitation crab meat, shredded", "bread crumbs", "Parmesan cheese", "butter", "hot sauce", "egg", "portabella caps"]
instructions: ["Mix first 6 ingredients together in a bowl.", "Take the stem out of the mushroom cap. Stuff each cap and place in 350\u00b0 oven for 20 minutes. Sprinkle with more Parmesan cheese and broil until golden brown."]

title: Mushroom Rice Casserole
ingredients: ["1/2 c. raw long grain rice", "1 (4 oz.) can mushroom stems and pieces", "1 medium onion, quartered and sliced thin", "1 can chicken or beef broth", "2 Tbsp. margarine"]
instructions: ["In 10-inch skillet, brown dry rice.", "Pour into medium casserole dish.", "In same skillet, melt margarine.", "Saute onions, mushrooms and seasonings until onions turn transparent.", "Add broth and stir continuously to boil."]

title: Cream Of Mushroom Soup
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) cans mushrooms, drained and minced", "1 (15 oz.) can chicken broth", "3 c. milk", "1 1/2 Tbsp. minced onion", "1 tsp. salt", "dash of pepper", "3 Tbsp. flour", "2 Tbsp. butter"]
instructions: ["Saute mushrooms in 1 tablespoon butter.", "Melt the other tablespoon butter in saucepan.", "Add flour and stir until smooth. Add seasonings.", "Slowly add milk, stirring constantly.", "Add minced onion.", "Add chicken broth and mushrooms.", "Continue to stir until mixture reaches boiling point but do not boil.", "Serves 6."]

title: Whole Wheat Cottage Cheese Rolls
ingredients: ["2 c. whole wheat flour", "1 3/4 c. white flour, unbleached", "2 pkg. active dry yeast", "1/2 tsp. baking soda", "1 1/2 c. cream-style cottage cheese", "1/2 c. water", "1/4 c. packed brown sugar", "2 Tbsp. margarine or oil", "2 tsp. salt", "2 eggs"]
instructions: ["Thoroughly stir together 1 1/2 cups flour, salt, yeast and soda.", "Heat together cottage cheese, water, sugar and butter or oil and cook just until warm, stirring constantly to melt oil or margarine.", "Add to dry mixture; add eggs.", "Beat at low speed or by hand for 3 minutes, or enough to make a stiff dough.", "On floured surface knead until smooth, 8 to 10 minutes."]

title: Banick Bread(Indian Fry Bread)
ingredients: ["2 c. flour", "2 tsp. baking powder", "1 tsp. salt", "1 c. water", "1/4 c. oil"]
instructions: ["Mix the first 4 ingredients into thick paste.", "Put oil in hot skillet.", "Drop in hot oil and fry like pancakes."]

title: Pork Chops With Cream Of Mushroom Gravy
ingredients: ["4 pork chops with or without bone", "1 can cream of mushroom soup", "1/4 can milk", "garlic salt", "pepper"]
instructions: ["Brown and season pork chops with garlic salt and pepper.", "Add cream of mushroom soup and milk.", "Mix well in pan.", "Simmer until pork chops are done.", "Approximate cooking time:", "35 minutes.", "Serve with gravy over rice (my favorite) or potatoes.", "This is one meal my mother used to make.", "Now it is my favorite meal to make at home."]

title: Classic Waldorf Salad
ingredients: ["2 c. diced apple", "1 c. (1-inch) julienne celery sticks", "1/2 c. broken walnuts", "1/4 c. mayonnaise", "1 Tbsp. sugar", "1/2 tsp. lemon juice", "dash of salt", "1/2 c. whipping cream, whipped"]
instructions: ["Combine apple, celery and nuts.", "Blend mayonnaise, sugar, lemon juice and salt.", "Fold in whipped cream.", "Fold into apple mixture; chill.", "Makes 6 servings."]

title: Mushroom Potatoes
ingredients: ["2 lb. potatoes, cooked", "salt and pepper to taste", "1 c. hot milk", "1/2 pt. sour cream", "1 large can sliced mushrooms", "1/2 c. butter"]
instructions: ["Mash potatoes with milk and sour cream.", "Saute mushrooms in butter.", "Pour butter and mushrooms in a well made in the potatoes. Cover with more potatoes.", "Dot the top with butter and bake for 30 minutes at 500\u00b0.", "Can be prepared a day before and reheated in oven or microwave."]

title: Rolled Grape Leaves With Chickpeas
ingredients: ["1 can chickpeas, drained", "1 lb. grape leaves (canned or fresh)", "2 medium onions, chopped", "1 Tbsp. dried mint or 1/2 c. chopped fresh mint leaves", "1 c. chopped parsley", "1 bunch chopped scallions", "juice of 2 lemons", "1 lb. rice", "salt and pepper to taste"]
instructions: ["Fresh grape leaves must be washed and blanched for 1 minute in hot water to make them pliable.", "Combine half of the lemon juice with the chickpeas, onions, rice, scallions, parsley, mint and seasonings.", "Mix thoroughly.", "Place a generous teaspoon of the mixture on a grape leaf, veined or under side up.", "Roll from stem end, tucking in the sides.", "Place extra leaves at the bottom of the cooking pot to keep grape leaves from splitting.", "Pack the rolled leaves evenly and snugly over the loose leaves at bottom and add enough water to cover.", "An inverted dish on top will help keep leaves from spreading.", "Simmer on top of stove for about 35 minutes or until rice is cooked."]

title: Soupe A Loignon Francaise Classique
ingredients: ["3 T. butter", "4 large onions, thinly sliced", "1 t. granulated sugar", "5 c. beef stock, homemade or canned", "3 sprigs fresh thyme or pinch of dried thyme", "3 parsley sprigs", "2 T. brandy, optional", "1/2 t. salt or to taste", "1/2 t. pepper", "4 slices day-old french bread, toasted", "3/4 c. grated Gruyere cheese"]
instructions: ["Melt butter in a large, deep pot over medium heat.", "Add onions and sugar, stirring to coat with butter.", "Cook 30 minutes, stirring occasionally, until golden brown; do not burn.", "Stir in stock and bring to a boil.", "Reduce heat to a simmer and add thyme, parsley, brandy, salt, and pepper.", "Simmer 20 minutes.", "Remove herb sprigs.", "Soup may be prepared up to 2 days in advanced."]

title: Mushroom Individuals
ingredients: ["1 lb. button mushrooms", "1 Tbsp. butter", "1 garlic clove, crushed", "1 tsp. dill weed", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. pepper", "1 Tbsp. lemon juice", "1 Tbsp. sherry", "1 c. sour cream"]
instructions: ["Wash and dry mushrooms.", "Melt butter and add the garlic.", "Add the mushrooms to the butter, at the same time adding dill weed, salt, pepper, lemon juice and sherry.", "Cook for 20 minutes or until mushrooms are cooked through. Pour small amount of mushroom liquid into sour cream and blend.", "Then pour sour cream over mushrooms and mix to thoroughly coat mushrooms.", "Refrigerate 8 hours or overnight.", "When ready to serve, place in chafing dish and heat.", "Use toothpicks for serving as appetizers."]

title: Elegant Cheese Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: ["1 1/2 lb. small fresh mushrooms", "1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "dash of ground nutmeg", "dash of Worcestershire sauce", "ground black pepper to taste", "1 c. grated Parmesan cheese", "dash of salt"]
instructions: ["Rinse mushrooms, pat dry and remove stems.", "Place caps on greased baking sheet.", "Combine ingredients except 2 tablespoons Parmesan cheese.", "Mix well.", "Spoon mixture into mushroom caps. Sprinkle each with reserved cheese.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 20 minutes."]

title: Pakistani Chicken Curry
ingredients: ["4 boned chicken breasts", "3 cloves garlic", "6 Tbsp. butter or vegetable shortening", "1 Tbsp. ground coriander", "1 tsp. ground cumin", "salt to taste", "2 large onions, sliced", "1 1/2 inch piece fresh ginger root", "1 Tbsp. tomato paste", "1 tsp. turmeric", "1/2 pt. yogurt"]
instructions: ["Saute the onions, garlic and ginger in the shortening until the onion is golden brown.", "Add the pieces of chicken, yogurt, tomato paste and the spices.", "Mix well and fry for about 15 minutes by which time it should become rather dry.", "Sprinkle in about 2 cups of hot water and allow to cook until chicken is tender.", "If necessary, add more water half way through.", "Makes about 6 servings."]

title: Vegetarian Four-Bean Chili(Low-Calorie, Low-Fat, Low-Cholesterol)
ingredients: ["1 Tbsp. vegetable oil", "2 large onions, chopped", "1 medium size sweet green pepper, cored, seeded and chopped", "3 cloves garlic, finely chopped", "2 medium size carrots, pared and cut in 1/2-inch dice", "1 small zucchini, halved lengthwise and thickly sliced crosswise", "1 small summer squash, halved lengthwise and thickly sliced crosswise", "2 Tbsp. chili powder", "1/2 tsp. leaf oregano, crumbled", "1 tsp. ground cumin", "2 cans (28 oz. each) tomatoes, in puree", "1 can (12 oz.) beer", "1 tsp. salt", "1 can (1 lb.) black beans, drained and rinsed", "1 can (1 lb.) black-eyed peas, drained and rinsed", "1 can (1 lb.) kidney beans, drained and rinsed", "1 can (1 lb.) chickpeas, drained and rinsed"]
instructions: ["Heat oil in large pot over medium heat.", "Add onion, green pepper and garlic; saute 4 minutes or until onion is softened. Add carrot; cover and cook 2 minutes.", "Add zucchini, summer squash, chili powder, oregano and cumin.", "Saute 1 minute.", "Add tomatoes breaking up with wooden spoon the beer and salt.", "Bring to boiling. Lower heat; simmer, partially covered 15 minutes. Stir in all the beans.", "Simmer, stirring, until heated through."]

title: Mushroom-Cheese Souffle("A Favorite From The '76 Cookbook.")
ingredients: ["2 eggs, separated", "2 Tbsp. milk", "3 Tbsp. flour", "1/2 Tbsp. salt", "dash of pepper", "1 c. cottage cheese", "2 Tbsp. onion, minced", "1 (3 or 4 oz.) can sliced mushrooms, drained"]
instructions: ["Start heating oven to 300\u00b0.", "With hand beater, beat egg yolks until light and foamy.", "Stir milk gradually into flour.", "Add to egg yolks and beat well.", "Add salt, pepper and cheese and beat until blended.", "Gently fold in onion, mushrooms and egg whites, stiffly beaten.", "Turn into greased 1-quart casserole.", "Bake about 50 minutes or until golden brown on top.", "Makes 2 servings."]

title: Cream Of Mushroom Soup
ingredients: ["2 (8 oz.) cans mushrooms", "1 1/2 c. chicken broth", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1 1/2 c. skim milk", "1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "paprika"]
instructions: ["Chill broth so fat will raise.", "Mix cornstarch and broth together.", "Cook on medium heat.", "Stir in milk, Worcestershire sauce and mushrooms.", "Bring to boil.", "Cool and garnish with paprika."]

title: Marinated Mushrooms
ingredients: ["1 lb. fresh mushrooms", "1/2 c. cider vinegar", "1/2 c. salad oil", "1 tsp. salt", "1 clove garlic", "1 bay leaf", "2 small onions, sliced"]
instructions: ["Parboil mushrooms.", "Mix other ingredients except onions.", "Pour over parboiled mushrooms and onions.", "Let stand several days (stir occasionally)."]

title: Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: ["1 lb. mushrooms", "1 clove garlic, minced", "1 c. seasoned bread crumbs", "3 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese", "1 small onion, minced", "1 Tbsp. parsley", "salt to taste", "pepper to taste", "3 Tbsp. melted butter", "6 Tbsp. olive oil"]
instructions: ["Wash and clean mushrooms, remove stems and mince.", "To stems, add garlic, bread crumbs, cheese, onion, salt and pepper, parsley, butter and half of olive oil and mix well.", "Stuff mushroom caps, use remaining oil to grease baking pan and drizzle over tops of mushrooms.", "Bake at 400\u00b0 for 20 minutes."]

title: Wild Rice With Mushrooms And Onions
ingredients: ["2 tsp. salt", "1 c. wild rice", "1 c. converted rice", "1 yellow onion, diced", "3 Tbsp. butter or olive oil", "1/2 lb. mushrooms, sliced", "1/2 tsp. pepper"]
instructions: ["In a 3-quart lidded saucepan, bring 6 cups of water to a boil. Add salt and the wild rice.", "Cover and simmer on low heat for 30 minutes.", "Add the converted rice, mushrooms and onion to the pot without stirring.", "Cover and continue cooking another 5 minutes. Do not remove the lid.", "Let the rice sit for 5 minutes after finishing the cooking.", "Yields 6 servings."]

title: Cottage Cheese Salad Ring
ingredients: ["1 lb. carton cottage cheese", "1 small pkg. lime-flavored gelatin", "1 c. hot water", "1 c. mayonnaise", "1 c. celery, diced", "1 c. green pepper, diced"]
instructions: ["Dissolve gelatin in hot water.", "Chill until partially set. Blend in mayonnaise.", "Fold in celery, green pepper and cottage cheese.", "Pour into a 4-cup ring mold.", "Chill until firm.", "Unmold on lettuce."]

title: Jello Pineapple Cottage Cheese Salad
ingredients: ["1 (3 oz.) lemon jello", "1 c. boiling water", "1 c. pineapple juice", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "1 1/2 c. crushed pineapple", "1 1/2 c. cottage cheese", "mayonnaise", "lettuce"]
instructions: ["Dissolve jello in boiling water.", "Drain pineapple and reserve juice.", "Add pineapple juice, lemon juice and sugar to jello. Stir.", "Chill until thick, but not firm.", "Fold in crushed pineapple and cottage cheese.", "Pour into bowl and chill until set.", "Unmold onto lettuce.", "Dot with mayonnaise."]

title: Cottage Cheese Loaf
ingredients: ["16 oz. cottage cheese", "1 c. Pepperidge Farm dressing", "3 eggs", "1 small onion", "1 tsp. bacon yeast", "1 Tbsp. mayonnaise"]
instructions: ["Mix together and bake at 350\u00b0 for 35 to 40 minutes."]

title: Sauteed Shrimp And Mushrooms
ingredients: ["4 cloves garlic", "1 1/2 sticks butter or margarine", "2 lb. fresh mushrooms", "1.5 lb. or larger jumbo shrimp, peeled and deveined", "salt", "pepper"]
instructions: ["Slice mushrooms into 2 or 3 pieces each.", "Melt butter in a large skillet; add mushrooms.", "Cook on low heat or high simmer 30 minutes uncovered (until most of the water has cooked out).", "Add garlic, salt and pepper.", "Stir and add shrimp.", "Cook covered 5 to 7 minutes, until shrimp are done.", "Stir occasionally.", "Serve over rice."]

title: Indian Chicken Curry
ingredients: ["1/3 c. butter", "1 large onion, chopped", "1 c. chopped celery", "2 tart apples, chopped and peeled", "1 Tbsp. curry powder", "6 Tbsp. flour", "1 c. chicken broth", "1/2 c. cream of coconut", "1 pt. half and half", "3 c. diced, cooked chicken"]
instructions: ["In a large saucepan, melt butter and saute onion, celery and apples for 5 minutes.", "Stir in curry and flour.", "Gradually stir in chicken broth, cream of coconut and half and half.", "Stir over moderate heat until sauce bubbles and thickens.", "Stir in chicken and season to taste with salt and pepper.", "Serve over rice."]

title: Vidalia Onion Casserole
ingredients: ["2 Tbsp. butter", "5 large onions, sliced into rings", "24 Ritz crackers, crushed", "Parmesan cheese"]
instructions: ["Saute onions in butter.", "Layer half of onions and butter in casserole dish.", "Cover with half of crackers and sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.", "Repeat layering.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 15 minutes."]

title: Pineapple Cottage Cheese
ingredients: ["1 pkg. lime jello", "1 can crushed, drained pineapple", "1 carton cottage cheese (large curd)", "2 c. miniature marshmallows", "1/2 pt. whipped cream"]
instructions: ["Heat pineapple juice and lime jello.", "Put pineapple, cottage cheese and marshmallows in big bowl.", "Cool lime jello and pour over pineapple mixture.", "Add whipped cream.", "Sets quickly."]

title: Mushroom Soup
ingredients: ["1 family size can cream of mushroom soup", "1/2 c. water", "1/2 c. light sour cream", "1/2 tsp. thyme", "1 tsp. onion powder"]
instructions: ["Mix well.", "Use more water if needed for thinning.", "Serve over Swedish meatballs."]

title: Cottage Cheese Dip
ingredients: ["1/2 Tbsp. garlic salt", "2 pkg. green onion dip mix", "1 Tbsp. Miracle Whip", "2 lb. cottage cheese", "1/2 Tbsp. seasoned salt", "salt and pepper to taste", "1/4 c. milk"]
instructions: ["In a large bowl, mix garlic salt, green onion dip mix, Miracle Whip, seasoned salt, salt, pepper and milk.", "Add cottage cheese. Stir.", "Let set at least 12 hours.", "Serve with chips of your choice."]

title: Marinated Mushrooms
ingredients: ["1 lb. fresh mushroom buttons (small)", "3/4 c. salad oil", "1/3 c. red wine vinegar", "2 Tbsp. lemon juice", "3 tsp. chopped chives", "1 tsp. tarragon", "1 small clove garlic, chopped", "1 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. sugar"]
instructions: ["Mix all ingredients in a deep dish or jar so liquid will cover mushrooms.", "Chill overnight.", "Drain and serve."]

title: Quick "N" Hearty Mushroom Soup
ingredients: ["1 lb. fresh mushrooms, sliced or 2 cans mushrooms (6 to 8 oz. each)", "salad oil", "1 lb. hamburger", "1 can whole tomatoes, crushed", "1 can (10 3/4 oz. size) beef broth", "2 soup cans water", "2 tsp. onion powder", "1 1/2 tsp. salt", "1/8 tsp. pepper", "1/2 tsp. thyme", "1/2 c. Minute rice"]
instructions: ["Saute mushrooms in a little oil; set aside.", "Brown hamburger, draining off fat.", "Add tomatoes, mushroom mix, broth, water and seasonings.", "Bring to boil.", "Reduce heat and simmer, uncovered, for 5 minutes.", "Stir in rice and cover.", "Set aside for 5 minutes. Makes 9 cups."]

title: Vidalia Onion Casserole
ingredients: ["1/2 c. unsalted butter (room temperature), divided", "4 large Vidalia or other sweet onions, sliced in rings", "1 1/2 pkg. buttery flavored crackers (50 crackers), crushed", "8 oz. Cheddar cheese, shredded", "salt to taste", "paprika to taste", "3 large eggs, beaten", "1 c. milk"]
instructions: ["Preheat", "oven", "to", "350\u00b0.", "Saute", "onion rings in 1/4 cup butter.", "Combine", "remaining", "butter", "with", "cracker", "crumbs. Reserve 1/4", "of", "crumb mixture for topping and layer remaining crumbs into", "bottom", "of greased 9 x 13-inch casserole.", "Spread sauteed onion rings over crumb layer and sprinkle with cheese, salt and paprika.", "Combine eggs and milk and pour over layers. Top with reserved crumb mixture and bake 35 to 40 minutes."]

title: Willie'S Homemade Boiled Chicken And Rice
ingredients: ["8 chicken thighs", "salt and pepper", "2 c. rice"]
instructions: ["Boil chicken thighs for 1 hour and 45 minutes.", "Stir in 2 cups rice.", "Cook, covered, for 20 minutes longer.", "Ready to serve."]

title: Low Cholesterol Pound Cake
ingredients: ["2 sticks corn oil margarine", "2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. baking powder", "3 c. all-purpose flour", "1 c. skim milk", "6 egg whites, stiffly beaten", "1 tsp. vanilla flavoring", "1 tsp. lemon flavoring"]
instructions: ["Cream margarine and sugar.", "Sift baking powder and flour together.", "Add to sugar mixture with milk.", "Fold in egg whites, vanilla and lemon flavoring.", "Bake at 325\u00b0 for 1 1/4 hours."]

title: Vidalia Onion Casserole
ingredients: ["4 medium onions, sliced", "3 Tbsp. margarine", "2 Tbsp. flour", "salt and pepper to taste", "2 beef bouillon cubes, dissolved in 1 c. hot water", "1 1/2 c. bread cubes or croutons", "2 Tbsp. margarine", "1/2 c. shredded Swiss cheese", "3 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese", "paprika for garnish"]
instructions: ["Saute onions in margarine until tender.", "Remove from skillet and place in a bowl.", "Add flour, salt and pepper.", "Mix well and while stirring, gradually add beef bouillon.", "Fry bread cubes or croutons in margarine in the skillet.", "Combine with onion mixture."]

title: Pineapple Cottage Cheese Salad
ingredients: ["1 pkg. lemon jello", "1 pkg. lime jello", "2 c. boiling water or 1 c. water and 1 c. fruit juice", "1 c. cottage cheese", "1 c. crushed pineapple", "1 c. mayonnaise", "1 c. condensed canned milk", "2 Tbsp. horseradish", "1/2 c. chopped nuts"]
instructions: ["Dissolve jello in boiling water.", "Mix other ingredients together.", "Add to cooled jello and chill."]

title: Crock-Pot Mushroom Barley Soup
ingredients: ["1 lb. beef, cubed", "2 lb. fresh mushrooms, diced in processor", "1 3/4 c. barley", "salt and pepper"]
instructions: ["Microwave meat first, or else put in crock-pot and cook until half done.", "Add barley and mushrooms, fill pot to within 1 inch of top with stock or water.", "Cook 3 to 4 hours until barley is done. Season to taste."]

title: Pie Crust(Low-Fat, Low Cholesterol)
ingredients: ["1 1/3 c. all-purpose flour", "1 tsp. salt", "1/3 c. oil", "3 Tbsp. cold skim milk"]
instructions: ["Sift into a bowl flour and salt.", "Mix oil and milk.", "Add all at once to the flour and stir until mixed,", "Using the hands, form the mixture into a smooth ball.", "Roll the dough between 2 sheets of wax paper until it is a circle about 11-inches in diameter. Remove one sheet of wax paper.", "Turn the crust into a 9-inch pan. Remove wax paper.", "Bake in 400\u00b0 oven for 12 minutes or until browned.", "If the crust is to be baked with a filling, follow the cooking directions for the filling.", "Double the recipe for a double crusted pie."]

title: Creamy Pasta With Mushrooms
ingredients: ["1 lb. fettuccine (uncooked eggless variety)", "1/2 c. evaporated skim milk", "1/3 c. fat-free mayonnaise or salad dressing", "1 tsp. minced garlic", "2 Egg Beaters, beaten (1/2 c.)", "2 (8 oz.) cans sliced mushrooms, drained", "1/2 c. fat-free Parmesan cheese"]
instructions: ["Prepare fettuccine as directed on package.", "Drain and set aside. Gradually add skim milk to fat-free mayonnaise and garlic in small saucepan.", "Heat thoroughly, stirring occasionally.", "Remove from heat; blend in Egg Beaters.", "Toss with fettuccine and mushrooms until well coated.", "Add Parmesan cheese and mix well."]

title: Mushroom Garlic Pork Chops
ingredients: ["1 Tbsp. vegetable oil", "4 pork chops (1/2-inch thick)", "1 can cream of mushroom soup", "1 can roasted garlic soup", "1/4 c. water"]
instructions: ["In medium skillet over medium-high heat, heat oil. Add chops and cook 10 minutes or until browned. Set chops aside. Pour off fat. Add soups and water. Heat to a boil. Return chops to pan. Reduce heat to low. Cook 5 minutes or until chops are no longer pink."]

title: Bacon Curry Coleslaw
ingredients: ["1/2 c. raisins", "juice of 1/2 lemon", "4 c. shredded cabbage", "3 green onions", "1 medium red apple, coarsely grated", "6 slices bacon, crisp and crumbled", "1 Tbsp. sugar", "2/3 c. mayonnaise", "1 tsp. curry powder", "1/2 c. salted peanuts"]
instructions: ["Combine raisins and lemon juice; heat gently until hot. Then set", "aside until raisins are cool and plump.", "Meanwhile, finely shred the cabbage, dice onion, grate apple and cook and crumble bacon.", "Combine", "apples,", "raisins,", "lemon", "juice", "and sugar;", "add mayonnaise", "and curry powder to apple mixture and blend.", "Just before", "serving,", "combine", "cabbage, green onion, crumbled bacon, peanuts and mayonnaise."]

title: Mushroom Medley
ingredients: ["1 c. frozen peas", "1 large onion", "2 c. medium size fresh button mushrooms", "2 tsp. margarine", "salt to taste"]
instructions: ["Prepare each vegetable separately to obtain right texture.", "In saucepan, cook peas until nearly done.", "Cover and set aside.", "Slice onion thickly.", "Cut each slice into eight pie-shaped pieces.", "Cook in water until done, but still firm.", "Add margarine; cover and set aside.", "Wash mushrooms.", "Stand on end and cut into quarters.", "Boil hard until done.", "Strain mushrooms and add to onions.", "Add peas and enough juice that mixture can be simmered.", "Add salt.", "Simmer and taste.", "Serve hot."]

title: Indian Black-Eyed Peas And Potatoes
ingredients: ["1 tsp. cooking oil", "1 tsp. mustard seed", "1/2 tsp. cumin seed", "1/2 c. chopped onion", "2 cloves garlic, minced", "1 (15 oz.) can black-eyed peas", "1 large potato, peeled and chopped", "1/2 tsp. ground ginger", "1/2 tsp. ground turmeric", "dash of ground red pepper"]
instructions: ["In skillet heat oil.", "Add mustard seed.", "Cover and cook until seed begins to pop.", "Remove from heat.", "Remove lid, stir in cumin. Add onion and garlic.", "Cook and stir until onion is tender but not brown.", "Stir in undrained black-eyed peas, potatoes, ginger, turmeric and red pepper.", "Bring to boil.", "Reduce heat, simmer for 15 minutes.", "Serves 4 to 5."]

title: Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: ["1 stick butter or margarine", "1/2 c. dry bread crumbs (Italian flavor)", "2 eggs lightly beaten", "1 Tbsp. parsley (optional)", "1/2 medium onion chopped", "salt and pepper", "1/4 c. fresh grated Parmesan cheese", "1/2 lb. bacon (approximately) fried and crumbled", "30 medium mushrooms (approximately)"]
instructions: ["Cut up and fry bacon until crisp.", "Drain and crumble."]

title: Tomato And Pear Chutney
ingredients: ["1 lb. chopped tomatoes", "1 lb. chopped pears", "1 chopped green pepper", "1/2 tsp. mustard", "1/2 tsp. ginger", "1 small jar chopped pimentos", "1 onion, chopped", "1/8 to 1/2 Tbsp. cayenne", "1/2 c. vinegar", "1 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt"]
instructions: ["Mix all ingredients except pimentos.", "Boil slowly for 1 hour, stirring occasionally.", "Add pimentos; boil for 5 minutes more. Pack into jars and seal."]

title: Italian Mushroom Gravy
ingredients: ["1 c. fresh mushrooms", "1 1/2 c. warm water", "3 Tbsp. olive or salad oil", "1 1/2 c. chopped parsley", "2 to 3 stalks celery", "1/2 c. diced carrot", "1 c. chopped onion", "1 c. sliced zucchini", "2 cloves minced garlic", "1/2 tsp. rosemary", "1/2 tsp. thyme", "1/2 tsp. sage", "2 (15 oz.) cans tomato sauce", "2 (1 lb.) cans tomatoes", "1/4 tsp. crushed red pepper", "salt to taste"]
instructions: ["Heat oil in frypan over medium heat.", "When hot, add parsley, garlic, rosemary, thyme, sage and vegetables.", "Cook until vegies are soft.", "Stir in tomato sauce, tomatoes and their liquid (break up tomatoes), plus the red pepper.", "Chop mushrooms and add to pan along with water.", "Can use dried Italian mushrooms with this water as a soaking liquid.", "Cover and simmer until thick, about 3 hours. Add salt to taste.", "Makes about 2 1/2 quarts."]

title: Mushroom Ring Italienne
ingredients: ["1 lb. fresh mushrooms", "1 onion, quartered", "4 Tbsp. butter", "2 Tbsp. flour", "1 c. milk", "4 eggs, separated", "2 Tbsp. chopped parsley", "3 (1/8-inch thick) slices chopped fine hot dry Cappicola"]
instructions: ["Chop mushrooms and onion very fine.", "Saute onion and mushrooms in 2 tablespoons butter 5 minutes.", "Melt remaining 2 tablespoons of butter and mix in flour.", "Gradually pour in milk.", "Stir constantly.", "Combine with mushrooms.", "Cool.", "Add egg yolks.", "Mix well.", "Beat egg whites until stiff.", "Fold into mushroom mixture with parsley and Cappicola.", "Add seasonings.", "Pour into greased and floured ring mold.", "Place in pan of boiling water.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 40 minutes."]

title: Beef Stir-Fry With Mushrooms
ingredients: ["1 lb. beef top round steak", "1/3 c. cold water", "1/4 c. soy sauce", "2 Tbsp. dry red wine", "4 tsp. cornstarch", "1 Tbsp. molasses or honey", "1 Tbsp. cooking oil", "8 oz. fresh mushrooms, sliced (3 c.)", "5 green onions, bias-sliced into 1-inch lengths (1 c.)", "hot cooked rice"]
instructions: ["Partially freeze beef; cut on the bias into thin bite-size strips.", "For marinade, in a medium mixing bowl, stir together water, soy sauce, wine, cornstarch and molasses.", "Add beef, stirring to coat well.", "Cover and marinate at room temperature for 30 minutes or in the refrigerator for 2 hours, stirring occasionally.", "Drain well, reserving marinade.", "Set aside."]

title: Fresh Corn And Tomatoes With Curry
ingredients: ["3 to 4 ears corn (medium size)", "1 Tbsp. butter", "1/2 c. chopped scallions", "1 tsp. curry powder", "4 small ripe plum tomatoes", "salt and freshly ground pepper to taste", "2 Tbsp. fresh chopped cucumbers", "coriander"]
instructions: ["Shuck the corn.", "With knife, cut kernels off cobs.", "There should be about 2 1/2 cups.", "Core the tomatoes and cut into 1/2-inch cubes.", "Melt butter into skillet.", "Add the scallions and curry powder.", "Cook, stirring briefly, until wilted.", "Add the corn, tomatoes, salt and pepper.", "Stir and cook for 4 minutes over medium to high heat.", "Do not overcook.", "Serve hot.", "Sprinkle with coriander.", "Yields 4 servings."]

title: Mushrooms And Steak
ingredients: ["1 1/2 lb. top sirloin", "3 Tbsp. butter or margarine", "1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1 tsp. dried basil", "1/2 tsp. dried tarragon", "3 c. mushrooms, sliced", "1/2 c. dry vermouth (wine)", "1/4 c. Jack cheese, shredded", "1 Tbsp. flour"]
instructions: ["Cut steak into 4 servings. Melt butter in skillet; add Worcestershire sauce, basil and tarragon.", "Place steaks in skillet. Cook 5 minutes on both sides.", "Remove to warmed platter.", "Cover with foil.", "Place mushrooms in skillet.", "Add wine, salt and pepper.", "Saute until mushrooms are cooked.", "In a small bowl, toss cheese with flour and stir in with mushrooms.", "Cook until cheese is melted.", "Pour over steaks.", "Great with potatoes (baked) and salad.", "This is so easy and great."]

title: Marinated Mushrooms And Veggies
ingredients: ["2/3 c. vinegar", "2/3 c. olive or salad oil", "1/4 c. chopped onion", "2 cloves garlic, minced", "1 tsp. sugar", "1 tsp. basil, crushed", "1 tsp. oregano, crushed", "8 oz. fresh mushrooms, halved or quartered", "1 (16 oz.) can whole carrots (may be sliced)", "1 (14 oz.) can artichoke hearts, drained and halved", "1 c. pitted ripe olives, halved", "1 c. sliced celery", "1 (2 oz.) jar sliced pimientos, drained (1/4 c. chopped)"]
instructions: ["In saucepan, combine vinegar, oil, onion, garlic, 1 teaspoon salt, sugar, basil, oregano and 1/4 teaspoon pepper.", "Bring to a boil; simmer, uncovered, 10 minutes.", "Combine remaining ingredients in a bowl.", "Pour hot marinade over veggies.", "Stir; chill several hours, stirring occasionally.", "Drain before serving.", "Serve in lettuce lined bowl.", "Makes 7 cups.", "Great Thanksgiving dish."]

title: Cottage Cheese Spoon Bread
ingredients: ["1 3/4 c. milk", "1/2 c. cornmeal", "1 tsp. salt", "1 Tbsp. sugar", "3 egg yolks, beaten", "3 Tbsp. butter", "1 c. cottage cheese", "3 egg whites", "melted butter"]
instructions: ["Scald milk in saucepan.", "Add cornmeal and cook, stirring constantly until thick.", "Mix in sugar and salt.", "Mix small amount of hot cornmeal mixture with egg yolks; return to saucepan and mix thoroughly.", "Stir in butter and cottage cheese.", "Beat egg whites until stiff.", "Gradually fold in cornmeal mixture.", "Pour into baking dish and bake 35 minutes.", "Serve with melted butter."]

title: Mushroom-Chicken Cutlets
ingredients: ["2 chicken breasts, halved, skinned and boned", "1 1/2 c. dry bread crumbs", "1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese", "2 Tbsp. parsley flakes", "1/2 tsp. garlic salt", "2 beaten eggs", "1 Tbsp. water", "4 Tbsp. corn oil", "1 c. sliced fresh mushrooms", "1/2 c. melted butter", "2 Tbsp. lemon juice"]
instructions: ["Combine crumbs, Parmesan cheese, parsley flakes and garlic salt.", "Mix eggs and water together.", "Dip each chicken cutlet into egg mixture, then into crumb mixture.", "Heat oil in large skillet and brown cutlets on each side until golden brown.", "Remove to flat baking dish.", "Saute mushrooms briefly in same skillet; spoon over cutlets.", "Combine melted butter and lemon juice; pour over chicken and mushrooms.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes.", "Serves 4."]

title: Stuffed Mushroom Appetizers
ingredients: ["7 1/2 oz. can crabmeat", "1 medium onion", "1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese", "1/2 c. mayonnaise", "small pinch each of: rosemary, thyme, salt, pepper, garlic powder", "24 medium mushroom caps (1 lb.)"]
instructions: ["Drain crabmeat; press to remove excess fluid.", "Flake.", "Mix crabmeat, onions, cheese, seasonings and mayonnaise.", "Remove stems and scrape gills from mushrooms with a spoon to make deep cups. Heat oven to 325\u00b0.", "Stuff mushrooms generously with crab mixture. Place in ungreased shallow baking dish.", "Bake 5 minutes.", "Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.", "Turn oven to broil.", "Broil until golden brown, about 15 minutes."]

title: Breakfast Stratta
ingredients: ["8 to 10 slices white bread, remove crusts", "8 eggs", "1 Tbsp. dry mustard", "16 oz. ground sausage", "1 1/2 to 2 c. Cheddar cheese", "1 c. crushed corn flakes"]
instructions: ["Preheat", "oven", "to", "350\u00b0.", "Cook ground sausage and drain off all", "fat.", "Set", "aside.", "Spray 9 x 13-inch baking pan with Pam. Line", "bottom", "of", "pan", "with bread.\tBeat 8 eggs and pour over bread.", "Sprinkle dry mustard over eggs.", "Sprinkle ground sausage over", "eggs.", "Sprinkle", "Cheddar", "cheese", "over sausage. Sprinkle crushed corn flakes over cheese.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes covered with foil.\tRemove foil and bake until brown, approximately 5 minutes."]

title: Alita Darby Arthur'S Classic Pecan Pie
ingredients: ["3 eggs, slightly beaten", "1 c. sugar", "1 c. dark corn syrup", "1 Tbsp. corn oil or margarine, melted", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. pecans", "1 unbaked 9-inch pastry shell"]
instructions: ["Stir together eggs, sugar, corn syrup, margarine and vanilla. Add pecans; mix.", "Pour into pastry shell.", "Bake for 50 to 60 minutes in 350\u00b0 oven.", "Cool; serve with whipped cream or ice cream."]

title: Classic Lobster Seafood Salad(4 Servings)
ingredients: ["8 oz. imitation lobster chunks", "1/2 c. mayonnaise", "1 stalk celery, chopped", "1 Tbsp. chopped onion", "lettuce leaves"]
instructions: ["Mix lobster, mayonnaise, celery and onion.", "Serve on bed of lettuce."]

title: Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: ["1 lb. medium mushrooms", "2 Tbsp. Parkay margarine", "1 (8 oz.) container soft Philadelphia brand cream cheese with chives and onions", "1/2 c. (2 oz.) Kraft 100% grated Parmesan cheese", "2 Tbsp. dry bread crumbs"]
instructions: ["Heat oven to broil.", "Remove mushroom stems; chop enough stems to make 1/4 cup.", "Saute mushroom caps in margarine 5 minutes.", "Mix soft cream cheese, Parmesan cheese and bread crumbs until well blended; stir in chopped stems.", "Fill mushroom caps.", "Broil until browned.", "Makes about 2 1/2 dozen."]

title: Broiled Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: ["1 lb. mushrooms", "1 1/2 c. bread crumbs", "1/4 c. chopped pecans", "1 crushed clove garlic", "1 1/2 Tbsp. chives", "1 1/2 Tbsp. basil", "1 1/2 Tbsp. tarragon", "2 Tbsp. sherry", "dash salt and pepper", "1/3 c. Parmesan cheese", "2 Tbsp. butter", "2 Tbsp. vegetable oil"]
instructions: ["Rinse mushrooms and wipe gently with a paper towel to dry. Remove stems and chop finely.", "Saute stems in butter for 2-3 minutes.", "Add bread crumbs, nuts, garlic chives, basil and tarragon.", "Season with salt and pepper to taste."]

title: Classic Pecan Pie
ingredients: ["3 eggs, slightly beaten", "1 c. Karo light or dark corn syrup", "1 c. sugar", "2 Tbsp. vanilla", "1 1/2 c. pecans", "1 Pet-Ritz deep dish pie crust"]
instructions: ["In large bowl, stir eggs, corn syrup, sugar, butter and vanilla until well blended.", "Stir in pecans.", "Pour into pie crust. Bake in preheated oven at 350\u00b0.", "Bake 50 to 55 minutes or until knife inserted halfway between center and edge comes out clean. Cool on wire rack.", "Makes 8 servings."]

title: Sesame Curry Sauce(Use To Brush Over Chicken, Meat Or Fish When Grilling.)
ingredients: ["1 c. soy sauce", "2/3 c. oil", "1/2 c. honey", "1/2 c. vinegar", "2 Tbsp. sesame seed", "2 tsp. curry powder", "1/2 tsp. pepper"]
instructions: ["Combine in a screw-top jar.", "Shake well.", "Brush over grilled items."]

title: Green Pepper And Mushroom Chili
ingredients: ["1 lb. hamburger", "1 c. coarsely chopped onion", "1 green pepper, coarsely chopped", "3 cloves garlic, minced", "2 cans (16 oz. each) whole tomatoes, undrained and coarsely chopped", "1 can (15 oz.) kidney beans, rinsed and drained", "1 lb. fresh mushrooms, quartered", "2 Tbsp. chili powder", "2 tsp. ground cumin", "1 1/4 tsp. salt", "3/4 tsp. dried oregano", "1 c. Pace mild picante sauce"]
instructions: ["In a large saucepan brown hamburger with onion, green pepper and garlic; drain.", "Add remaining ingredients and bring to a boil. Reduce heat, cover and simmer 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. Makes 8 servings."]

title: Cottage Cheese Loaf
ingredients: ["2 pkg. G. Washington broth", "1 qt. small curd cottage cheese", "2 c. nuts, chopped", "1 large onion, chopped", "4 c. dry bread crumbs", "1/4 c. oil"]
instructions: ["Cook onion in oil until soft and golden.", "Stir all ingredients together.", "Pack tightly into a casserole, greased.", "Cover with foil.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for one hour.", "Uncover the last 15 minutes. Allow to stand for 15 minutes before serving.", "For a moister loaf, use less crumbs. You can also use more nuts.", "Walnuts work well."]

title: Vidalia Onion Dip
ingredients: ["2 c. vidalia onions, finely chopped", "2 c. Hellmann's mayonnaise", "2 c. swiss cheese, chopped"]
instructions: ["Combine all ingredients and spread in a 9 x 13 inch greased baking dish.", "Bake in a 325\u00b0 oven for about 25 to 30 minutes or until slightly golden brown.", "Serve warm with Fritos, chips of choice, or crackers."]

title: Wild Rice Rose(Serve With Lamb Or Chicken)
ingredients: ["1 c. wild rice", "1 c. grated sharp American cheese", "1 c. sliced mushrooms", "1 c. chopped olives", "1/2 c. chopped onion", "1 c. hot water", "1/2 c. salad oil (although I use 1/4)", "1 c. canned tomatoes", "1/2 tsp. garlic salt"]
instructions: ["Soak rice overnight; drain.", "Wash and drain.", "Mix with remaining ingredients.", "Place in buttered 2-quart casserole dish. Cover and bake for 1 hour at 350\u00b0.", "Serves 4 to 6."]

title: Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: ["1 lb. fresh mushrooms", "1 Tbsp. dried minced onion", "pepper", "3 pieces bacon", "seasoned bread crumbs", "Parmesan cheese", "basil"]
instructions: ["Remove caps from mushrooms and chop the stems.", "Cut up bacon and fry with mushroom stems.", "Add onion, pepper and bread crumbs. Stuff mushroom caps with first mixture.", "Place in buttered shallow baking dish.", "Salt, cover and refrigerate.", "Before baking, sprinkle with the Parmesan and basil.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 20 minutes."]

title: Rotini Casserole
ingredients: ["1 lb. ground beef", "1/2 c. chopped onion", "1/2 c. chopped green pepper", "large jar spaghetti sauce", "1/2 box rotini noodles", "1 pkg. sliced pepperoni", "8 oz. shredded Mozzarella cheese", "small jar sliced mushrooms"]
instructions: ["Brown ground beef, onion and green pepper; drain.", "Prepare rotini noodles according to package directions; drain.", "Mix all ingredients together except cheese.", "Spread in a 9 x 13-inch pan and cover with cheese.", "Bake in 350\u00b0 oven until cheese is melted."]

title: Swiss Mushroom Chicken
ingredients: ["4 boneless, skinless chicken breast halves", "1 egg", "1 c. crushed butter flavored crackers (25)", "3/4 tsp. salt", "1/2 lb. fresh mushrooms, sliced", "2 Tbsp. butter or margarine, divided", "4 slices thin ham", "4 slices Swiss cheese"]
instructions: ["Flatten chicken to 1/4-inch thick. In a shallow bowl, lightly beat the egg. Combine cracker crumbs and salt in another shallow bowl. Dip chicken in egg, then in crumbs. Set aside. In a large ovenproof skillet, saute mushrooms in 1 tablespoon butter until tender. Remove and set aside. In same skillet, melt remaining butter. Add chicken; cook over medium heat 3 to 4 minutes. Top with ham, mushrooms and cheese. Broil until cheese is melted."]

title: Cottage Cheese And Apple Pancakes
ingredients: ["4 eggs, separated (yolks optional)", "1 c. low-fat cottage cheese", "1 c. packed grated tart apple", "3/4 c. flour", "1 to 2 tsp. lemon juice", "1 Tbsp. honey", "1/2 tsp. cinnamon", "1/2 tsp. salt"]
instructions: ["Beat egg whites until stiff. Combine all other ingredients in a medium size bowl and mix well. Fold in egg whites.", "Heat oil or melt butter in a skillet.", "When it is hot enough to sizzle a drop of batter on contact, add spoonfuls of batter.", "Fry on both sides until firm and lightly browned. Serve immediately. Serves 4."]

title: Rolls With Gold Medal Flour
ingredients: ["1 c. milk", "2 Tbsp. shortening (Crisco)", "scalded milk (do not boil)", "3 c. flour", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "1 tsp. salt", "1 pkg. yeast"]
instructions: ["Mix", "all with flour.", "May have to add a little more flour but make a soft dough.", "Knead real good.", "Put in a greased bowl.", "Let rise until double in bulk, about", "1 hour.", "Work down and make into rolls.", "Makes 1 1/2 dozen."]

title: Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: ["8 oz. pkg. cream cheese", "1 pkg. large mushrooms", "1 (12 oz.) Jimmy Dean sausage (pork)"]
instructions: ["Soften cream cheese in bowl. Core mushrooms after removing stems."]

title: Vidalia Onion Seafood Casserole
ingredients: ["1 lb. frozen peeled popcorn shrimp", "8 oz. cream cheese", "2 oz. jar chopped pimento", "1 c. chopped celery", "1/2 c. milk", "1 can cream of celery soup", "crushed cracker crumbs (Ritz or Georgia)", "2 Tbsp. margarine", "1 c. cooked rice (yellow)", "1/2 c. chopped green pepper", "2 c. chopped Vidalia onions"]
instructions: ["Saute onions, celery and green pepper in margarine.", "Add pimento, cream of celery soup, milk and cream cheese.", "Heat slowly until blended.", "Add rice and shrimp; mix well.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes.", "Place crushed crackers on top the last 10 minutes of baking.", "(Cover top of casserole with crumbs.)"]

title: Crockpot Chicken And Mushrooms
ingredients: ["6 chicken breasts (boneless)", "1 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. pepper", "1/4 tsp. paprika", "1 3/4 tsp. chicken bouillon granules", "2 c. sliced fresh mushrooms", "1/2 c. chopped onion", "minced parsley or chives", "1 can creamed chicken soup (add about 3/4 can water)"]
instructions: ["Mix salt, pepper & paprika. Rub into surface of chicken, using it all. Place chicken in crockpot. Alternate layers of chicken, bouillion granules, mushrooms and onions. Pour chicken soup mixture over chicken. Do not stir. Cover & cook on high for 2 1/2 to 3 hours or on low 5-6 hours until chicken is tender."]

title: Wild Rice And Mushrooms
ingredients: ["2 onions, sliced", "4 Tbsp. butter", "4 Tbsp. flour", "1 (6 oz.) can broiled mushrooms", "1 beef or chicken bouillon cube", "1 c. boiling water"]
instructions: ["Saute onion slowly in butter.", "Smooth in flour and brown.", "Add bouillon cube dissolved in boiling water and juice from can of mushrooms.", "Let simmer for about 5 minutes.", "Stir in mushrooms and cook until heated through.", "Serve over wild rice.", "Makes 4 servings."]

title: Low Cholesterol Zesty Sausage Casserole
ingredients: ["1 lb. turkey sausage", "1 large onion, diced", "2 carrots, sliced and cooked", "2 ribs celery, sliced and cooked", "1 (2 lb.) can Great Northern beans (not drained)", "1 (1 lb.) can whole tomatoes, drained", "thyme, garlic powder and pepper", "dash of Tabasco sauce"]
instructions: ["Brown sausage and onion.", "Add remaining ingredients and bake in casserole at 350\u00b0.", "Serves 4.", "Sausage Casserole plus a salad makes a fine low cholesterol meal."]

title: Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: ["1 lb. mushrooms", "1/2 c. Parmesan cheese", "1/4 c. melted butter", "1 Tbsp. chopped green onions"]
instructions: ["Remove stems of mushrooms and chop.", "Combine stems, cheese, butter and onion.", "Fill mushroom caps with mixture.", "Place on rack of broiler pan.", "Broil until filling is slightly crusty, 2 to 3 minutes."]

title: Chicken Breast In Mushroom Sauce
ingredients: ["salt and pepper to taste", "6 or 8 chicken breasts", "1 can cream of mushroom soup", "1 can mushroom pieces, drained (optional)", "1/3 to 1 c. milk or cream"]
instructions: ["Sprinkle salt and pepper over chicken; place in baking dish. Bake in a 400\u00b0 oven until brown (if desired).", "Combine soup, mushroom pieces and milk; pour over chicken.", "Reduce temperature to 350\u00b0.", "Bake 45 minutes to 1 hour or until done.", "Makes 6 to 8 servings."]

title: Crab Mushrooms
ingredients: ["mushroom caps", "1 Tbsp. mayonnaise", "3 oz. softened cream cheese", "1/2 tsp. lemon juice", "1 Tbsp. chili sauce", "1 can crabmeat"]
instructions: ["Mix mayonnaise, cream cheese, lemon juice, chili sauce and crabmeat", "all together and fill mushroom caps with mixture. Cook 1 to 2 minutes on High in your microwave.", "Watch carefully!"]

title: Baked Indian Pudding
ingredients: ["4 c. milk", "1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 c. yellow corn meal", "3 eggs, slightly beaten", "1/2 tsp. ground cinnamon", "1 tsp. ground ginger", "1 tsp. salt", "1 c. molasses or golden table syrup"]
instructions: ["Heat oven to 325\u00b0.", "Butter a deep 2-quart casserole.", "Heat milk and sugar in a saucepan over low heat until tiny bubbles appear around edge of pan. Gradually stir in corn meal; cook, stirring constantly, until smooth and slightly thickened.", "Remove from heat.", "Stir in eggs, cinnamon, ginger, salt and molasses (syrup).", "Stir together thoroughly.", "Pour into prepared casserole. Bake, uncovered, 1 to 1 1/2 hours.", "Serve hot as is, or with vanilla ice cream.", "Makes 6 servings."]

title: Coquilles St. Jacques(This Is A Classic)
ingredients: ["1 lb. bay scallops", "2 Tbsp. minced onion", "1 Tbsp. butter or margarine", "1 1/2 c. chopped fresh mushrooms", "1 Tbsp. lemon juice", "3/4 tsp. salt", "1/8 tsp. marjoram", "1/8 tsp. paprika", "3/4 c. dry sherry", "1/3 c. butter or margarine", "1/4 c. all-purpose flour", "1 c. half and half cream", "2 tsp. snipped parsley", "1 Tbsp. butter or margarine", "1/3 c. fine dry breadcrumbs"]
instructions: ["Wash scallops and drain.", "In medium saucepan, cook and stir onion in butter until onion is tender.", "Add scallops, mushrooms, lemon juice, salt, marjoram, paprika and sherry; simmer, uncovered, exactly 2 minutes.", "Drain liquid from scallop mixture; set aside."]

title: Cottage Cheese Quiche
ingredients: ["1 pie shell", "2 c. cottage cheese", "4 eggs", "1/2 c. milk", "1 tsp. paprika", "3/4 tsp. salt", "1 1/2 c. shredded cheese", "1/2 tsp. caraway seed"]
instructions: ["In blender, combine cottage cheese, eggs, milk, paprika and salt.", "Line 10-inch pie shell with caraway seed and your favorite shredded cheese.", "Pour in cottage cheese mixture.", "Bake in 450\u00b0 oven on lowest rack for 10 minutes.", "Reduce heat to 350\u00b0 and bake 20 to 25 minutes longer or until done when knife inserted in center comes out clean."]

title: Stir-Fried Broccoli With Mushrooms And Cashews
ingredients: ["2 Tbsp. salad oil", "1 lb. fresh broccoli, cut in florets", "1 tsp. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 lb. fresh mushrooms, sliced", "2 green onions, chopped", "1/4 tsp. ground nutmeg", "dry roasted cashews"]
instructions: ["Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in wok or large skillet.", "Add broccoli, sugar and salt.", "Stir-fry for 3 minutes or until broccoli is tender/crisp.", "Add remaining oil, mushrooms, onions and nutmeg; stir-fry until added vegetables are tender-crisp, about 1 to 2 minutes.", "Sprinkle on cashews.", "Makes 6 servings."]

title: Cottage Cheese Crumb Cake
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. brown sugar", "1/2 c. butter", "2 c. flour", "1 egg", "3/4 c. cottage cheese", "1/2 c. milk", "1 tsp. baking soda", "1 tsp. flavoring of your choice"]
instructions: ["In large bowl, add the brown sugar, butter and flour. Mix as you would for pie dough. Take out 3/4 cup and set aside. To the large bowl, add the egg, cottage cheese, milk and baking soda. Beat on high speed. Stir in your favorite flavoring such as rum or vanilla. Pour into a 7 x 10 loaf pan and sprinkle the saved 3/4 cup of crumb mixture on top. Bake in a preheated oven at 350\u00b0 for 35 minutes. Fast and easy."]

title: Curry Dip
ingredients: ["1 c. sour cream", "1 c. mayonnaise", "1 Tbsp. catsup", "2 Tbsp. chopped green onions", "1/2 to 1 tsp. curry powder", "1/4 tsp. Worcestershire sauce"]
instructions: ["In a small bowl, combine all ingredients.", "Cover.", "Refrigerate for several hours.", "Serve with vegetable dippers. Makes 2 cups."]

title: Classic Potato Salad
