title: Garden Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: ["1/2 c. dried crumbly style seasoned stuffing, crushed", "1/4 c. butter or margarine, melted", "1/4 c. finely chopped carrots", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "pinch of peppers", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped onions", "16 (2-inch) mushrooms, stems removed"]
instructions: ["Heat oven to 350\u00b0.", "In small bowl, stir together all ingredients except mushrooms.", "Stuff each mushroom cap with 1 tablespoon filling.", "Place in buttered 13 x 9 baking pan.", "Bake 20 to 25 minutes or until tender."]

title: Mama Lassie'S Butter Rolls
ingredients: ["3 c flour", "1 Tbsp Shortening", "1/2 c buttermilk"]
instructions: ["Put flour in a large mixing bowl.", "Make a hole in the middle of flour.", "Add shortening and buttermilk.", "Gradually mix with flour until dough is stiff.", "Roll out thin.", "Cut circles out of dough with a small saucer.", "Cut up 1/2 stick butter or margarine and put on each circle.", "Roll each circle up and place in an iron skillet.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 until golden brown."]

title: Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: ["8 oz. cream cheese", "1 tsp. horseradish", "dash of salt and pepper", "dash of Old Bay", "2 Tbsp. chopped onions", "3/4 c. crab blend", "mushroom caps"]
instructions: ["Blend all the above together.", "Put in mushroom caps.", "Bake until golden brown at 325\u00b0."]

title: Classic Stuffed Shells
ingredients: ["3 c. Ragu Old Home Style", "2 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese", "1 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley", "1 (12 oz.) pkg. jumbo shells, cooked and drained", "2 lb. Ricotta cheese", "1/4 c. Parmesan cheese", "3 eggs", "1/8 tsp. black pepper"]
instructions: ["Preheat oven to 350\u00b0.", "Evenly spread 1 cup sauce in a 17 x 12-inch bake pan.", "In a large bowl, combine cheeses, eggs, parsley and pepper.", "Fill shells with cheese mixture and arrange in a single layer in baking pan.", "Evenly top with remaining sauce. Bake 45 to 50 minutes or until bubbly.", "Serves 8."]

title: Chicken Prosciutto With Mushroom Sauce
ingredients: ["3 whole chicken breasts, skinned, boned and halved", "5 Tbsp. margarine", "1/4 c. onion, chopped", "1/3 c. flour", "2 Tbsp. Dijon mustard", "1 c. chicken broth", "1 c. half and half", "1/4 c. dry white wine or water", "3 jars mushrooms, sliced and drained", "1 c. Swiss cheese, shredded", "16 oz. frozen broccoli cuts", "6 slices Prosciutto or thin sliced, cooked ham", "paprika"]
instructions: ["Pound chicken breasts between 2 pieces of plastic wrap with meat mallet or rolling pin.", "Over medium heat, melt 2 tablespoons margarine.", "Cook chicken until browned (5 minutes)."]

title: Mushroom Soup
ingredients: ["1 lb. mushrooms, chopped", "1 Tbsp. butter", "1 medium onion, chopped", "3 c. chicken broth", "1 can cream of celery soup", "1 Tbsp. flour", "3/4 c. milk", "2 cloves garlic, minced"]
instructions: ["Saute mushrooms, onion and garlic in 1 tablespoon butter.", "Add flour and stir.", "Add milk, broth and celery soup and stir.", "Let cook 1/2 hour and it is ready to eat."]

title: Low Cholesterol Lemon Bars
ingredients: ["1 c. flour", "1/2 c. oleo", "1/4 c. confectioners sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. almond extract", "4 egg whites", "1 c. granulated sugar", "2 Tbsp. flour", "2 Tbsp. lemon juice", "2 Tbsp. grated lemon rind *"]
instructions: ["*If using fresh lemons, takes 2 average size lemons to make 2 tablespoons of grated rind."]

title: Cottage Cheese Salad
ingredients: ["1 small container small curd cottage cheese", "1 box orange jello", "1 (1 lb.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1 can mandarin oranges, drained", "1 small container Cool Whip"]
instructions: ["Sprinkle dry jello over cottage cheese and mix well.", "Add drained pineapple, oranges and Cool Whip.", "Chill for at least 1 hour, then serve."]

title: Curry Dip
ingredients: ["1/8 tsp. garlic powder", "3 Tbsp. ketchup", "3 tsp. curry powder", "pinch of salt", "1 pt. mayonnaise", "1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "2 Tbsp. grated onions", "1 tsp. Tabasco sauce"]
instructions: ["Mix together and refrigerate.", "Serve with vegetables."]

title: Herbed Mushroom Salad
ingredients: ["1/4 lb. fresh mushrooms, sliced", "3 Tbsp. salad oil", "1 Tbsp. lemon juice", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. marjoram", "1/4 tsp. basil", "1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1 tsp. soy sauce", "shredded lettuce"]
instructions: ["Place mushrooms in small bowl.", "Combine all ingredients except shredded lettuce and pour over mushrooms.", "Marinate a few hours or overnight.", "Arrange shredded lettuce in salad bowls; top with mushrooms."]

title: Cottage Cheese Meat Loaf
ingredients: ["1 c. small curd cottage cheese", "1 egg, lightly beaten", "1/4 c. ketchup", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. prepared mustard", "1/2 c. quick cooking oats", "1 tsp. salt", "1/8 tsp. pepper", "1 lb. lean ground beef", "1/3 c. grated Parmesan cheese"]
instructions: ["In a bowl, combine the first eight ingredients. Add beef and mix well. Press into an ungreased 8-inch square baking pan. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 20 minutes. Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese. Bake 10 to 15 minutes longer or until meat is no longer pink. Drain. Let stand 10 minutes before cutting. Yield: 4 servings."]

title: Alan And Nancy'S Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: ["2 pkg. mushrooms", "3/4 c. green and red peppers", "1/2 c. onion", "2 rolled pkg. Ritz crackers", "few dashes of black pepper", "1 stick butter"]
instructions: ["Clean mushrooms; break out stems (set aside).", "Place caps on cookie sheet.", "In large bowl, place stick of butter and melt in microwave for approximately 1 minute.", "Add finely chopped mushroom stems, fresh peppers, onion and black pepper; mix.", "Microwave on High for 5 minutes.", "Remove; add crushed Ritz cracker crumbs.", "Mix well and stuff caps.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 20 to 25 minutes.", "Enjoy."]

title: Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: ["2 lb. fresh mushrooms", "1 lb. bacon", "2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese"]
instructions: ["Wash and cut center out of mushrooms. Fry bacon crisp and crumble into cream cheese.", "Fill mushrooms with cream cheese and bacon mixture.", "Bake 15 to 20 minutes at 425\u00b0 or until mushrooms are slightly brown and bubbly."]

title: Cottage Cheese Salad
ingredients: ["1 large carton small curd cottage cheese", "2 (3 oz.) pkg. cherry jello", "1 small can crushed pineapple, drained", "1 large carton Cool Whip"]
instructions: ["Mix cottage cheese and jello.", "Add pineapple and Cool Whip. Refrigerate."]

title: Mushroom Steak
ingredients: ["1 lb. round steak, cut into serving pieces", "1/2 tsp. pepper", "1 tsp. salt", "1 large onion", "1 can cream of mushroom soup", "1/2 c. milk"]
instructions: ["Brown steak well on both sides.", "Place in casserole for baking. Put a slice of onion on top of each piece of steak.", "Mix soup and milk together and pour over steak pieces.", "Cover with foil.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 1 hour."]

title: India Chicken Curry
ingredients: ["1/2 c. onion, chopped", "1/2 c. celery, chopped", "4 Tbsp. butter", "1/2 c. flour", "2 c. chicken stock", "1 c. tomato juice", "1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1 tsp. curry", "4 c. diced chicken or turkey", "4 c. hot steamed rice", "salt and pepper to taste"]
instructions: ["Simmer onion and celery in butter.", "Add flour; mix thoroughly. Add chicken stock and cook until smooth.", "Add tomato juice, seasonings and chicken.", "Arrange rice in a ring and pour hot curried chicken in the center."]

title: Manhattan Clam Chowder
ingredients: ["5 strips bacon (whole)", "2 1/2 c. onions, chopped", "1 1/2 c. carrots, cubed", "1 c. celery", "2 Tbsp. parsley", "2 c. potatoes, diced", "4 small cans clams (and juice)", "1 (28 oz.) can tomatoes", "1 bay leaf", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. thyme", "1/4 tsp. pepper", "6 c. water", "1 to 2 Tbsp. sugar"]
instructions: ["Cook bacon (leave whole). Saute onions in drippings. Add rest of ingredients and cook until vegetables are tender.", "Add clams. Heat thoroughly. Remove bacon and serve."]

title: Cottage Cheese Muffins
ingredients: ["1 3/4 c. flour", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1/2 c. cornflakes", "1 egg", "1 c. cottage cheese", "2 1/3 Tbsp. sugar", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 c. quick oats", "4 Tbsp. melted fat", "1 c. milk"]
instructions: ["Sift the first 5 ingredients into bowl and mix in oats and cornflakes.", "Beat egg yolk; add fat, cheese and milk.", "Pour liquid mixture into a \"well\" in the dry ingredients and beat.", "Fold in the beaten egg whites.", "Bake in muffin tins in a slow oven at 300\u00b0, about 1 hour."]

title: Don'S Rotisserie Chicken
ingredients: ["1 whole chicken", "1 small green pepper, chunked", "salt and pepper", "1 small onion, quartered", "3 or 4 Tbsp. margarine", "3 strips bacon"]
instructions: ["Put green pepper, salt, pepper, margarine and onion inside chicken.", "Lay bacon over breast area and tie chicken well.", "Put on spit and rub a little margarine over chicken.", "Put on rotisserie and cook on medium or low until well done."]

title: Chicken And Broccoli With Mushroom Sauce
ingredients: ["1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen broccoli", "3 Tbsp. margarine", "3 Tbsp. flour", "1 c. chicken broth", "1 (4 oz.) can mushroom slices with liquid", "1 lb. cooked chicken, sliced, or 2 c. cooked chicken or turkey", "2 Tbsp. chopped parsley", "2 Tbsp. bread crumbs"]
instructions: ["Mix margarine and flour together in saucepan.", "Cook briefly over medium heat.", "Blend in chicken broth, stirring constantly until thickened and smooth.", "Stir in mushrooms and their liquid. Season to taste.", "Place broccoli pieces in a shallow baking pan. Cover with sliced chicken and pour mushroom sauce over all.", "Top with parsley and bread crumbs.", "Bake at 375\u00b0, uncovered, for 15 to 25 minutes or until bubbly and brown on top."]

title: Mushroom Potatoes
ingredients: ["6 large potatoes", "1 can mushroom soup", "1/2 c. milk", "2 Tbsp. margarine", "1/2 c. cheese"]
instructions: ["Peel,", "slice", "and cook potatoes.", "Arrange in glass pan; add salt.", "Cook soup, milk, margarine and cheese until cheese melts. Pour", "over", "potatoes.", "Sprinkle", "with", "cracker crumbs. Bake until mixture bubbles."]

title: Mushroom Caps
ingredients: ["16 medium large mushrooms", "4 Tbsp. melted butter", "8 oz. container whipped or soft cream cheese with chives or add your own chives", "10 slices crisp fried bacon"]
instructions: ["Remove stems from mushrooms and save for other use.", "Clean caps and brush outsides with melted butter.", "Mix rest of ingredients and mound into caps.", "Place onto broiling pan and broil 6 inches from heat, approximately 3 to 5 minutes until bubbling and brown."]

title: Coriander And Mint Chutney
ingredients: ["1 large bunch coriander (Chinese parsley)", "3 to 4 hot chili peppers, to taste (fewer if you do not want it hot)", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 large bunch mint leaves", "8 oz. plain yogurt", "1/2 onion", "1/2 tomato"]
instructions: ["Clean and wash coriander, mint, chili, tomato and onion.", "Put small amounts of each in blender and blend.", "Add yogurt and salt a little at a time.", "Blend until smooth.", "Store in a container with a tight lid.", "Will last approximately 2 to 3 weeks, just stir each time you use it."]

title: Classic Lasagne
ingredients: ["1 medium onion, chopped", "2 cloves garlic, crushed", "4 Tbsp. olive oil", "1 (1 lb. 12 oz.) can tomatoes", "2 (6 oz.) cans tomato paste", "salt", "1/2 tsp. basil leaves", "1/2 tsp. oregano leaves", "1/8 tsp. crushed red pepper", "1 lb. ground chuck", "1/2 lb. ground lean pork", "1/4 c. chopped parsley", "2 eggs", "1/2 c. fine dry bread crumbs", "freshly grated Parmesan cheese", "1/8 tsp. pepper", "1 lb. curly edge lasagne", "1 lb. Ricotta cheese or creamed cottage cheese", "1/2 lb. Mozzarella cheese, sliced"]
instructions: ["Saute onion and garlic in saucepan in 2 tablespoons of oil until lightly browned.", "Add tomatoes, tomato paste, 1/2 cup water, 1/2 teaspoon salt, herbs and red pepper.", "Simmer, covered, for 1 hour.", "Combine beef, pork, parsley, eggs, bread crumbs, 2 tablespoons Parmesan cheese, pepper and 1/2 teaspoon salt.", "Shape into 1/2-inch meatballs.", "Saute in remaining oil until browned; add to sauce.", "Simmer for 15 minutes."]

title: Shrimp Curry
ingredients: ["1/2 tsp. curry powder", "1 c. Kraft mayonnaise", "2/3 c. evaporated milk", "1 1/2 c. cooked shrimp", "2 Tbsp. chopped green peppers", "2 Tbsp. pimento", "1 c. chopped onion"]
instructions: ["Blend curry powder into Kraft mayonnaise.", "Gradually blend in the evaporated milk.", "Add the rest of the ingredients.", "Heat, stirring occasionally.", "Serve over hot cooked rice.", "Serves 4."]

title: Turkey, Swiss And Mushroom Crepes
ingredients: ["1 1/2 lb. turkey or chicken", "Mushroom Sauce", "3/4 lb. Swiss cheese", "6 crepes"]
instructions: ["Lay turkey breast, skin up, on some sprigs of rosemary and oregano and bake in a covered dish with 1/2 cup water. Salt and pepper.", "Cut turkey into 1/2-inch cubes.", "Put approximately 3 tablespoons of turkey and 1 tablespoon grated Swiss cheese in the center of each crepe. Add 2 tablespoons of hot Mushroom Sauce. Roll up the crepe. Add 1 tablespoon Mushroom Sauce over the top of the crepe.", "Garnish with rosemary sprigs."]

title: Crab Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: ["1 large pkg. mushrooms", "4 oz. \"Aloutte\" garlic and herb cheese or other flavored cream cheese", "6 oz. pkg. imitation crabmeat"]
instructions: ["Clean mushrooms and remove stems.", "Flake crabmeat and mix it into the cream cheese.", "Fill mushroom caps with the crab mixture and bake at 375\u00b0 for 12 to 15 minutes.", "Great appetizers for parties."]

title: Cottage Cheese Patties
ingredients: ["1 c. dry cottage cheese", "1 c. crushed crackers", "1/2 c. chopped walnuts", "6 eggs", "1 large onion, chopped", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. sage", "1 pkg. George Washington broth (dry)", "1 c. drained mushrooms", "1 can mushroom soup", "1 pkg. mushroom gravy"]
instructions: ["Mix first 8 ingredients and drop by spoonfuls into oiled frypan.", "When golden brown, place in casserole and cover with gravy made from remainder of ingredients.", "Simmer in oven for 1/2 hour at 350\u00b0.", "Use a 9 x 13-inch dish."]

title: Homemade Egg Substitute(Cholesterol Free)
ingredients: ["3 egg whites", "1/4 c. nonfat milk", "1 tsp. vegetable oil"]
instructions: ["Beat egg whites lightly with a fork.", "Add remaining ingredients and beat until blended.", "Makes 6 tablespoons, equivalent to 2 whole eggs or 1/2 egg substitute."]

title: Lamb And Veggie Kebabs
ingredients: ["5 Tbsp. olive or vegetable oil", "juice of 1 lemon (about 1/3 c.)", "1 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley", "1 1/4 tsp. dried oregano", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. pepper", "1 lb. leg of lamb, cut into 2-inch cubes", "1 yellow squash, halved lengthwise and cut into chunks", "1 zucchini", "1 pt. cherry tomatoes"]
instructions: ["In large bowl, combine oil, lemon juice, parsley, oregano, salt and pepper.", "Add lamb cubes; turn to coat in marinade. Cover.", "Refrigerate 2 hours or overnight."]

title: Happy Hour Mushrooms
ingredients: ["10 (about 1/2 lb.) medium-sized mushrooms", "2 Tbsp. butter or margarine, melted", "4 tsp. butter or margarine, softened", "1 clove garlic, finely minced or pressed", "3 Tbsp. shredded Monterey Jack cheese", "2 Tbsp. dry white or red wine", "1 tsp. soy sauce", "1/3 c. fine cracker crumbs"]
instructions: ["Remove stems from mushrooms and save for other uses.", "Brush melted butter over mushroom caps, coating thoroughly.", "Stir together remaining ingredients until well blended.", "Place mushrooms, cavity side up, on large rimmed baking sheet.", "Evenly mound filling into each mushroom, pressing it in lightly.", "Broil about 6 inches below broiler until bubbly and lightly browned (about 3 minutes).", "Serve warm with napkins.", "Makes 10 stuffed mushrooms.", "Can be doubled, tripled, etc., as is necessary.", "They are so good, they won't last long."]

title: Spinach And Mushroom Salad
ingredients: ["1 lb. fresh spinach or 1 (11 oz.) bag fresh spinach", "2 hard-cooked eggs, finely chopped", "1/2 lb. medium mushrooms, sliced", "4 slices bacon, cooked and crumbled"]
instructions: ["Prepare spinach, tearing leaves into bite-size pieces and placing in a salad bowl. Add eggs, mushrooms and bacon."]

title: Venison With Mushroom Gravy
ingredients: ["5 average size deer hearts or 1-1/2 lb of deer tenderloin", "1 Tbsp. salt or cracker Boy Seasoning salt", "1 Tbsp. Black pepper", "3/4 c. flour", "1/3 c. Pompeian Extra Virgin Olive Oil", "1 (26 oz.) can of Campbell's Cream of Mushroom Soup", "1/2 c. water"]
instructions: ["One 12 inch deep sided frying pan with lid.", "Place frying pan on stove, turn heat on medium.", "Pour in 1/3 cup olive oil while heating.", "Cut deer hearts up into 1 inch pieces.", "Add salt and pepper and flour.", "When oil is hot, place meat in pan and brown. Add one can of soup and 1/2 cup of water, stir.", "Place lid on pan, turn heat down to low and let simmer for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.", "Goes well on mashed potatoes or rice."]

title: Kallaloo
ingredients: ["1 1/2 lb. salt meat, ham bone, pigs tail", "1 1/2 lb. fresh fish", "3 lb. spinach", "2 crabs or 1 corned conch", "12 okra", "1 large onion", "1 clove garlic", "1 sprig thyme, parsley, celery", "1 small piece hot pepper", "2 Tbsp. vinegar", "3 qt. water"]
instructions: ["Boil salt meat until tender in 3 quarts of water.", "Boil fish; remove bones and add to stock.", "Add crabs or conch.", "Put spinach, okra (from which stems and tips have been removed), onion and garlic through grinder.", "Add to stock and boil rapidly about 30 minutes.", "The addition of vinegar prevents the appearance of slime.", "Do not skim while boiling.", "Serve hot with fungi."]

title: Mushroom-Potatoes
ingredients: ["1 can mushroom soup", "1/2 c. grated American cheese", "2/3 c. evaporated milk", "1/4 c. finely chopped pimento", "1 (4 oz.) can mushroom stems and pieces, drained", "4 c. thinly sliced and peeled raw potatoes"]
instructions: ["Mix together in a 2-quart bowl mushroom soup and cheese.", "Stir in milk, pimento, mushroom stems and pieces and potatoes.", "Put mixture in a greased baking dish and top with grated cheese.", "Bake in a 350\u00b0 oven for 1 hour or until potatoes are tender.", "Makes 6 servings."]

title: Creamed Asparagus And Mushrooms
ingredients: ["3 lb. fresh or frozen asparagus", "1 lb. mushrooms", "3 Tbsp. butter", "1 Tbsp. minced onion", "1/2 Tbsp. flour", "1 c. heavy cream", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. pepper", "dash of nutmeg", "paprika"]
instructions: ["Remove stems from mushrooms.", "Wipe caps and slice.", "Saute mushrooms in butter with onion until golden.", "Prepare asparagus (cooked) as usual; cut into 1 1/2-inch pieces.", "Heat 1 tablespoon butter and blend in flour.", "When lightly browned, add cream.", "Heat slowly, stirring occasionally, until thickened.", "Season with salt, pepper and nutmeg.", "Add sauteed mushrooms and onion; keep warm. Drain asparagus; place in dish.", "Top with mushroom sauce.", "Add a sprinkle of paprika, if desired.", "Serves 8."]

title: Pavlova
ingredients: ["4 egg whites", "1 c. castor sugar", "1/2 tsp. vanilla", "3/4 tsp. white vinegar"]
instructions: ["Step 1:", "Beat egg whites until soft peaks form; add 1/3 cup of the sugar and beat until dissolved.", "Gradually add remaining sugar, beating well after each addition.", "When sugar is dissolved, add vanilla and vinegar; beat 1 minute only to combine mixture. Mixture will be thick."]

title: Classic Green Bean Casserole
ingredients: ["1 (10.75 oz.) can cream of mushroom soup", "3/4 c. milk", "1/8 tsp. pepper", "2 (14.5 oz.) cans French-style or cut green beans, drained", "1 (2.8 oz.) can French fried onions"]
instructions: ["Preheat oven to 400\u00b0.", "Combine soup, milk and pepper in an 8 x 8-inch baking dish.", "Mix well.", "Stir in beans and half of the onions.", "Bake 10 minutes; stir.", "Sprinkle casserole with remaining onions.", "Bake 5 minutes or until hot and onions are golden."]

title: Easy Cottage Cheese Salad
ingredients: ["24 oz. small curd cottage cheese", "2 small cans mandarin oranges, drained well", "2 small cans crushed pineapple, drained well", "1 (12 oz.) Cool Whip", "1 (3 oz.) orange jello (dry)"]
instructions: ["Mix first three ingredients together in a large bowl (large enough to hold all ingredients).", "Mix dry jello into Cool Whip in Cool Whip container.", "Then fold into 1st mixture."]

title: Cottage Cheese Salad
ingredients: ["1 c. boiling water", "1 pkg. lemon Jell-O", "1 c. salad dressing", "1 qt. cottage cheese", "1 Tbsp. onion", "1 c. tender celery", "a little salt and pepper"]
instructions: ["Combine the boiling water and Jell-O.", "When congealed, add the salad dressing immediately. Beat until double.", "Blend into the Jell-O mixture the cottage cheese, onion, celery and salt and pepper.", "Refrigerate several hours before serving."]

title: Eggplant Chutney
ingredients: ["2 lb. eggplant", "3 medium onions", "1 lb. tart apples", "2 tsp. pickling spice", "1 1/2 c. vinegar", "2 tsp. ground ginger", "1 tsp. salt", "3 1/3 c. dark brown sugar"]
instructions: ["Peel and chop eggplant.", "Core and chop apples.", "Finely chop onions.", "Put the pickling spice in cheesecloth.", "Put all ingredients in pan, except sugar, and simmer for 30 to 40 minutes. Add sugar and simmer until thick and lustrous."]

title: Savory Mushrooms
ingredients: ["1 Tbsp. butter", "40 mushrooms (medium size), washed, caps whole, stems removed", "1/2 tsp. thyme", "1/2 tsp. rosemary", "freshly ground pepper", "2 c. chicken bouillon", "1/2 c. wild rice", "1 shallot", "2 cloves garlic", "1/4 c. chopped almonds", "fresh lemon"]
instructions: ["Bring bouillon to a boil.", "Add washed wild rice; cover and simmer for 1 hour.", "Remove from heat.", "Saute mushroom caps in butter.", "Mix rice, almonds, herbs and spices and fill mushroom caps.", "Drizzle with fresh lemon juice.", "Bake on cookie sheet at 300\u00b0 for 15 minutes.", "May easily be prepared a day prior to re-heating."]

title: *Chicken Mandalay
ingredients: ["4 whole chicken breasts", "1/4 c. butter or margarine", "1 (10 1/2 oz.) can consomme", "1/2 tsp. curry powder", "1 Tbsp. instant minced onion", "1 tsp. salt", "pepper to taste", "1 (11 oz.) can mandarin oranges", "1 tsp. lemon juice", "2 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1 c. fresh dates, sliced", "1 c. thinly sliced green pepper"]
instructions: ["Cut chicken into chunks or slices.", "In a large skillet, melt butter.", "Saute chicken until golden brown; set aside.", "Combine consomme, curry powder, onion, salt and pepper.", "Pour over chicken. Cover and simmer for 45 minutes.", "Drain oranges, reserving syrup. Combine syrup, lemon juice and cornstarch.", "Cook, stirring, until thickened and clear.", "Add dates and green pepper; simmer for 3 to 4 minutes.", "Stir in orange sections.", "Combine orange sauce with chicken mixture.", "Serve over rice.", "Serves 6 to 8."]

title: Chicken Tikka
ingredients: ["1 (3 lb.) chicken, boned and cut into 8ths", "1 tsp. pulped ginger", "1 tsp. pulped garlic", "1 1/2 tsp. ground coriander", "1 1/2 tsp. ground cumin", "1 tsp. chili powder", "3 Tbsp. plain yoghurt", "1 tsp. salt", "2 Tbsp. lemon juice", "1 sliced onion", "1 Tbsp. tomato puree", "red food coloring (optional)", "3 Tbsp. oil", "1 lemon, cut in wedges", "6 lettuce leaves"]
instructions: ["In a large mixing bowl, blend spices together with yoghurt, salt, lemon juice, coloring and tomato puree.", "Add chicken pieces and coat well.", "Leave overnight or for at least 3 hours."]

title: Chicken Curry
ingredients: ["6 to 8 chicken thighs, legs or breast pieces", "1 onion", "2 tsp. oil", "1 tsp. flour", "1 Tbsp. curry powder", "1 1/2 pt. chicken broth", "3 large tomatoes, quartered", "1 large green mango", "salt and pepper to taste"]
instructions: ["Boil chicken until done; save broth.", "Fry onion in oil until clear.", "Add chicken pieces, green mango, curry and flour until browned.", "Add broth and tomatoes.", "Simmer 45 minutes.", "Serve over rice, if desired."]

title: Curry Dip
ingredients: ["1 (12 oz.) carton 1% low-fat cottage cheese", "2 Tbsp. skim milk", "1/2 c. chopped cucumber", "1/4 tsp. curry powder", "1/8 tsp. garlic powder", "1/3 c. minced green onion"]
instructions: ["Combine the first 3 ingredients in blender and process for 30 seconds.", "Add last 3 ingredients and process about 15 seconds. Contents per tablespoon: calories 9, sodium 44 mg."]

title: Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: ["1 lb. country sausage", "2 eggs", "1/2 c. fresh parsley, minced", "1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese", "1/2 c. scallions, minced", "1/2 stick butter", "25 large mushroom caps", "1/4 c. Parmesan cheese (for sprinkling)"]
instructions: ["Preheat oven to 400\u00b0.", "In a large skillet, cook sausage over moderate heat until it is broken into small pieces and is no longer pink.", "Drain and mix with parsley and 1/2 cup of Parmesan cheese, scallions and lightly beaten eggs.", "Set aside.", "Melt butter in a large skillet and saute mushroom caps briefly, rolling them around in the pan.", "Cool.", "Divide mixture among mushroom caps, mounding it slightly.", "Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.", "Bake in a large lightly buttered pan at 400\u00b0 for 10 minutes."]

title: Marinated Mushrooms
ingredients: ["2 (12 oz.) pkg. fresh mushrooms", "1 (4 oz.) jar pimentos", "1 (8 oz.) bottle Italian dressing", "1/4 c. parsley"]
instructions: ["Drain pimentos and chop parsley.", "Combine with dressing in a large Ziploc bag; add mushrooms and toss to coat.", "Chill."]

title: Cottage Cheese Dill Bread
ingredients: ["2 pkg. dry yeast", "1/2 c. warm water", "2 tsp. sugar", "2 c. small curd cottage cheese", "2 Tbsp. minced onion", "2 Tbsp. dill weed", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1 tsp. salt", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "2 eggs", "4 1/2 c. flour"]
instructions: ["Sprinkle yeast on warm water; stir until blended.", "Stir in 2 teaspoons of sugar; set aside.", "Combine cottage cheese, onion, dill weed, baking powder, 2 tablespoons of sugar and eggs.", "Mix well.", "Add yeast mixture and mix well.", "Add flour to make a stiff dough.", "Knead on lightly floured surface until smooth and elastic. Place dough in greased bowl; turn to bring greased side up. Cover; let rise in warm place until doubled (1 to 1 1/2 hours). Punch down.", "Turn onto floured surface; knead a few times.", "Divide in half.", "Shape into bread pans and let rise until doubled.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes.", "Remove from pans to rack.", "Brush tops with butter."]

title: Cinnamon Sticks
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1 c. sugar", "2 egg yolks, beaten", "2 c. flour", "3 Tbsp. cinnamon", "1 c. chopped nuts", "3 egg whites, beaten"]
instructions: ["Cream butter and sugar; add beaten egg yolks.", "Sift flour and cinnamon together and add to mixture.", "Spread thin on a large cookie sheet that has been lightly greased.", "Press chopped pecans into dough.", "Spread beaten egg white over top.", "Bake 1 hour at 300\u00b0.", "Check after 45 minutes.", "Do not cook until brown as they will taste scorched.", "Cool and then slice in slender pieces."]

title: Mushroom Florentine
ingredients: ["1 lb. fresh whole mushrooms", "3 pkg. frozen chopped spinach", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/4 c. chopped onion", "2 Tbsp. melted butter", "1 c. grated Cheddar cheese", "1/4 tsp. garlic powder", "dash of pepper"]
instructions: ["Saute whole mushrooms in butter.", "Set aside.", "Cook spinach and drain.", "Combine spinach, butter, onion salt, garlic powder and pepper.", "Place in a 10-inch quiche or pie pan.", "Sprinkle with 1/2 cup cheese.", "Arrange sauteed mushrooms over spinach.", "Cover with remaining cheese.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 20 minutes."]

title: Clam Mushroom Salad
ingredients: ["1 head iceberg lettuce", "8 oz. country stand fresh mushrooms", "1/3 c. bottled clam juice", "1/3 c. corn oil", "2 Tbsp. vinegar", "1/4 to 1/2 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. tarragon, crumbled", "Tabasco to taste", "1 c. sliced red onion", "1 tomato"]
instructions: ["Core, rinse and drain lettuce.", "Chill in disposable plastic bag or plastic crisper.", "Clean mushrooms with damp paper towels; trim stems.", "Slice lengthwise.", "Combine clam juice, oil, vinegar, salt, tarragon and Tabasco in large jar or juice container; cover and shake well.", "Add mushrooms and onion.", "Shake to coat.", "Chill.", "Tear enough lettuce to make 5 cups.", "Chill remainder for use another time.", "Cut tomato into wedges.", "Combine with lettuce and mushroom mixture in large salad bowl; toss lightly.", "Add fresh clams to taste.", "Makes 5 to 6 servings."]

title: Lemon, Lime And Cottage Cheese Salad
ingredients: ["1 pkg. lemon Jell-O", "1 pkg. lime Jell-O", "1 (No. 2) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1 c. Hellmann's mayonnaise", "1/2 c. chopped pecans", "2 c. hot water", "1 lb. cottage cheese", "1 small can condensed milk"]
instructions: ["Mix the Jell-O with the hot water; dissolve and let cool.", "Mix with the cool Jell-O the following: cottage cheese, crushed pineapple, mayonnaise, milk and pecans.", "Refrigerate this overnight and you will enjoy it the following night.", "Serves 6."]

title: Manhattan Meatballs
ingredients: ["1 lb. ground pork", "1 lb. ground hamburger", "2 c. soft bread crumbs", "2 eggs", "1/2 c. chopped onion", "2 Tbsp. chopped parsley", "2 tsp. salt", "2 Tbsp. margarine", "10 or 12 oz. jar apricot preserves", "1/2 c. barbecue sauce"]
instructions: ["Combine meat, bread crumbs, eggs, onion and seasonings and mix lightly.", "Shape into medium meatballs.", "Brown in margarine.", "Put in casserole and combine preserves and barbecue sauce.", "Pour over meatballs.", "(Cover dish.)", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 1 hour."]

title: Lentils And Smok-Y-Links
ingredients: ["1/2 lb. lentils", "3 c. water", "2 tsp. parsley flakes", "1 tsp. salt (optional)", "1/4 lb. bacon (optional)", "1/2 c. chopped celery", "1/4 c. chopped onion", "1 clove minced garlic", "2 Tbsp. flour", "1/4 tsp. pepper", "1 (1 lb.) can crushed tomatoes", "1 (12 oz.) pkg. Smok-Y-Links", "1 bay leaf"]
instructions: ["In a large saucepan, combine lentils, parsley, water, salt and bay leaf.", "Simmer until tender (1 hour).", "Cut bacon into cubes and cook crisp.", "Remove; drain off all but 2 tablespoons of drippings or use 2 tablespoons of oil.", "Saute celery, onion and garlic until tender.", "Stir in flour and tomatoes and heat to boiling.", "Drain lentils (if needed) and discard bay leaf.", "Cut sausages into bite size pieces and add to mixture with lentils and bacon.", "Simmer 15 minutes to blend flavors."]

title: Believe It Or Not Cookies(Made Without Flour)
ingredients: ["2 lb. 6 oz. peanut butter", "2 lb. sugar", "4 large eggs", "4 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. coconut", "1 c. finely chopped nuts"]
instructions: ["Mix all ingredients lightly until evenly blended.", "Do not overmix.", "Roll in small ball; put on ungreased baking sheet. Press flat with fork.", "Bake for 10 minutes at 350\u00b0.", "When cool, roll in powdered sugar.", "Makes 100 cookies.", "Absolutely delicious!"]

title: Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: ["16 to 20 large, fresh mushrooms", "1 small zucchini, shredded (3/4 c.)", "2 Tbsp. onion, chopped", "1 Tbsp. water", "1/3 c. Parmesan cheese"]
instructions: ["Remove stems from mushrooms; set caps aside.", "Chop stems. Combine stems, zucchini, onion and water.", "Cook, stirring constantly over medium heat until vegetables are tender.", "Drain. Stir in cheese.", "Stuff caps with mixture.", "Place in 13 x 9-inch baking dish.", "Bake at 375\u00b0 for 8 to 10 minutes or until caps are tender.", "Serve warm."]

title: Pork Chops With Mushroom Gravy(Quick, Easy And Delicious)
ingredients: ["4 to 8 pork chops, trim fat", "garlic salt to taste", "pepper to taste", "1 (10 1/2 oz.) can cream of mushroom soup", "1 (14 oz.) can low-fat condensed milk"]
instructions: ["Sprinkle pork chops generously with garlic salt and pepper. Brown chops in Teflon frying pan.", "No oil added (use a little Pam spray before browning).", "Add soup and milk.", "Stir well and mix into pan drippings.", "Turn pork chops over.", "Cover and let simmer 20 to 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.", "Serve with mashed potatoes."]

title: Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: ["3 pkg. whole fresh mushrooms", "8 oz. cream cheese", "16 oz. sausage, cooked and drained", "1 shallot", "cayenne pepper to taste"]
instructions: ["Dice shallot and mix with cream cheese, sausage and pepper. Remove stems from mushrooms and fill with mixture. Place stuffed mushrooms in glass baking dish. Bake at 400\u00b0 for 15 to 20 minutes."]

title: Chicken In Tomato And Onion Sauce
ingredients: ["2 lb. chicken pieces", "2 Tbsp. oil", "2 Tbsp. butter", "1 onion, sliced", "16 oz. canned tomatoes", "1 packet French onion soup mix", "1 Tbsp. soy sauce", "3/4 c. water", "3 tsp. cornstarch", "1 Tbsp. water (extra)"]
instructions: ["Heat oil in pan.", "Add chicken pieces and brown.", "Remove from pan.", "Drain fat from pan.", "Add butter and sliced onion; cook until tender.", "Add undrained, chopped, mashed tomatoes, soup mix, soy sauce and 3/4 cup water and heat through.", "Place chicken in ovenproof dish and pour sauce over.", "Cover.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 45 minutes.", "Remove chicken.", "Pour sauce in saucepan.", "Stir in blended cornstarch and 1 tablespoon extra water; stir until sauce boils and thickens.", "Pour over chicken."]

title: Classic Pecan Pies
ingredients: ["3 eggs, lightly beaten", "1 c. sugar", "2 Tbsp. flour", "1 c. Karo light or dark syrup", "2 Tbsp. butter", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 (9-inch) pastry shell", "1 1/2 c. pecans"]
instructions: ["Heat oven to 400\u00b0.", "Combine eggs, sugar, flour, syrup, butter and vanilla.", "Blend well.", "Pour into unbaked shell.", "Arrange pecans on top.", "Bake in lower part of oven for 15 minutes.", "Reduce temperature to 350\u00b0.", "Bake 35 to 45 minutes or until center appears set.", "Cool completely."]

title: Basic Chutney
ingredients: ["3 lb. peeled, cored fruit (no grapes)", "1/4 c. minced onion", "1/2 c. raisins", "2 tsp. ginger root, minced", "1/2 c. vinegar", "1/2 c. orange juice", "1/8 tsp. cayenne pepper", "1 c. brown sugar"]
instructions: ["Cook in saucepan on low heat until thick and tender.", "This is do your own thing recipe."]

title: To Make Self-Rising Flour(1 Pound)
ingredients: ["4 c. flour (plain)", "2 tsp. salt", "2 Tbsp. double-acting baking powder"]
instructions: ["Mix all ingredients well.", "Store in tightly covered can or jar and use soon.", "Use in any recipe calling for self-rising flour."]

title: Mushroom Bites
ingredients: ["1 pkg. fresh mushroom caps", "8 oz. softened cream cheese", "1 tsp. milk", "1/4 tsp. thyme leaves", "1/2 tsp. parsley flakes"]
instructions: ["Combine cream cheese, milk, thyme and parsley.", "Fill mushroom caps with cheese mixture.", "Bake in oven at 350\u00b0 for 15 minutes."]

title: Curry In A Hurry

instructions: ["In saucepan, cook the apple, onion and curry in butter until onion is tender. Stir in soup, water and meat.", "Heat, stirring occasionally.", "Serve over rice and garnish with coconut.", "Serves 4."]

title: Chicken And Mushrooms
ingredients: ["1/4 c. butter or margarine", "4 chicken breast halves (skin and bone)", "1 c. sliced mushrooms", "2 Tbsp. minced shallots", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. pepper", "1 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese"]
instructions: ["Melt butter in skillet over medium heat.", "Add chicken and cook 10 minutes.", "Turn chicken; add mushrooms and shallots.", "Sprinkle with salt and pepper.", "Cook 10 minutes or until tender.", "Transfer chicken to platter.", "Sprinkle cheese over chicken; cover and let stand for 5 minutes or until cheese melts."]

title: Something Else Cheesecake
ingredients: ["1 devil's food cake mix"]
instructions: ["Prepare cake mix according to directions.", "Pour into floured and greased 9 x 13-inch pan."]

title: *Mango Chutney*
ingredients: ["6 lb. mangos (about 26 large mangos, or about 12 cups), chopped or put through grinder course", "5 lb. brown sugar", "3 pt. vinegar", "2 c. water", "1 c. ginger, finely chopped", "1 c. onion, finely chopped", "1 doz. small Hawaiian chili peppers, without seeds", "6 doz. whole Hawaiian chili peppers", "3 Tbsp. salt", "3 cloves garlic, finely chopped", "1 lb. seedless raisins, chopped", "1 lb. seeded raisins, whole"]
instructions: ["Combine vinegar, water, salt and sugar in a large pot and bring to a boil.", "Add onions, raisins, garlic and ginger and bring to a boil again.", "Add mangos and chili peppers and bring to a boil.", "Cook for 20-30 minutes until mangos look clear or glassy. Gently stir mixture occasionally to avoid sticking to the bottom of the pot.", "Remove from heat, place mixture in hot sterilized jars and seal immediately."]

title: Macaroni And Cottage Cheese Casserole

instructions: ["Cook macaroni as directed.", "Drain well.", "Saute butter and onion.", "Mix macaroni with butter and onion.", "Mix well.", "Add cottage cheese and stir.", "Makes about 16 servings."]

title: Chicken And Mushrooms
ingredients: ["2 1/2 to 3 lb. chicken, cut in serving pieces", "salt", "pepper", "4 Tbsp. olive oil", "1 lb. small mushrooms or large mushrooms, sliced", "1 small onion, minced", "1/3 c. (part of an 8 oz. can) tomato sauce", "1/4 c. water", "1/2 c. chopped parsley", "6 to 8 oz. vermicelli, hot, cooked and drained (optional)", "1 Tbsp. butter (optional)", "additional chopped parsley"]
instructions: ["Sprinkle chicken with salt and pepper.", "Place oil in a wide frying pan over medium heat and brown chicken on all sides.", "Do not crowd pan.", "Remove chicken as browned and set aside."]

title: String Beans And Mushrooms

instructions: ["Place string beans in boiling salt water.", "Cook 7 to 8 minutes.", "Add drained mushrooms 3 minutes before the end of cooking time, just long enough to heat them through.", "Drain beans and mushrooms.", "Season with additional salt and pepper and a lump of butter, if desired."]

title: Cottage Cheese Bread

Put in warm place and allow to rise 1 hour.", "Stir down and place in buttered 1 1/2-quart casserole. Let rise 40 minutes. Bake 40 minutes at 350\u00b0. While warm, brush with melted butter and salt."]

title: Savory Stuffed Mushrooms

title: Easy Cottage Cheese Loaf

title: Mushroom Appetizers

instructions: ["In a small skillet, saute onion in butter until tender. Remove from heat and stir in shrimp, 3 tablespoons each Parmesan and crumbs, 2 tablespoons sherry, the parsley and salt.", "Stuff mushroom caps with shrimp mixture."]

title: Marinated Mushrooms

instructions: ["Place all ingredients, except mushrooms and wine, in a large pot.", "Bring to boil.", "Add mushrooms and wine; boil 5 minutes. Place in hot jars; cover with the marinated juice.", "Will keep in fridge for about 2 weeks."]

title: London Broil In Ginger And Onion Marinade
ingredients: ["2 large yellow onions, thinly sliced", "1/2 tsp. ground ginger", "1 3/4 lb. London broil (about 1-inch thick)", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. black pepper", "2 tsp. olive oil", "1 Tbsp. red wine vinegar"]
instructions: ["In a shallow glass dish, spread 1/2 onions.", "Sprinkle both sides of meat with ginger, 1/4 teaspoon salt and 1/4 teaspoon pepper.", "Place meat on top of onions.", "Spread the remaining onions on top of the meat.", "Cover the dish with plastic food wrap and refrigerate 1 to 3 hours."]

title: Chicken Panang Curry
ingredients: ["1 (14 oz.) can Taste of Thai coconut milk", "1 Tbsp. Taste of Thai Panang Curry Base", "1 lb. boneless chicken, cut in strips", "2 Tbsp. Taste of Thai seasoning sauce", "2 tsp. lemon juice", "1 medium tomato, diced", "1 yellow bell pepper, diced", "3 scallions, diced", "2 c. mushrooms, sliced", "2 tsp. Taste of Thai garlic chili pepper sauce (use this cautiously; you might prefer a little less)"]
instructions: ["In a large saucepan, combine coconut milk and curry base and cook until blended over medium heat.", "Add chicken, seasoning sauce and lemon juice and simmer for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add remaining ingredients, except mushrooms and garlic chili pepper sauce.", "Cover and simmer for 5 minutes.", "Add mushrooms and garlic chili pepper sauce to taste.", "Cover and simmer for 2 minutes.", "Serve hot with rice."]

title: Mushroom Salad
ingredients: ["1 (1 lb.) box mushrooms, sliced", "8 oz. Cheddar cheese, cubed", "2 bunches green onions, chopped", "1/2 c. oil", "1/4 c. wine vinegar", "3 tsp. Cavender's Greek seasoning"]
instructions: ["Mix mushrooms, cheese and green onion together.", "Then mix the oil, vinegar and Cavender's Greek seasoning for dressing.", "After mixing well, pour over mushroom mixture.", "Serves 10."]

title: Stuffed Mushrooms

instructions: ["Clean mushrooms and cut stems off; fill with cream cheese filling and bake at 350\u00b0 for 25 minutes."]

title: Red Beef Curry(Low Sodium)
ingredients: ["1 Tbsp. vegetable oil", "1 lb. round or sirloin steak, cut into 3/4-inch cubes", "1 Tbsp. minced onion", "1/4 tsp. granulated garlic", "1/4 tsp. mustard seed", "1 small cinnamon stick", "1 Tbsp. curry powder", "1 tsp. paprika", "1/2 tsp. thyme leaves", "3 oz. tomato paste", "1 1/4 c. water or to cover"]
instructions: ["Brown beef in shortening.", "Add all seasoning and tomato paste. Stir to blend.", "Stir in enough water to cover meat (about 1 1/4 cups).", "Cover and simmer until meat is tender, about 45 minutes to 1 hour.", "Remove cinnamon stick.", "Serve over brown rice."]

title: Chicken Curry
ingredients: ["3 lb. chicken pieces", "3/4 c. chopped onion", "1/2 c. chopped celery", "1 tsp. minced garlic", "2 Tbsp. curry powder", "1 bay leaf", "1 c. cubed apples", "1/3 c. diced banana", "1 1/2 c. chicken broth", "1/2 c. heavy cream or yogurt"]
instructions: ["Sprinkle chicken pieces with salt and pepper.", "Melt 4 tablespoons of butter in skillet.", "Add chicken pieces and cook 5 minutes on one side until golden.", "Add onion, celery, garlic and curry powder.", "Stir well and cook 5 more minutes.", "Add bay leaf, apples and banana and cook 5 more minutes, stirring gently.", "Add chicken broth and simmer 15 minutes or until chicken is tender. Remove chicken pieces and stir cream or yogurt into sauce.", "Return chicken to sauce.", "Serve with rice."]

title: Turkish Shish Kebab

instructions: ["Place lamb in a bowl.", "Add remaining ingredients and marinate for at least 3 to 4 hours.", "Cook on skewers over charcoal fire after sprinkling meat lightly with salt."]

title: Cheese Souffle(Recipe Originated With Joanne Hall, Kokomo, Indiana)
ingredients: ["1 stick butter", "1 pkg. Cracker Barrel cheese", "10 slices white bread, remove crusts and cube", "2 eggs, separated", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 c. milk", "1 dash Tabasco", "1/2 tsp. dry mustard"]
instructions: ["Melt cheese and butter in pan.", "In large bowl, break bread. Beat egg yolks and the rest of the ingredients together with bread. Then add melted cheese and butter mixture.", "Beat egg whites and fold into mixture.", "Bake at 325\u00b0 for 40 minutes until browned. Serves 6."]

title: Won Ton Mushroom Ravioli With Mushroom Sauce
ingredients: ["1/2 lb. mushrooms", "8 large green or black olives", "1 Tbsp. butter", "2 Tbsp. virgin olive oil", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "1/4 tsp. oregano", "1 Tbsp. finely chopped parsley", "salt", "1 large garlic clove, minced", "fresh ground pepper", "32 won ton skins", "freshly grated Parmesan cheese", "mushroom sauce (follows)"]
instructions: ["Food process mushrooms coarse rather than fine.", "Pit olives and process finer than mushrooms.", "Heat butter and oil in skillet.", "Add onion, oregano, parsley and mushrooms.", "Salt lightly and cook over brisk heat, stirring constantly 5 to 6 minutes.", "Mushrooms should start to color and onion softens.", "Add garlic during the last few minutes of cooking so it doesn't burn pepper.", "Set aside."]

title: Australian Pavlova

instructions: ["Beat egg whites with electric mixer until stiff and dry. Gradually add sugar until all the sugar is dissolved.", "Mix baking powder and cornstarch together.", "Sprinkle over meringue while mixing.", "Add vanilla and vinegar.", "Beat for another minute. Preheat oven to 300\u00b0.", "Line a cookie sheet with aluminum foil. Grease foil and sprinkle with cornstarch.", "Mark out an 8-inch circle on the foil and spoon meringue into circle, heaping it up in the center as much as possible."]

title: Dalhousie Delight
ingredients: ["beef bouillon", "rice (instant)", "tomato bisque", "kidney beans", "hot dogs, serrated on top of mixture", "cheese triangles (on top)"]
instructions: ["If you figure out what to do with these ingredients, please let Mac know.", "Thank you."]

title: Biscuits With Oil(Low Cholesterol)

instructions: ["Mix together flour, milk and oil until flour is damp.", "The mixture is thick but able to be stirred with a fork.", "Whip mixture with fork for a few seconds.", "Turn dough onto a floured surface and knead 8 to 10 times or until dough becomes firm and smooth. Pat out dough into 3/4-inch thickness.", "Cut with biscuit cutter. Bake at 400\u00b0 for 15 minutes or until lightly browned."]

title: Seafood Curry

title: Curried Chutney Spread
ingredients: ["8 oz. cream cheese", "1/2 (10 oz.) jar chutney, finely chopped (Rafferto or Major Grey's preferred)", "1 to 2 tsp. curry powder", "1/4 tsp. dry mustard", "1/3 c. chopped onion", "1/3 c. toasted pecans"]
instructions: ["Combine all ingredients; mixing well.", "Pack into a serving dish or shape into a ball and roll in more pecans.", "Refrigerate several hours or overnight.", "Serve at room temperature with crackers or garlic bagel crisps.", "Makes 2 cups."]

title: Mushroom Chicken
ingredients: ["2 fryers, cut up", "salt", "pepper", "paprika", "1 cube margarine", "1 c. fresh sliced mushrooms", "4 Tbsp. flour", "1 1/2 c. chicken broth", "1/2 tsp. rosemary", "4 Tbsp. sherry"]
instructions: ["Sprinkle fryers with salt, pepper and paprika.", "Fry until brown in one cube margarine.", "Place in casserole dish(es).", "Brown sliced mushrooms.", "Add flour, broth, rosemary and sherry; cover and bake at 350\u00b0 for 45 minutes."]

title: Creamy Shrimp Curry
ingredients: ["6 c. water", "1 Tbsp. salt", "2 lb. unpeeled medium shrimp", "1/2 c. minced onion", "1/3 c. butter or margarine, melted", "1/3 c. all-purpose flour", "1 Tbsp. curry powder", "1 (14 1/2 oz.) can chicken broth", "1 1/2 c. milk", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 1/2 tsp. sugar", "1/4 tsp. ground ginger", "1 tsp. lemon juice", "hot cooked rice"]
instructions: ["Combine water and 1 tablespoon salt in a Dutch oven; bring to boil. Add shrimp and cook 3 to 5 minutes; drain well and rinse with cold water. Peel and devein shrimp; set aside. Saut onion and butter until crisp-tender. Add flour and curry powder, stirring until smooth. Cook 1 minute, stirring constantly. Gradually add chicken broth and milk; cook over medium heat, stirring constantly until thickened and bubbly. Stir in salt, sugar, ginger and lemon juice. Add shrimp and cook over medium heat until thoroughly heated. Serve over rice."]

title: Mushroom Casserole

instructions: ["Beat eggs.", "Combine with all ingredients.", "Pour into greased casserole.", "Bake, covered, thirty minutes at 350\u00b0.", "Uncover and bake a few minutes longer."]

title: Salmon With Lemon Mushroom Sauce

instructions: ["Saute onion in heated butter until golden.", "Set aside.", "Drain salmon, pouring liquid into measuring cup.", "Add enough milk to liquid to make 1/2 cup.", "Mix together onion, salmon, liquid, bread crumbs, eggs, poultry seasoning, parsley, salt and nutmeg.", "Shape into 4 mounds and place in medium shallow baking dish.", "Mix together 1/2 cup milk, soup, lemon juice and paprika.", "Pour around salmon.", "Top each mound with 3 olive slices.", "Bake uncovered at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes."]

title: Noodles With Mushrooms

instructions: ["Saute first 5 ingredients for 6 minutes.", "Add broth and bring to a boil.", "Add noodles.", "Cook until all ingredients are absorbed, about 7 minutes.", "Serves 4 to 6 as a side dish."]

ingredients: ["1 1/4 c. whole wheat flour", "1 c. oat bran", "1/3 c. brown sugar", "2 1/2 tsp. baking powder", "1/4 tsp. baking soda", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. nutmeg", "1/4 tsp. cinnamon", "1 c. buttermilk", "2 egg whites", "2 Tbsp. oil", "3/4 c. peeled and shredded apples", "Pam spray"]
instructions: ["Stir together all dry ingredients.", "In small bowl, combine buttermilk, egg whites and oil.", "Add to dry ingredients; stir until moistened.", "Add apples.", "Spoon about 1/4 cup batter into muffin pan that has been sprayed with Pam coating.", "Bake at 375\u00b0 for 18 to 20 minutes.", "Makes 12 muffins.", "124 calories."]

title: Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: ["24 large fresh mushrooms (1 1/2 to 2 inch diameter)", "1/4 c. sliced green onions", "1 clove garlic, minced", "1/4 c. margarine", "2/3 c. fine dry bread crumbs", "1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese"]
instructions: ["Wash mushrooms, remove stems and chop enough to make 1 cup. In a saucepan, cook mushroom stems, onion and garlic in margarine until tender.", "Stir in bread crumbs and cheese.", "Spoon mixture into mushroom caps.", "Arrange caps in a 15 x 10 x 2-inch pan.", "Bake at 425\u00b0 for 8 to 10 minutes or until heated through."]

title: Beefy Mushroom Roast

title: Nevada Beans

Worcestershire sauce", "4 Tbsp. brown sugar", "1 Tbsp. dark molasses"]

title: Stuffed Mushrooms

title: Cranberry Chutney

title: Baked Mushrooms

title: Mushroom Florentine

title: "Philly" Stuffed Mushrooms

title: Vidalia Onion Casserole

instructions: ["Saute onions in stick of butter until just translucent. Put layer of cracker crumbs in bottom of buttered 9 x 11-inch baking dish. Top with 1/2 of the sauteed onions. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 to 35 minutes or until casserole is set and starting to lightly brown."]

title: Cottage Cheese Delight
ingredients: ["1 pkg. jello (any flavor)", "1 small container Cool Whip", "1 carton cottage cheese", "1 can crushed pineapple, drained"]

title: Hot Panini Sandwiches

title: Mushroom-Macaroni Casserole

title: Stuffed Mushrooms 1

title: Low Cholesterol Blueberry Muffins

title: Rotini Salad

title: Cottage Cheese Lime Dessert

title: Kurma(Quick Chicken Curry From South Africa)

instructions: ["Combine all ingredients in Dutch oven or large, heavy pan. Bring to a boil; reduce heat to low.", "Cover and simmer for 1 hour or until chicken is done, stirring occasionally.", "Serve with hot rice.", "Makes 6 servings."]

title: Chicken, Mushroom, Green Bean Casserole

title: Seafood Salad With Mushrooms

instructions: ["Rub salad bowl with cut clove of garlic.", "Put all remaining ingredients into bowl.", "Toss."]

title: Chicken Kiev With Mushrooms

instructions: ["Bone chicken breasts and cut in half down center.", "Flatten each fillet by pounding gently with cleaver.", "Be very careful not to break the fillet.", "Next, place a 1-inch slice of chilled butter (2 inches long) in the center of each fillet.", "Sprinkle with salt, pepper and the minced mushrooms and minced parsley.", "Roll up and tuck in the ends so that butter is well enclosed.", "Dip the rolled chicken fillets into a beaten egg and roll in bread crumbs.", "Fry in oil and butter for 5 minutes browning it on all sides.", "Garnish with lemon slices."]

title: Dungeness Crab And Basil Stuffed Mushrooms

Without breaking up the crab too much, add the crab meat to the bread", "crumb mixture and mix until well blended. Refrigerate for at least 1 hour or overnight."]

title: Spinach Florentine Stuffed Mushroom Caps

title: Cottage Cheese Filling For Kolaches

title: Cottage Cheese

title: Mushroom Chicken

(Pour milk into soup can to measure.)", "Place back in oven for an additional 15 minutes or until bubbly.", "Serves 3 to 4."]

Top with cheese and heat in oven until cheese melts."]

title: Hot Mushroom Turnovers

instructions: ["In large bowl with mixer at medium speed, beat cream cheese, 1 1/2 cups flour and 1/2 cup butter until smooth.", "Shape into ball; wrap and refrigerate 1 hour.", "Meanwhile, in 10-inch skillet over medium heat, in 3 tablespoons hot butter, cook mushrooms and onion until tender, stirring occasionally.", "Stir in sour cream, salt, thyme and 2 tablespoons flour; set aside.", "On floured surface with floured rolling pin, roll half of dough 1/8 inch thick.", "With floured 2 3/4 inch round cookie cutter, cut out as many circles as possible.", "Repeat.", "Preheat oven to 450\u00b0.", "Onto one half of each dough circle place a teaspoon of mushroom mixture.", "Brush edges of circles with some egg; fold dough over filling.", "With fork, firmly press edges together to seal; prick tops.", "Place turnovers on ungreased cookie sheet; brush with remaining egg.", "Bake 12 to 14 minutes until golden.", "Makes about 3 1/2 dozen."]

title: Hot Mushroom Turnovers

title: John'S Curry
