title: Chicken And Mushrooms Dijon
ingredients: ["4 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves", "1 1/2 c. broccoli flowerets", "1 1/2 c. sliced mushrooms", "1 can cream of chicken and broccoli soup (Campbell's makes this soup now)", "1/4 c. milk", "2 Tbsp. Dijon-style mustard", "2 Tbsp. margarine"]
instructions: ["In skillet, in 1 tablespoon hot margarine, cook chicken 10 minutes or until browned.", "Remove.", "In additional 1 tablespoon of margarine, cook broccoli and mushrooms until tender and liquid is evaporated; stir often.", "Add soup, milk and mustard.", "Heat to boiling.", "Return chicken to skillet.", "Cover; cook over low heat for 5 minutes or until chicken is no longer pink.", "Stir often. Serve with noodles.", "Serves 4."]

title: Indian Chicken
ingredients: ["8 oz. cream cheese", "2 c. chopped chicken or turkey (this amount can be varied)", "1/2 c. chutney", "1 tsp. curry powder", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. Tabasco hot sauce", "1/2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce"]
instructions: ["Note:", "Small amounts of chopped parsley, onion, celery and green pepper are good."]

title: French Fried Mushrooms (Or Dill Pickles)
ingredients: ["1 lb. fresh mushrooms or dill slices", "1/4 c. milk", "3/4 c. pancake mix (follow instructions on box)", "hot corn oil (in electric skillet or fryer)"]
instructions: ["Dip mushrooms into milk; dip into pancake mix.", "Fry in oil at 375\u00b0 for 2 minutes or until golden brown; drain on paper towels."]

title: Hot Madras Beef Curry
ingredients: ["1 1/2 to 2 lb. round steak, cubed", "1/2 c. butter", "2 large onions, chopped", "2 Tbsp. tomato paste", "6 green chili peppers, chopped (jalapeno or other)", "2 garlic pods, crushed", "2 tsp. turmeric", "4 tsp. chili powder", "1 tsp. ground cumin", "2 Tbsp. curry powder, more as desired", "2 tsp. coriander", "3 bouillon cubes", "1 tsp. lemon juice", "salt and pepper to taste"]
instructions: ["Heat the butter in large saucepan and fry the onions until golden brown.", "Next add green chilies, turmeric, chili powder, cumin, garlic, coriander, curry and tomato paste.", "Fry for 10 minutes, stirring constantly, making sure the masala does not stick to the bottom of the pan.", "Add lemon, salt and pepper.", "In large pan, brown the round steak in butter.", "Add water and bouillon cubes.", "Let simmer for 20 to 30 minutes.", "Mix in the masala sauce.", "Simmer for 2 or more hours, adding water as needed. Serve over rice or noodles.", "This is a very spicy dish.", "You can use more or less chilies to suit your personal taste."]

title: Oyster Or Mushroom Soup
ingredients: ["2 medium onions, finely chopped", "3 Tbsp. butter", "4 Tbsp. flour", "1 qt. chicken broth", "1 qt. shucked oysters or 1 lb. fresh mushrooms, sliced and browned", "1 pt. light cream", "salt, white pepper and powdered mace"]
instructions: ["In soup pot, cook onions in butter very slowly over low heat until soft, but not browned.", "Add flour; stir to blend.", "Add chicken broth and liquid from oysters or mushrooms; simmer 5 minutes until thickened.", "Add light cream and oysters or mushrooms; heat to simmer; do not boil.", "Season with salt, pepper and mace (a favorite colonial seasoning, the yellow outer coating of nutmeg). Makes about 10 servings."]

title: Vidalia Onion Casserole
ingredients: ["4 large Vidalia onions", "Ritz crackers", "butter", "Parmesan cheese"]
instructions: ["Peel and pull onion rings apart.", "Cook in butter in skillet until transparent.", "In a 2-quart casserole dish, add layer of onions, Parmesan cheese, crushed Ritz crackers and pats of butter on crackers.", "Continue another layer, ending with butter on crackers.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 until brown."]

title: Stuffed Okra Curry
ingredients: ["1 lb. small fresh okra with heads removed", "1/4 tsp. turmeric powder", "3 tsp. coriander powder", "3/4 tsp. salt", "2 tsp. chili powder", "1 Tbsp. oil"]
instructions: ["Mix all the spices and salt together; set aside.", "Slit the okra lengthwise without separating all the way through.", "Stuff them individually with spice mixture.", "Heat up oil in a vessel. When hot, add stuffed okra.", "Saute it for a few minutes, then cover the vessel with a lid and let cook on medium heat.", "Stir the okra intermittently to prevent burning.", "May add more oil if needed.", "Cook the okra until done."]

title: Turkey Chutney Salad
ingredients: ["1/3 c. peach chutney", "1 1/4 to 1 1/2 lb. boneless turkey breast, roasted, skinned and chilled", "1/2 c. mayonnaise", "1 1/2 tsp. Dijon-style mustard", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/8 tsp. pepper", "4 large lettuce leaves", "1/3 c. coarsely chopped, salted almonds", "1 (6 oz.) jar marinated artichoke hearts, drained", "12 thin slices cucumber (approximately)", "8 decoratively cut radishes (approximately)"]
instructions: ["Measure 1/3 cup of chutney and drain the syrup into a large bowl.", "Finely chop chutney pieces and combine with syrup.", "Cut turkey into 1/2-inch cubes.", "Add to bowl with mayonnaise, mustard, salt and pepper; mix until combined.", "Divide salad among 4 individual serving plates lined with lettuce leaves.", "Sprinkle each with chopped almonds and garnish with the artichoke hearts, cucumber and radishes, dividing evenly.", "Serves 4."]

title: Crab And Mushroom Dressing
ingredients: ["1 can Stove Top dressing (chicken), make according to package directions", "1 stick melted butter", "1 small can fancy crabmeat, drained well", "1 lb. sliced fresh mushrooms", "1/2 lb. imitation crabmeat (optional)"]
instructions: ["Combine all ingredients in a 2-quart microwavable casserole dish with lid.", "Microwave on High for 2 minutes.", "Stir.", "Cook another minute.", "Stir."]

title: Tomato Chicken Curry
ingredients: ["4 Tbsp. olive oil", "sliced onions", "3 cloves garlic", "1 Tbsp. ground coriander", "1 tsp. cumin", "1 tsp. ginger", "4 cloves", "1/2 tsp. turmeric", "1/4 tsp. cayenne", "1 c. yogurt (plain)", "3 tomatoes, chopped", "1 whole chicken, cut up, or 4 to 6 chicken breasts"]
instructions: ["Saute onions and garlic in olive oil.", "Add spices.", "Remove garlic.", "Fry chicken in spice mixture for about 30 minutes.", "Add tomatoes; simmer for another 30 minutes.", "Add yogurt just before serving."]

title: Savory Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: ["12 large fresh mushrooms", "1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese", "8 oz. cream cheese, softened", "1 Tbsp. olive oil", "1 Tbsp. minced garlic", "1/2 Tbsp. parsley", "1/4 tsp. black pepper", "1/4 tsp. onion powder"]
instructions: ["Preheat the broiler with the rack on the top shelf of the oven.", "Spray a cookie sheet with nonstick spray.", "Carefully clean the mushrooms by wiping with a damp paper towel.", "Break the stems off and then chop them extremely fine, discarding the tough ends. Heat the oil in a skillet over medium-low heat.", "Add the garlic and the chopped stems to the oil.", "Fry until the liquid from the mushrooms has evaporated.", "Remove from heat and set aside until cool.", "Once the stems are cool, stir the cheeses, herbs and spices into the mixture.", "The mixture should be thick.", "Using a little spoon, fill each mushroom top with a generous amount of the stuffing mixture.", "Arrange the mushrooms on the cookie sheet. Bake for about 3 minutes or until sizzling under the broiler."]

title: Chicken Curry
ingredients: ["1 (3 lb.) chicken, cut up", "1 large onion", "1 tin whole tomatoes", "1 apple", "1 orange", "1 green pepper", "juice of 2 limes", "1 small pkg. currants or raisins", "1 tsp. sugar", "2 tsp. brown vinegar", "2 cloves", "2 bay leaves", "1 Tbsp. curry powder"]
instructions: ["Lightly fry chicken, then remove from frying pan, leaving sufficient cooking oil to lightly fry onions.", "Add fried onions and tomatoes to chicken."]

title: Steak And Ale Sauteed Mushrooms
ingredients: ["1 lb. fresh mushrooms", "1 stick oleo", "1 large onion, diced", "1/2 c. cooking wine", "1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "2 beef bouillon cubes", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "salt, pepper, basil and garlic powder to taste"]
instructions: ["Wash and trim mushrooms; dice.", "Boil in water to cover, 5 minutes.", "Drain.", "Melt oleo in pot and saute onions.", "Add mushrooms, beef bouillon cubes, cornstarch and seasonings.", "Mix until dissolved.", "Add wine and Worcestershire and simmer until mushrooms are tender (20 to 30 minutes)."]

title: Cheesy Broccoli 'N Mushroom Bake
ingredients: ["2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen broccoli spears, thawed", "1 (10 3/4 oz.) can cream of mushroom soup", "1/2 c. salad dressing", "1/2 c. milk", "1 c. (4 oz.) Cheddar cheese, shredded", "1/2 c. coarsely crushed croutons"]
instructions: ["Preheat oven to 350\u00b0.", "Arrange broccoli in 12 x 8-inch baking dish."]

title: Karo Classic Pecan Pie
ingredients: ["3 eggs, slightly beaten", "1 c. Karo light or dark corn syrup", "1 c. sugar", "2 Tbsp. Mazola margarine, melted", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 1/2 c. pecan halves", "1 unbaked (9-inch) pastry shell"]
instructions: ["Stir together first 5 ingredients until blended.", "Add nuts. Pour into pastry shell.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 50 to 60 minutes or until knife inserted halfway between center and edge comes out clean.", "Cool."]

title: Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: ["32 large fresh mushrooms", "1/2 c. butter, divided", "2 Tbsp. chopped pecans", "4 chopped green onions", "2 1/2 Tbsp. parsley", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. pepper"]
instructions: ["Wash and dry mushrooms; remove stems.", "Lay caps upside down in greased baking dish.", "Chop stems.", "In skillet, melt 2 tablespoons butter.", "Add mushroom stems and saute.", "Combine stems and remaining butter, pecans, onions, parsley, salt and pepper.", "Mix well.", "Fill each cap with a teaspoon of the butter mixture.", "Broil 3 to 5 minutes until bubbly."]

title: Vidalia Pie(Hot Appetizer)
ingredients: ["1 cup minced vidalia onions", "1 cup shredded Swiss or mozzarella cheese", "1 cup mayonnaise"]
instructions: ["Preheat oven to 350 degrees.", "Mix well; put in greased dish and bake 25 - 30 minutes."]

title: Quick Cottage Cheese Salad
ingredients: ["1 small carton cottage cheese", "1 small box Jell-O", "1 small can crushed pineapple, drained", "1 small can mandarin oranges, drained", "1 c. rice (optional)", "1 small carton Cool Whip"]
instructions: ["Sprinkle Jell-O over cottage cheese; mix well. Add pineapple, oranges and rice. Fold in Cool Whip.", "Refrigerate."]

title: Quick And Easy Chewy Cake(No Cholesterol)
ingredients: ["1 yellow cake mix (Duncan Hines)", "Egg Beaters equivalent to 3 eggs", "1 c. unsweetened applesauce", "1 c. light brown sugar", "1 c. chopped pecans", "1 c. chocolate chips (optional)"]
instructions: ["Mix all ingredients together in one bowl.", "Pour in greased 9 x 13-inch pan.", "(I use Pam spray).", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for approximately 35 minutes."]

title: "Creek" Indian Fry Bread(Tuklegg Sahkmoohlthie)
ingredients: ["2 c. flour", "3 tsp. baking powder", "1 tsp. salt", "1 c. milk or water"]
instructions: ["Combine flour, salt and baking powder.", "Add milk or water and stir all together to make a stiff dough.", "Turn out onto a well floured board and pat down to about 1/2-inch thickness with hands. Cut these into strips or squares with a slit in the middle.", "Fry in deep hot oil until brown on both sides, like a doughnut.", "This bread can be served with the main dish or used as snacking.", "This type of bread is famous for all types of Indians."]

title: Sausage Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: ["1 1/2 lb. fresh mushrooms", "3 to 4 sausages, casing removed", "1 clove chopped garlic", "6 Tbsp. oil", "2 Tbsp. chopped parsley", "6 Tbsp. bread crumbs", "1/4 c. Parmesan cheese"]
instructions: ["Wash mushrooms and remove stems (chop stems).", "In a skillet, heat 2 tablespoons oil, sausages, chopped stems and garlic.", "Cook until lightly browned.", "In a bowl, mix cheese, parsley and bread crumbs.", "Add mixture in skillet with meat and toss.", "Fill mushrooms and sprinkle with remaining oil.", "Put on cookie sheet and bake for 25 minutes in oven preheated to 350\u00b0."]

title: Vidalia Onion Rings
ingredients: ["2 large Vidalia onions", "1 c. sugar", "oil for deep frying", "2 egg whites, stiffly beaten", "1 c. self-rising flour", "ice water", "2/3 c. water", "2 Tbsp. vegetable oil", "4 tsp. salt"]
instructions: ["Slice onions 1/8 inch thick.", "Sprinkle with sugar and add ice water to cover.", "Soak for 1 hour.", "Make batter of flour, salt, water, vegetable oil and beaten egg whites.", "Drain onion rings and dip into batter.", "Fry at 375\u00b0 until brown."]

title: Chutney Cheese Ball
ingredients: ["1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 c. shredded Cheddar cheese", "1/4 c. chutney", "3/4 c. chopped walnuts"]
instructions: ["Combine the first 3 ingredients; mix well.", "Cover and chill at least 1 hour.", "Shape cheese mixture into a ball; roll in chopped nuts.", "Cover and chill until ready to serve.", "Yields one 5-inch ball."]

title: Beef Roast With Mushrooms
ingredients: ["4 lb. chuck, round or rump", "1/4 c. butter", "2 lb. mushrooms, sliced", "1 small onion", "3 cloves", "salt and pepper to taste", "white wine or sour cream (optional)"]
instructions: ["In large, heavy saucepan, melt butter.", "Add meat and brown on all sides.", "Peel onion and stick cloves into onion.", "Add onion, mushrooms and salt and pepper.", "Cover tightly and simmer for 30 minutes per pound.", "Check occasionally for moisture.", "Add a little wine or water if needed.", "When roast is tender, meat juice may be thickened with sour cream or thinned with wine."]

title: Venison With Sour Cream And Mushrooms
ingredients: ["2 1/2 lb. venison tenderloin, cut in 1/2-inch slices", "3/4 tsp. marjoram", "salt and pepper to taste", "1/4 c. flour", "2 Tbsp. shortening", "2 medium onions, sliced and separated", "1/2 lb. fresh mushrooms, sliced", "1/4 c. dry sherry", "1 beef bouillon cube", "1/2 c. hot water", "1/2 c. sour cream", "2 Tbsp. flour"]
instructions: ["Season meat with marjoram, salt and pepper.", "Dredge meat in 1/4 cup flour.", "Heat shortening in", "a large skillet.", "Brown meat quickly on both sides.", "Remove.", "Reduce heat.", "Saute onions and mushrooms until onions are tender.", "Add sherry, bouillon cube and water and stir well.", "Return meat to gravy and continue cooking until meat is medium rate.", "Combine sour cream and flour.", "Stir into pan and heat, stirring until gravy thickens (add more sherry if too thick).", "Do not let gravy boil.", "Serves 4."]

title: Cranberry-Cherry Relish(Chutney-Like Condiment)
ingredients: ["2 c. firmly packed dark brown sugar", "1 1/2 c. raisins", "1 orange (unpeeled), cut into 1/4 inch pieces", "1 lemon (unpeeled), cut into 1/4 inch pieces", "1 c. canned pitted dark sweet cherries, drained", "1/2 c. distilled white vinegar", "1/2 cinnamon stick", "1/2 tsp. ground cinnamon", "1/2 tsp. ground cloves", "1/2 tsp. ground nutmeg", "1 1/2 c. fresh cranberries"]
instructions: ["Combine all ingredients except cranberries in heavy large saucepan.", "Bring mixture to boil over medium heat, stirring frequently.", "Reduce heat and simmer 10 minutes.", "Add cranberries and simmer until they begin to pop, about 5 minutes more.", "Remove cinnamon stick.", "Cover and refrigerate until cold.", "Can be prepared 1 week ahead of time.", "Makes about 4 cups."]

title: Polynesian Shrimp Curry
ingredients: ["2 c. milk", "1 (3 1/2 oz.) can flaked coconut", "1 lb. unpeeled medium size fresh shrimp", "1 (15 1/4 oz.) can pineapple chunks, drained", "1/2 c. butter or margarine, melted and divided", "1 tsp. curry powder", "1/3 c. chopped green onions", "1/3 c. chopped celery", "1/2 c. all-purpose flour", "1/2 tsp. garlic salt", "1 1/4 c. chicken broth", "hot cooked rice"]
instructions: ["Combine milk and coconut in small saucepan; bring to boil. Reduce heat and simmer 2 minutes.", "Strain mixture; set milk and coconut aside.", "Peel and devein shrimp.", "Saute shrimp and pineapple chunks in 1/4 cup butter in large skillet 3 to 5 minutes or until shrimp turn pink, stirring frequently.", "Drain shrimp mixture and discard liquid.", "Set shrimp mixture aside.", "Combine remaining 1/4 cup butter and curry powder in large skillet; cook over low heat, stirring constantly, 2 minutes.", "Add green onions and celery; cook, stirring constantly until crisp-tender.", "Combine flour and garlic salt; add to onion mixture.", "Cook 1 minute, stirring constantly.", "Gradually add reserved coconut milk and chicken broth; cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until thickened and bubbly.", "Stir in shrimp mixture and reserved coconut.", "Serve over rice.", "Yield:", "4 servings."]

title: Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: ["20 medium mushrooms (fresh)", "1/3 c. crushed bread crumbs", "1 lb. ground sausage", "Parmesan cheese"]
instructions: ["Wash and cap mushrooms.", "Use stems for another sauce or gravy; you do not use them.", "Stuff the caps with the ground sausage. Sprinkle with bread crumbs, then the cheese.", "Place in middle of oven and broil for 10 to 15 minutes, until meat is brown.", "Serve warm."]

title: Marinated Mushrooms
ingredients: ["1 lb. mushrooms", "1/4 c. lemon juice", "1/2 c. olive or vegetable oil", "1/4 c. snipped parsley", "3/4 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. freshly ground pepper", "2 green onions with tops, thinly sliced", "1 clove garlic, finely chopped", "paprika", "parsley sprigs"]
instructions: ["Cut mushrooms into 1/8-inch slices.", "Mix mushrooms and lemon juice in 1 1/2-quart bowl.", "Stir in oil, 1/4 cup parsley, salt, pepper, onions and garlic; toss.", "Cover and refrigerate, stirring occasionally at least 3 hours.", "Garnish with parsley before serving."]

title: Marinated Mushrooms
ingredients: ["1 pkg. Good Season's Italian salad dressing", "1/2 c. vegetable oil", "1/4 c. vinegar", "1/4 tsp. garlic powder", "2 (4oz.) jars of button mushrooms, drained", "1 small onion"]
instructions: ["Prepare Italian dressing as directed on package.", "Slice onion in thin slices and separate slices.", "In a pint size jar, alternate layers of mushrooms and onions and sprinkle with garlic powder. Pour Italian dressing", "over", "the mushroom/onion mixture and refrigerate at least", "8 hours.", "Shake often to mix spices.", "Makes one pint jar."]

title: Smothered Steak And Mushrooms
ingredients: ["2 lb. round steak", "flour", "oil", "salt and pepper", "1 onion, cut into 1/8's", "1/4 to 1/2 lb. mushrooms, sliced", "sliced potatoes (optional)", "2 (10 1/2 oz.) cans cream of mushroom soup"]
instructions: ["Cut steak into individual portion sizes.", "Dredge in flour and brown in oil.", "Salt and pepper to taste.", "In same skillet or in a roasting pan, lay meat on bottom; top with onion and mushrooms. Add potato slices, if you like.", "Top with soup.", "Cover and cook at 300\u00b0 for 2 1/2 hours or simmer on low in covered skillet.", "Serves 4."]

title: Spice Squares(Low Cholesterol)
ingredients: ["1 c. dark brown sugar", "1 c. water", "1 c. raisins", "1/3 c. oil", "1 tsp. soda", "1 Tbsp. warm water", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "1/4 tsp. cloves", "1/4 tsp. nutmeg", "1/4 tsp. salt", "2 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 c. nuts"]
instructions: ["Combine the first 3 ingredients.", "Boil 3 minutes in pan large enough to mix everything.", "Cool, then add oil.", "Mix together the soda and 1 tablespoon warm water.", "Add to first mixture.", "Sift together the dry ingredients; add walnuts.", "Mix all with wooden spoon right in pan.", "Bake 30 to 35 minutes in a 9 x 13-inch pan at 350\u00b0.", "Sprinkle with confectioners sugar when cool."]

title: Khajur Ki Chutney
ingredients: ["50 gm pitted dates", "15 gm seedless raisins", "1 tsp. zeera powder", "1 tsp. chili powder", "1 heaping tsp. tamarind concentrate OR 3 Tbsp. lemon juice", "125 ml water", "3/4 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. soft brown sugar"]
instructions: ["Put all the ingredients in a blender and mix well. Sieve and throw out the residue. Serve the strained chutney with kababs, tikkas."]

title: Chutney Salad
ingredients: ["1/2 c. mayonnaise", "1/4 c. Major Grey chutney", "1/2 tsp. curry powder", "2 tsp. lime peel, grated", "1/4 c. fresh lime juice", "1/2 tsp. salt", "4 c. diced chicken breast", "1 small pkg. fresh pineapple cubes", "1/4 c. thinly sliced green onion", "1/2 c. sliced celery", "1/2 c. slivered almonds, toasted"]
instructions: ["Mix mayonnaise, chutney, curry powder, lime peel, lime juice and salt and let stand in refrigerator.", "Cut pineapple in small pieces and drain thoroughly."]

title: Chicken With Mushrooms And Sour Cream
ingredients: ["2 boneless chicken breasts", "3 Tbsp. butter or margarine", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped scallions", "1 tsp. salt", "1 can condensed cream of mushroom soup", "1 can sliced mushrooms", "1/4 c. water", "1/2 c. dairy sour cream", "hot cooked white rice"]
instructions: ["Cut each chicken breast into 1/2-inch strips.", "Melt butter in large skillet over high heat.", "Add chicken and scallions sprinkled with salt.", "Cook chicken strips until lightly browned.", "Add undiluted mushroom soup, sliced mushrooms with liquid and 1/4 cup water.", "Heat to boiling, stirring until smooth.", "Reduce heat and add sour cream.", "Do not boil.", "Serve over hot cooked rice.", "Yields 4 servings."]

title: Portobello Mushroom, Tomato And Basil Sandwich(Heart Healthy)
ingredients: ["3 oz. olive oil", "12 oz. portobello mushrooms, sliced 1/2-inch thick", "1 Tbsp. balsamic vinegar", "1 garlic clove, minced", "8 tomatoes, sliced", "12 basil leaves", "salt", "pepper", "1 loaf French bread"]
instructions: ["Heat 2 tablespoons of the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the mushrooms and saut until brown and juicy, about 10 minutes."]

title: Crab Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: ["1 1/2 lb. large fresh mushrooms", "1 c. crabmeat (fresh or canned)", "1/4 c. fine bread crumbs", "1 Tbsp. minced onion", "1 Tbsp. minced parsley", "1 tsp. salt", "1 egg, slightly beaten", "Parmesan cheese (optional)", "paprika (optional)"]
instructions: ["Wash and stem mushrooms and set on paper towels to drain.", "Mix remaining ingredients well (except cheese or paprika) in small mixing bowl.", "Use to stuff mushroom caps.", "Place in buttered glass baking dish and sprinkle with either Parmesan cheese or paprika. Bake at 350\u00b0 for about 15 to 20 minutes or until hot and bubbly. May microwave on High for 5 minutes, turning after 2 1/2 minutes cooking time.", "Serve immediately.", "Serves 10 to 12."]

title: Low-Fat, Low Cholesterol Chocolate Chip Cookies That Really Taste
ingredients: ["1/4 c. margarine", "1/4 c. low-fat cream cheese", "3/4 c. granulated sugar", "3/4 c. packed light brown sugar", "2 Egg Beaters eggs", "1 1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 tsp. butter flavor", "2 1/4 c. all-purpose flour", "1 1/2 tsp. baking soda", "6 oz. semi-sweet mini morsels"]
instructions: ["Soften margarine and cream cheese, then combine in mixing bowl.", "Add sugars and beat thoroughly.", "Add vanilla, butter flavor and Egg Beaters.", "Mix well.", "In separate bowl, combine flour and baking soda; stir these together with a fork.", "Add flour mixture to dough a little at a time.", "After all the flour is mixed in, add the mini morsels.", "The little chips go a long way.", "Spray cookie pan with nonstick spray and drop dough onto pan in rounded teaspoonfuls.", "Bake 9 to 11 minutes at 350\u00b0.", "Cool on rack."]

title: Mushroom Crust Quiche
ingredients: ["5 Tbsp. margarine", "1/2 c. finely crushed crackers", "2 c. shredded Jack or Swiss cheese", "1/4 tsp. cayenne", "1/2 lb. mushrooms, chopped", "3/4 c. cottage cheese", "3 eggs", "1/4 tsp. paprika"]
instructions: ["Melt 3 tablespoons margarine.", "Add mushrooms and cook until limp.", "Stir in crackers, then turn mixture into a well-greased 9-inch pie plate.", "Press mixture evenly over pan bottom and up the sides.", "In the same frying pan, melt remaining 2 tablespoons margarine.", "Add onion and cook until limp.", "Spread onion over mushroom crust; sprinkle evenly with cheese."]

title: Beef And Vegetable Kebabs
ingredients: ["1 large green pepper", "12 to 14 spring onions", "5 Tbsp. corn oil", "3/4 tsp. salt", "1 lb. meat", "4 zucchini or yellow squash", "12 to 14 fresh mushrooms", "2 1/2 Tbsp. lemon juice", "3/4 tsp. black pepper"]
instructions: ["Cut the green pepper in half.", "Remove and discard the core and seeds.", "Cut the pepper flesh into 1-inch pieces with a sharp knife."]

title: Easy Mushroom Rice
ingredients: ["1 c. uncooked long grain rice", "1 (10.5 oz.) can condensed French onion soup", "1 (10.5 oz.) can beef broth", "1 (4 oz.) can sliced mushrooms, drained", "1/2 c. butter"]
instructions: ["Preheat oven to 350\u00b0. Combine rice, onion soup, beef broth, mushrooms and butter in an 8 x 8-inch casserole dish. Bake for 60 minutes."]

title: Tofu Mushroom Loaf
ingredients: ["1/2 onion, chopped", "2 Tbsp. oil", "1 c. mushrooms", "2 cloves garlic, minced", "1 block tofu, crumbled", "1/4 c. chopped green chilies", "1 tsp. salt", "2 Tbsp. soy sauce", "2 Tbsp. oil", "2 eggs, slightly beaten", "1 c. whole wheat bread crumbs"]
instructions: ["Saute onion, garlic and mushrooms in oil.", "In large bowl, mix remaining ingredients.", "Add the onion-mushroom mixture to the tofu mixture.", "Fold gently and spoon into oiled loaf pan.", "Top with 1/2 cup grated Monterey Jack cheese.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes. Serves 6."]

title: Mushroom Stuffing
ingredients: ["2 (12 oz.) pkg. fresh mushrooms, sliced", "1 c. mayonnaise", "2/3 box Pepperidge Farm zesty Italian croutons", "2/3 box Pepperidge Farm onion and garlic croutons", "2 cans cream of mushroom soup, undiluted", "2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese", "1 1/4 sticks margarine or butter", "1/2 c. chopped onion", "1/2 c. chopped celery"]
instructions: ["Saute onion and celery in the margarine or butter.", "Drain and and retain margarine for later.", "(Note - Cherie's Gourmet Tip: Microwave may be used to saute the onion and celery.)"]

title: Gold Medal Banana Cake
ingredients: ["1/2 c. shortening", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "2 eggs", "2 c. flour", "3/4 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/4 c. sour cream", "3 c. bananas", "1/2 tsp. baking powder"]
instructions: ["Melt shortening, add beaten eggs and sugar.", "Sift flour, baking powder, soda, salt and add to mixture.", "Add vanilla and bananas; mix well.", "Pour mixture into a tube pan and bake at 350\u00b0 until done.", "Test with toothpick."]

title: Seasoned Flour
ingredients: ["2 c. whole wheat flour", "1 c. white flour", "3/4 c. corn meal", "2 Tbsp. salt", "1 Tbsp. celery salt", "1 Tbsp. pepper", "1/2 tsp. oregano or marjoram", "2 Tbsp. dry mustard", "4 Tbsp. paprika", "3 Tbsp. Accent", "1/2 tsp. ginger", "1/2 tsp. thyme", "1/2 tsp. sweet basil"]
instructions: ["Mix all ingredients together and store in tightly closed jar. Delicious and convenient to keep on hand for dredging any kind of meat or fish.", "Good for stew meat, Swiss steak, cutlets and pork chops."]

title: Cottage Cheese Rolls
ingredients: ["2 pkg. yeast", "1/2 c. water", "1 tsp. sugar", "2 c. cottage cheese", "1/4 c. sugar", "2 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. baking soda", "2 eggs", "5 c. flour"]
instructions: ["Dissolve yeast and 1 teaspoon sugar in water.", "Heat cottage cheese, 1/4 cup sugar and salt until warm, not hot.", "Combine flour and soda in a large bowl.", "Add heated mixture and eggs.", "Knead until thoroughly mixed.", "Let rise until double.", "Punch down. Shape into 2-inch balls and place 1 inch apart in a greased pan. Let rise 30 minutes.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 20 to 25 minutes."]

title: Brandied Steak Mushrooms
ingredients: ["3 lb. fresh mushrooms, sliced lengthwise", "1 stick butter", "seasoning salt", "1/4 c. Worcestershire sauce", "1/2 c. brandy"]
instructions: ["In a large skillet, saute the mushrooms in the butter until brown. Sprinkle with the", "seasoning salt. Add Worcestershire sauce and simmer until almost all of the sauce is absorbed. Add the brandy and continue to simmer until the mushrooms are tender. Great with steak or roast."]

title: Mince Curry With Peas(Ground Beef)
ingredients: ["500 g steak, minced", "30 ml oil", "2 large onions, sliced", "1 large tomato, grated", "10 ml crushed green ginger", "5 ml crushed garlic", "3 pieces stick cinnamon", "5 cardamon seeds, slightly bruised", "3 whole cloves", "10 ml roasted marsala", "5 ml borrie turmeric", "5 ml ground cumin", "5 ml ground coriander", "2 potatoes, peeled and quartered", "250 ml frozen peas"]
instructions: ["Heat oil and cook onions until transparent. Add tomatoes; cook 10 minutes. Add all spices and simmer for 15 minutes.", "Crumble beef into sauce, stirring. Cook, covered, for 20 minutes. Add potatoes and cook until almost tender, about 15 minutes. Add frozen peas. Cook for 10 more minutes.", "Serve over rice."]

title: Mushroom Hors D'Oeuvres
ingredients: ["36 medium sized mushrooms", "1/4 c. minced green pepper", "2 Tbsp. pimento", "1/4 c. minced green onions", "1 1/2 c. soft bread crumbs (3 slices)", "3/4 c. Monterey Jack cheese, grated", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. thyme", "1/4 tsp. turmeric", "1/4 tsp. pepper"]
instructions: ["Remove stems from mushrooms and chop.", "Saute stems, green pepper, pimento and onions in 3 tablespoons butter or margarine; remove from heat and add bread crumbs, cheese and spices.", "Mix well.", "Melt 1 tablespoon butter in a 9 x 13-inch pan.", "Stuff mushrooms and bake in a 350\u00b0 oven for 15 minutes."]

title: Hot Broccoli And Mushroom Dip
ingredients: ["1 stick margarine", "1 can mushrooms", "1 can cream of mushroom soup", "3 rolls garlic cheese", "1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped broccoli"]
instructions: ["Melt margarine in skillet.", "Add mushroom soup, garlic cheese and broccoli.", "Heat until cheese melts and becomes bubbly.", "Pour hot mixture into fondue pot to keep warm while serving."]

title: Green Beans With Mushrooms
ingredients: ["1 (14 1/2 oz.) can green beans", "1 small can mushrooms, drained", "1 tsp. margarine", "1 Tbsp. beef bouillon granules", "1/4 c. water"]
instructions: ["Drain excess liquid from green beans. Fill the can with enough water to cover the green beans and drain again. Open can of mushrooms and drain. Heat margarine in small frying pan. Add beans and mushrooms and saut. Add bouillon and water. Cover pan and cook until dry."]

title: Spaghetti With Mushrooms
ingredients: ["7 oz. uncooked spaghetti", "5 oz. mushrooms (2 c.)", "2 Tbsp. butter", "2 Tbsp. flour", "2 Tbsp. lemon juice", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. pepper", "2 c. milk", "3 Tbsp. snipped parsley"]
instructions: ["Cook spaghetti as directed on package.", "Cook and stir mushrooms in butter in 3-quart saucepan over medium heat until tender."]

title: Garden Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: ["1/2 c. dried, crumbly style herb seasoned stuffing, crushed", "1/4 c. butter, melted", "1/4 c. finely chopped carrot", "1/4 c. finely chopped green pepper", "pinch of pepper", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped onion", "16 (2-inch) mushrooms (stems removed)"]
instructions: ["Heat oven to 350\u00b0.", "In small bowl, stir all ingredients except mushrooms.", "Stuff each mushroom cap with 1 tablespoon of filling. Place in buttered 13 x 9-inch baking pan.", "Bake for 20 to 25 minutes or until tender.", "Makes 16 appetizers."]

title: Rabbit With Herbs And Mushrooms
ingredients: ["1 rabbit, dressed", "4 Tbsp. butter or margarine", "2 Tbsp. chopped parsley", "1 Tbsp. chopped chives", "2 Tbsp. flour", "1 c. white wine", "2 cloves garlic, sliced", "1 tsp. thyme", "salt and pepper", "1 can mushrooms, drained"]
instructions: ["Cut up the rabbit into serving size pieces.", "Saute in butter until browned on all sides.", "Mix parsley and chives with 2 tablespoons butter with a fork.", "Sprinkle rabbit with flour, cook 1 minute while stirring.", "Add wine, butter and herb mixture, 1 cup water, garlic, thyme, 1 teaspoon salt and 1/4 teaspoon pepper. Bring to a boil, cover and simmer 1 hour over low heat.", "Add mushrooms and simmer about 10 more minutes."]

title: Mushroom Gravy
ingredients: ["1 Tbsp. vegetable oil", "2 1/2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 clove garlic, minced", "1 c. thinly sliced white mushrooms", "1 Tbsp. all-purpose flour", "1 c. low-fat milk", "salt and pepper to taste"]
instructions: ["Heat 1 teaspoon oil in medium skillet over medium heat.", "Add onion and garlic.", "Cook until softened (2 minutes).", "Stir in mushrooms.", "Cook until browned (about 5 minutes).", "Remove mushroom mixture from skillet and set aside.", "Place the remaining oil and flour in skillet.", "Stir to mix.", "Turn heat to low and cook, stirring constantly, until flour turns deep brown.", "Still stirring, gradually add milk.", "Cook until mixture thickens (about 4 minutes).", "Stir in the mushroom mixture.", "Add salt and pepper. Serve immediately! Serves 4."]

title: Curry Chicken
ingredients: ["2 chickens, cut up and skinned", "1/2 lb. mushrooms, sliced", "1 bay leaf", "1 1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. pepper", "1 1/2 c. rice", "1 garlic, minced", "1 1/2 tsp. curry powder", "dash of cayenne", "3 c. boiling chicken broth or bouillon"]
instructions: ["Combine all ingredients except the chicken pieces in a casserole or roaster.", "Mix thoroughly to blend spices.", "Add chicken.", "Cover and bake at 350\u00b0 for one hour or until chicken and rice are tender and liquid is absorbed."]

title: Mushroom Roll-Ups
ingredients: ["2 lb. fresh mushrooms, diced", "1 c. butter", "3/4 c. flour", "1 Tbsp. salt", "1 tsp. Accent", "4 c. light cream", "2 1/2 Tbsp. minced chives", "4 tsp. lemon juice", "4 sandwich loaves white bread, trimmed"]
instructions: ["Peel mushrooms and dice, then saute for five minutes in butter.", "Blend in flour, salt and Accent.", "Stir in cream and simmer until thick.", "Add chives and lemon juice.", "Blend well. Remove crusts from bread and roll slices thin.", "Spread with mushroom mixture and roll up.", "Pack and freeze if desired.", "When ready to serve, defrost; cut each roll in half and toast on all sides in a 400\u00b0 oven for about 20 minutes."]

title: Cottage Cheese Salad
ingredients: ["1 (24 oz.) container small curd cottage cheese", "1 (16 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1 (3 oz.) pkg. raspberry jello (dry)", "1 (8 oz.) Cool Whip"]
instructions: ["Mix all ingredients together.", "Chill several hours before serving."]

title: Indian Corn
ingredients: ["1 lb. ground beef", "1 can drained whole kernel corn", "1/2 c. chopped onion", "1/2 c. chopped pepper", "1 can tomato soup", "1 tsp. sugar"]
instructions: ["Brown beef and drain grease.", "Add all remaining ingredients and simmer for 30 minutes."]

title: Mushroom, Celery And Pimento Salad
ingredients: ["1 lb. fresh mushrooms", "1 c. chopped tender stalks celery with the leaves", "2 canned pimientos or skinned red peppers, cut into strips", "2 Tbsp. minced chives or green onions", "salt to taste", "2 Tbsp. red wine vinegar", "6 Tbsp. salad oil", "1/4 tsp. freshly ground pepper", "1/2 tsp. dry mustard", "shredded lettuce or romaine", "watercress for garnish"]
instructions: ["Wipe mushrooms clean of any dirt and slice caps and stems thinly into a bowl.", "Add celery, pimientos or red peppers and chives or onions."]

title: Indiana Chili
ingredients: ["1 1/2 lb. ground beef", "1 large can kidney beans (28 oz.)", "1 large can tomato juice", "2 or 3 sliced onions", "1/2 c. butter or margarine", "3 Tbsp. chili powder", "3 Tbsp. sugar"]
instructions: ["Saute ground beef until done.", "Add kidney beans and tomato juice.", "Add chili powder and sugar.", "Meanwhile, saute onion slices in butter or margarine.", "When onions are cooked (clear), add both onions and butter to meat mixture.", "Simmer 1/2 hour. Serve with oyster crackers."]

title: Classic Coke Cake
ingredients: ["2 c. flour", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "1/2 lb. butter, melted", "1/4 c. unsweetened cocoa", "1 c. Classic Coke", "1/2 c. buttermilk", "2 eggs, beaten", "1 tsp. baking soda", "1 tsp. vanilla extract", "1 1/2 c. miniature marshmallows"]
instructions: ["Preheat oven to 350\u00b0.", "Butter and flour a 9 x 13 x 2-inch pan. Combine flour and sugar.", "Combine melted butter, cocoa and Coke. Add to flour and sugar mixture, stirring well.", "Add buttermilk, eggs, baking soda and vanilla.", "Fold in the miniature marshmallows. Pour into prepared pan and bake 30 to 35 minutes.", "Remove from oven and frost while still warm."]

title: Ham And Mushrooms
ingredients: ["1/2 c. finely chopped onion", "1/4 c. butter", "1/2 lb. mushrooms, sliced", "1/4 c. flour", "salt", "2 c. half and half or 1 c. milk and 1 c. half and half", "1 tsp. beef bouillon granules", "2 tsp. prepared mustard", "1 c. frozen peas", "3/4 to 1 lb. diced ham", "1/4 c. sherry", "6 to 8 patty shells"]
instructions: ["In a 2 1/2-quart cooking bowl, cook onion and butter on High for 2 minutes or until slightly softened.", "Add mushrooms and cook on High, uncovered, 3 to 4 minutes, stirring once, only until mushrooms are tender, but not shriveled.", "Stir in flour and 1/4 teaspoon salt, mixing with fork until it is all absorbed.", "Add half and half, stirring to mix well.", "Cook on High, uncovered, 8 to 10 minutes, until boiling and thickened.", "Stir in beef granules, mustard, frozen peas, ham and sherry.", "Season to taste with salt and pepper, if needed.", "Heat on 30% power, Defrost or Medium-low, about 15 minutes, stirring once."]

title: Fried Mushrooms
ingredients: ["fresh mushrooms", "1/2 c. milk", "1 egg", "1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "2 c. flour", "3/4 c. instant potatoes", "1/2 tsp. lemon pepper", "salt and pepper to taste"]
instructions: ["Wash mushrooms; drain.", "Mix egg, milk and Worcestershire sauce.", "Set to one side.", "Mix flour, instant potatoes, lemon pepper, salt and pepper.", "Marinate mushrooms a few at a time, about 3 to 5 minutes in egg and milk mixture.", "Press into flour and potato mixture making sure the mushrooms are coated.", "Fry about 5 to 10 minutes."]

title: Marinated Mushrooms
ingredients: ["3 lb. fresh mushrooms, cleaned and tops removed", "2 2/3 c. salad oil", "2 c. garlic wine vinegar", "4 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley", "4 tsp. sugar", "4 tsp. salt", "1 Tbsp. freshly ground black pepper", "4 cloves garlic, cut in 4 sections each"]
instructions: ["Place ingredients in large jar.", "Refrigerate.", "Marinate the mushrooms in the dressing for up to 2 days.", "Serves 20."]

title: Meat Balls With Mushroom Gravy
ingredients: ["1 1/2 to 2 lb. ground beef (extra lean)", "1 c. milk", "1 c. oatmeal", "3 Tbsp. diced onion", "salt and pepper to taste", "2 cans golden mushroom soup"]
instructions: ["Mix all ingredients except soup. Form into balls about 1-inch in size. Bake in baking dish in 350\u00b0 oven for about 1 hour. Drain and return to baking dish. Add mushroom soup. Bake about 15 minutes longer."]

title: Vidalia Onion Casserole
ingredients: ["3 Vidalia onions, sliced", "4 small potatoes, sliced", "1/4 lb. chicken breast, cut in strips", "1 can cream of mushroom soup", "1/2 stick oleo, melted", "salt and pepper to taste"]
instructions: ["Preheat oven to 350\u00b0.", "In large casserole dish, make alternating layers of onions, potatoes and chicken.", "Mix together soup and oleo and spread over evenly.", "Bake 1 hour."]

title: Something Different Sweet Rolls
ingredients: ["2 pkg. dry yeast", "5 c. flour", "1 stick oleo", "4 Tbsp. brown sugar", "1 pkg. yellow cake mix (no pudding)", "2 1/2 c. hot water", "4 Tbsp. white corn syrup", "1 c. chopped nuts"]
instructions: ["Mix cake mix, yeast and flour.", "Stir in 2 1/2 cups of hot water.", "Let rise until double in size.", "Roll into a rectangular shape on floured surface.", "Spread with butter, cinnamon and sugar mixture.", "Roll as a jelly roll and cut into 1 1/2 to 2-inch slices.", "Let rise in pan.", "Before baking, melt topping ingredients: oleo, syrup, brown sugar and nuts.", "Pour over rolls. Bake at 375\u00b0 for 25 minutes."]

title: Curry Pineapple Dip
ingredients: ["8 oz. cream cheese", "1/4 c. chutney", "1/4 tsp. dry mustard", "1 tsp. curry powder", "toasted almonds", "Melba toast crackers"]
instructions: ["Cut pineapple in half and drain.", "Blend first 4 ingredients and chill."]

title: Rotisseri Kumbak Sauce
ingredients: ["2 garlic cloves, chopped fine", "1 c. mayonnaise", "1/4 c. chili sauce", "1/4 c. ketchup", "1/2 c. oil", "1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1 tsp. black pepper", "dash of paprika and red pepper", "juice of grated onion", "2 Tbsp. grated onion"]
instructions: ["Put all ingredients in a quart jar and shake. Keep in the refrigerator. Delicious salad dressing. Very good for boiled shrimp."]

title: Orange Cottage Cheese Salad
ingredients: ["1 pkg. orange jello", "1 (1 lb.) carton small curd cottage cheese", "1 can crushed pineapple, drained", "1 can mandarin oranges, drained", "1 (8 oz.) carton Cool Whip"]
instructions: ["Mix together the jello and cottage cheese.", "Add the pineapple and oranges.", "Chill.", "Add the Cool Whip before serving."]

title: Rissotto With Porcini Mushrooms
ingredients: ["1 lb. Arborio rice", "5 oz. butter", "ground pepper and salt", "4 oz. white wine", "1 qt. chicken broth", "6 oz. olive oil", "6 cloves garlic", "1 lb. porcini mushrooms", "chopped parsley", "grated Parmesan cheese"]
instructions: ["Melt butter in a deep skillet.", "Grind in pepper to taste.", "Add the rice.", "Stir thoroughly.", "Add wine.", "Let some evaporate; add the broth.", "Cook over low heat for 20 minutes."]

title: Meat Marinade For Shish-Kebabs
ingredients: ["1/2 c. salad oil", "1/3 c. white vinegar", "1/4 c. chopped onion or 1 Tbsp. minced onion", "1 tsp. salt", "dash of pepper", "2 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce or 1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce and 1 Tbsp. soy sauce"]
instructions: ["Combine all ingredients and mix thoroughly.", "Marinate 2 to 3 hours.", "Stir occasionally.", "For 2 pounds of cubed meat, 4 to 5 servings."]

title: Cottage Cheese Salad
ingredients: ["1 pkg. lime jello", "1 small can crushed pineapple", "1 c. water", "1 (8 oz.) cottage cheese", "1 pkg. Dream Whip"]
instructions: ["Combine jello, pineapple and water.", "Bring to a boil and cool.", "Add cottage cheese and prepare Dream Whip.", "Refrigerate. Can use any flavored jello for color and Cool Whip."]

title: Vidalia Onion Casserole
ingredients: ["4 medium onions", "3 c. cheese", "3 potatoes", "2 c. milk", "5 eggs", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. pepper"]
instructions: ["Chop onions", "and potatoes and stir-fry.", "Place layer of potatoes and", "onions", "and layer of cheese.\tMix milk and eggs; pour over", "onion", "mixture. Repeat layers.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 20 minutes."]

title: Masoods' Kheema Biryani(Saffron Rice With Ground Lamb)
ingredients: ["1/4 tsp. saffron threads", "3 Tbsp. boiling water", "2 c. basmati rice or other long grain rice, washed and drained", "2 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. oil", "1/2 c. finely chopped onions", "1/4 tsp. cumin seed", "1/2 tsp. ground cumin", "1/2 tsp. turmeric", "1 lb. lean ground lamb", "1/2 c. chopped fresh coriander (cilantro)", "1/2 tsp. fennel seed", "1 1/2 c. chicken stock (fresh or canned)"]
instructions: ["Preheat oven to 350\u00b0.", "In small bowl, drop saffron threads in; add boiling water and soak for 10 minutes.", "Meanwhile, in heavy saucepan, bring 2 cups of water to boil.", "Pour in rice and add salt.", "Cook uncovered for 10 minutes.", "Strain and put rice aside. Separately, heat oil.", "Add onions, cumin seed and salt; stir for 3 or 4 minutes.", "Add turmeric and cumin for 1 minute, then add lamb. When cooked, add fresh coriander.", "Heat remaining 1/4 cup oil and in 4-quart casserole, stir in fennel seed and rice until coated. Spread 1/3 of rice mixture on bottom of casserole.", "Layer 1/2 the saffron mixture and 1/2 lamb mixture.", "Spread the other half of the rice over the lamb and add the meat and then add the remaining rice mixture.", "Put rest of saffron over mixture.", "Add chicken stock and pour in casserole and bring to boil over high heat. Cover casserole with sheet of foil and fold down.", "Set lid on top of foil and bake in the middle of the oven for 25 minutes, or until rice is tender and all the liquid is absorbed in casserole. Fluff the rice with fork and serve the biryani directly from the casserole or serve on platter."]

title: Chicken Broth With Enoki Mushrooms
ingredients: ["5 c. chicken stock", "1 c. diced chicken (optional)", "2 Tbsp. chopped fresh ginger", "1/3 c. thinly sliced green onion", "2 oz. Enoki mushrooms", "2 to 4 Tbsp. fresh lime juice", "2 Tbsp. fresh grated lime peel", "2 Tbsp. minced fresh coriander (cilantro)", "salt and freshly ground or white pepper"]
instructions: ["Bring stock, chicken (if desired) and ginger to a boil in medium saucepan.", "Reduce heat; cover and simmer 10 minutes. Strain through fine sieve and return to pan.", "Add remaining ingredients.", "Simmer 5 minutes.", "Season with salt and pepper. Garnish with coriander and serve."]

title: Sweet And Sour Lentils
ingredients: ["2 1/2 c. water", "1 c. lentils", "1 small onion", "3 to 4 Tbsp. cider vinegar", "2 Tbsp. honey", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. basil"]
instructions: ["Combine water and lentils; bring to a boil.", "Cover, reduce heat and simmer 1/2 hour.", "Add chopped onion and cook 15 minutes more.", "Add remaining ingredients.", "Add more water if lentils look dry.", "Continue to simmer for 10 minutes.", "If the lentils are not tender, add a little more water and soak a few more minutes. Serve over rice, bulgur or millet."]

title: Mushroom Potatoes(Makes 6 Servings)
ingredients: ["1 can cream of mushroom soup (condensed, undiluted)", "1/2 c. skim milk", "1 large onion, chopped", "4 medium potatoes, cooked, peeled and diced", "paprika"]
instructions: ["In a bowl, combine soup, milk and onions. Stir in the potatoes. Pour into a 1 1/2-quart baking dish that has been coated with nonstick cooking spray. Sprinkle with paprika. Bake, uncovered, at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes or until bubbly."]

title: Classis Pecan Pie
ingredients: ["3 eggs, slightly beaten", "1 c. Karo light or dark corn syrup", "1 c. sugar", "2 Tbsp. margarine, melted", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 1/2 c. pecan halves", "1 unbaked (9-inch) pastry shell"]
instructions: ["In large bowl, stir eggs, corn syrup, sugar, margarine and vanilla until well blended.", "Stir in pecans.", "Pour into pastry shell. Bake in 350\u00b0 oven for 50 to 55 minutes or until knife inserted halfway between center and edge comes out clean.", "Cool on wire rack."]

title: Curry Dip
ingredients: ["1/2 tsp. onion flakes", "1 tsp. curry powder", "1 c. Hellmann's mayonnaise", "1 tsp. horseradish", "1/2 tsp. wine vinegar", "1/2 tsp. garlic salt"]
instructions: ["Blend together and chill."]

title: Fettuccini Mushroom Carbonara
ingredients: ["1/2 lb. bacon", "1/2 lb. fresh mushrooms, sliced", "1/4 c. butter, softened", "1/4 c. milk, at room temperature", "1/2 c. Parmesan cheese", "2 eggs, slightly beaten", "2 Tbsp. chopped parsley", "fresh pepper to taste", "8 oz. fettuccini (uncooked)"]
instructions: ["Saute bacon until crisp; drain, reserving drippings.", "Crumble bacon and set aside.", "Saute mushrooms in reserved bacon drippings until tender; set aside."]

title: Classic Pecan Pie
ingredients: ["3 eggs, slightly beaten", "1 c. light corn syrup", "1 c. sugar", "2 Tbsp. margarine, melted", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 1/2 c. pecans", "1 deep dish pie shell"]
instructions: ["Preheat oven and baking sheet to 350\u00b0.", "In large bowl stir eggs, corn syrup, sugar, margarine and vanilla until well blended. Stir in pecans.", "Pour into pastry shell and place pie on baking sheet in oven.", "Bake 50 to 55 minutes or until knife inserted halfway between center and edge comes out clean.", "Cool on wire rack.", "Serves 8."]

title: Tandoori Chicken
ingredients: ["1 Tbsp. plain yogurt", "1 tsp. oil", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. ground ginger", "1/4 tsp. garlic powder", "1/4 tsp. black pepper", "1/4 tsp. ground cayenne pepper", "oregano (extra large dash)", "1/4 tsp. turmeric"]
instructions: ["Skin chicken.", "Rinse chicken with water and dry with paper towels.", "Combine all ingredients (except chicken).", "Mix well.", "Add chicken and mix together until chicken is fully covered.", "Marinate at least 1 hour.", "Bake in a preheated 350\u00b0 oven for 25 to 30 minutes on each side.", "Great on the grill!"]

title: Jello-Cottage Cheese Salad
ingredients: ["1 pkg. lime Jell-O", "1 pkg. lemon Jell-O", "1 1/2 c. boiling water", "1 (No. 2) can crushed pineapple", "1/2 c. salad dressing", "1 c. canned milk", "1 pt. cottage cheese"]
instructions: ["Add together lime and lemon Jell-O to boiling water and stir constantly until dissolved.", "Add remaining ingredients. Refrigerate until firm."]

title: Mushroom Chicken(Serves 4)
ingredients: ["1 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce", "1 can golden mushroom soup", "4 skinned chicken breasts", "1/2 chopped onion", "garlic powder to taste", "salt and pepper to taste", "1/2 green pepper", "1 c. mushrooms, sliced", "Italian seasoning to taste"]
instructions: ["Place chicken in baking dish.", "In large bowl, mix remaining ingredients.", "Pour over chicken.", "Cover and bake at 350\u00b0 for 1 hour."]

title: Green Noodles With Mushroom And Olive Sauce
ingredients: ["1 lb. green noodles", "1/2 lb. fresh mushrooms, sliced", "1 (6 oz.) can pitted black olives, chopped", "3 to 4 cloves garlic, chopped", "1/4 c. olive oil", "3 Tbsp. fresh parsley, chopped", "1/2 c. dry white wine", "salt and pepper to taste", "2 Tbsp. pine nuts (optional)"]
instructions: ["Saute garlic in oil over medium heat.", "Add mushrooms and cook over medium heat for 5 minutes.", "Pour in wine and cook until mushrooms are cooked.", "Add olives and pine nuts and saute 8 minutes.", "Add chopped parsley.", "Cook and drain noodles.", "Toss with sauce and serve."]

title: Chutney Cheese Roll
ingredients: ["2 lb. Velveeta cheese", "2 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "2 c. chopped dates", "1 c. toasted walnuts", "1 c. chutney", "1 tsp. curry powder"]
instructions: ["Let cheese stand at room temperature 6 to 8 hours.", "Roll 1/2 of soft cheese between 2 pieces of wax paper to 1/8-inch thickness.", "Repeat with other half.", "Spread softened cream cheese over the rolled out cheese to cover it completely.", "Toast nuts 10 minutes in 300\u00b0 oven.", "In food processor or blender, chop nuts; add remaining ingredients and spread over the cheese.", "Roll the cheese with the help of the wax paper, sealing the ends of the roll.", "Refrigerate until firm.", "Serve with crackers.", "May be frozen."]

title: Sausage And Mushrooms
ingredients: ["2 lb. hot sausage", "2 lb. mild sausage", "3 to 4 large onions", "3 sticks celery", "3 large green peppers", "1 large can mushrooms", "1 medium can tomato sauce", "brown sugar to tate", "dash of oregano", "salt and pepper"]
instructions: ["Cook and cool sausage.", "Slice when cold.", "Slice onions, green peppers and celery thin.", "Add the remaining ingredients.", "Put in a crock-pot and simmer 1 to 1 1/2 hours until celery and onions are done.", "Serve on hard rolls."]

title: Sauteed Chicken Medallions
ingredients: ["1 skinless, boneless chicken breast per adult (guestimate for younger eaters)", "Progresso Italian bread crumbs", "butter or margarine"]
instructions: ["Cut breasts into finger size pieces, whack flat, bread and saute in butter for about 4 minutes on each side."]

title: Fried Vidalia Onion Rings
ingredients: ["Bisquick", "milk", "egg", "oil", "2 Vidalia onions, sliced and separated into rings"]
instructions: ["Follow directions for waffles on the Bisquick package.", "Coat onion rings with batter, several at a time.", "Drop into hot oil (about 375\u00b0) and cook 2 to 3 minutes, turning, if necessary, to brown evenly.", "Drain on paper towels and salt to taste while still hot.", "Serves 3 or 4."]

title: Fried Mushrooms
ingredients: ["1 lb. fresh small button mushrooms", "1 beaten egg", "flour", "salt"]
instructions: ["Wash and dry fresh, firm mushrooms.", "Dip in beaten egg and dredge in flour.", "Preheat oil to 375\u00b0 on deep-fat thermometer or until a 1-inch cube of bread browns in 60 seconds.", "Fry mushroom until brown, then drain on paper towels.", "Salt and pepper to taste.", "Serves 4 to 6."]

title: Mushrooms & Chicken Livers
ingredients: ["1 lb. chicken livers", "4 tbsp. butter", "2 6 oz. cans broiled, sliced mushrooms OR 1 pt. fresh mushrooms, sliced", "1/2 c. chopped green onions", "1 c. sour cream", "3 tsp. soy sauce", "3 tsp. chili sauce", "pepper to taste"]
instructions: ["Cook livers, covered in butter until almost tender. (about 10 mins.) Add mushrooms and green onions, cook until onions and livers are tender. combine remaining ingredients and add to livers. Heat and stir just until sauce is hot. Serve over rice or hot buttered toast."]

title: Cranberry Chutney
ingredients: ["1 (16 oz.) pkg. cranberries", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "1 c. orange juice", "1 c. raisins", "1 c. walnuts, coarsely chopped", "1 c. celery, chopped", "1 Tbsp. grated orange peel", "1 tsp. ginger"]
instructions: ["In large saucepan, over medium heat, bring cranberries, sugar and juice to a boil, stir frequently.", "Reduce heat to low and simmer 15 minutes.", "Remove from heat and stir in the rest of the ingredients.", "Cover and refrigerate overnight or up to a week before using."]

title: Pan-Fish With Green Onions And Mushrooms
ingredients: ["fish fillets or whole fish", "1/4 c. cornmeal", "1/4 c. flour", "salt and pepper", "6 Tbsp. butter or margarine", "3/4 lb. mushrooms, sliced", "1 Tbsp. crushed capers", "6 green onions, sliced", "2 cloves garlic, sliced", "1/4 c. bread crumbs", "1/2 tsp. tarragon", "2 Tbsp. chopped chives"]
instructions: ["Dredge the fish in a mixture of cornmeal, salt and pepper.", "Fry fish in 2 tablespoons butter until browned on each side.", "Transfer to a dish.", "Saute mushrooms and capers in another skillet in 2 tablespoons butter or margarine and remove them to a lightly buttered shallow baking dish.", "Saute the onions and garlic in butter for 1 to 2 minutes.", "Lay the fish on the bed of mushrooms, sprinkle with bread crumbs mixed with tarragon and spread the onions, garlic and chives over this.", "Bake in a preheated 400\u00b0 oven for 10 to 12 minutes."]

title: Stuffed Baked Potatoes-Chicken(Low-Fat And Cholesterol)
ingredients: ["3 cloves garlic, peeled and minced", "1/2 c. finely chopped onion", "3 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese", "3 large baking potatoes", "1 1/2 tsp. paprika", "3/4 c. low-salt chicken stock", "1 c. plain nonfat yogurt", "1/4 tsp. cayenne pepper", "1/2 c. minced chives", "1/4 tsp. salt"]
instructions: ["Preheat oven to 400\u00b0.", "Scrub potatoes and prick in several places with a fork.", "Bake in the center of the oven for 1 hour or until tender.", "While potatoes are baking, place the chicken stock, onion and garlic in a small saucepan.", "Bring to a boil over medium heat and simmer, uncovered, for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally. Remove potatoes from oven and cut in half.", "Scrape the pulp into a bowl, reserving the shells.", "Add the chicken mix along with everything, except the Parmesan cheese.", "Beat with a mixer until light and fluffy.", "Stuff the potato mix back into the shells. Sprinkle with Parmesan and place back into the oven for 10 minutes. Makes 6 servings."]

title: Indian Chicken Curry
ingredients: ["2 red apples, peeled and sliced", "1 Tbsp. lemon juice", "1 1/2 lb. skinned, boned chicken breasts", "1/4 c. chopped celery", "1/2 c. chopped onion", "1/2 c. green bell peppers, cut in strips", "1 clove garlic, minced", "1 1/2 Tbsp. plain flour", "3 tsp. curry powder or to taste", "1/4 tsp. salt and pepper (each)", "1/2 tsp. ginger", "1 c. chicken broth", "1 can stewed tomatoes", "1/4 c. raisins (optional)", "1 c. water (add more, if needed)", "3 c. cooked rice (served on)"]
instructions: ["In a small bowl, combine sliced apples and lemon juice; toss. Set aside.", "Slice chicken; set aside.", "Combine flour and chicken broth; stir until mixed.", "Add all ingredients into skillet.", "Cook on low for 30 minutes or until everything is cooked down; add extra water, if necessary.", "Serve over rice."]

title: Vermicelli Mushroom Sauce
