title: Cottage Cheese And Dill Dip
ingredients: ["1 c. low-fat cottage cheese", "2 Tbsp. sliced green onion", "2 Tbsp. snipped fresh parsley", "1 tsp. dried dill weed", "1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1/8 tsp. pepper", "dash of garlic powder", "assorted raw veggies"]
instructions: ["Place cottage cheese, green onion, snipped parsley, dill weed, Worcestershire sauce, pepper and garlic powder in a blender container or food processor bowl. Cover and blend or process until smooth. Chill, covered, for at least 1 hour before serving."]

title: Green Bean-Mushroom Medley
ingredients: ["8 oz. fresh beans, cut in 1-inch pieces (1 1/2 c.)", "2 medium carrots, cut crosswise in halves, then 3/8-inch strips", "1 medium onion, cut into 1/4-inch strips", "8 oz. fresh mushrooms, cut in 1/2-inch slices or 1 can sliced mushrooms", "1/4 tsp. garlic", "1/8 c. margarine", "1/4 tsp. white pepper", "1/2 tsp. monosodium glutamate", "1 tsp. salt"]
instructions: ["Heat 1-inch water in 2-quart pan to boiling.", "Add beans and carrots.", "Heat to boiling; reduce heat and cover.", "Simmer until tender, about 12 minutes.", "Drain.", "Cook and stir onion and mushrooms in margarine in 10-inch skillet over medium heat until almost tender, about 5 minutes.", "Reduce heat; cover and cook 3 minutes.", "Stir in beans, carrots, salt, m.s.g., garlic salt and pepper.", "Cover and cook over medium heat, 5 minutes."]

title: Vidalia Onion Dip
ingredients: ["1 c. chopped vidalia onions", "3/4 c. light mayonnaise", "1 c. parmesan cheese"]
instructions: ["Mix together. Dust with paprika. Bake at 300 degrees for 20 minutes or until lightly brown on top. Eat warm on crackers."]

title: Dallas' Chocolate Chip
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "1/2 c. vegetable shortening", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "1 c. brown sugar", "4 eggs", "1 Tbsp. vanilla", "1 tsp. lemon juice", "3 c. flour", "2 tsp. baking soda", "1 1/2 tsp. cinnamon", "1/2 c. oats", "2 pkg. chocolate chips", "2 c. nuts"]
instructions: ["Cream butter, vegetable shortening, sugar and brown sugar for 5 minutes.", "Add next 9 ingredients.", "Put teaspoon size clumps on cookie sheet.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 10 to 15 minutes."]

title: Something Different
ingredients: ["3 c. graham cracker crumbs", "1 stick butter, melted", "1 c. nuts, chopped", "1 (8 oz.) pkg. Philadelphia cream cheese", "1 1/2 c. powdered sugar", "1 1/2 c. Cool Whip", "2 small cans crushed pineapple, drained", "2 boxes coconut cream instant pudding", "3 c. cold milk", "1/2 tsp. vanilla pudding"]
instructions: ["Mix graham cracker crumbs, butter and 1/2 cup nuts together. Put in bottom of a pan.", "Whip together the cream cheese, powdered sugar, Cool Whip and pineapple, then put on top of graham cracker crumbs."]

title: Mushrooms In Wine
ingredients: ["1 lb. mushrooms, cleaned and chopped", "3 Tbsp. vegetable oil", "1/2 tsp. salt", "dash of thyme", "1 bay leaf", "dash of white pepper", "1/3 c. dry red wine"]
instructions: ["Brown mushrooms in a saucepan in vegetable oil with salt, thyme, pepper and bay leaf.", "Add the wine.", "Cover and cook over low heat about 5 minutes.", "Remove bay leaf before cooking."]

title: Chicken, Artichoke And Mushroom Casserole
ingredients: ["1 broiler-fryer chicken (about 3 lb.), cut up", "1 1/2 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. pepper", "1/2 tsp. paprika", "6 Tbsp. butter", "1 (1 lb.) can artichoke hearts, drained", "1/4 lb. mushrooms, sliced", "2 Tbsp. flour", "2/3 c. regular strength chicken broth", "3 Tbsp. dry sherry", "1/4 tsp. dry rosemary, crushed"]
instructions: ["Sprinkle chicken with salt, pepper and paprika.", "Brown in 4 tablespoons butter and remove to a casserole which has a cover. Arrange artichoke hearts in between the chicken pieces."]

title: Chickpea Salad
ingredients: ["1 c. dried chickpeas, lima beans or white beans", "1/2 tsp. crushed garlic", "1/2 c. chopped red onion", "3/4 c. chopped flat leaf parsley", "2 to 3 Tbsp. chopped mint leaves", "1/4 c. fresh lemon juice", "1/4 c. olive oil", "salt to taste (optional)", "thin red onion slices, separated into rings (garnish)"]
instructions: ["Pick over peas or beans and discard any stones.", "Place in colander and rinse thoroughly.", "Soak in water to cover overnight. Drain; rinse again.", "Place in saucepan and cover with fresh cold water.", "Bring to a boil.", "Lower heat and simmer, covered, until peas or beans are tender, but not mushy, about 1 hour.", "Drain, reserving 1/2 cup cooking liquid.", "Combine garlic, onion, parsley, mint, lemon juice, oil, reserved cooking liquid and salt, if used, in wide bowl.", "Add drained peas or beans; toss well and chill. May be refrigerated one or two days to allow flavors to blend. Adjust seasoning.", "Garnish with red onion.", "Makes 8 servings."]

title: Marvelous Mushroom Gravy
ingredients: ["1 c. mushrooms", "2 c. water", "1/2 c. chopped onions", "1 tsp. garlic powder", "1/4 c. pan drippings or cooking oil", "1/4 c. flour", "2 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. black pepper"]
instructions: ["Cook coarsely chopped mushrooms in water and salt for 20 minutes.", "Add onions; simmer 3 minutes.", "Sprinkle in garlic powder; add salt and pepper to mix.", "Drain mixture; save stock."]

title: Indian Casserole
ingredients: ["1 (16 oz.) can whole white hominy, drained", "1 (16 oz.) can cream-style golden corn", "2 Tbsp. butter or margarine", "4 slices bread crumbs, crusts trimmed off"]
instructions: ["Melt butter; stir in bread crumbs.", "Sprinkle over hominy and corn mixture.", "Bake in a 350\u00b0 oven for 30 minutes, or until crumbs are brown."]

title: Mushroom Roll-Ups Appetizer
ingredients: ["3 large loaves Wonder-type white bread", "36 oz. fresh mushrooms", "1 1/2 to 2 sticks butter or margarine", "24 oz. cream cheese", "2 large white onions, finely chopped", "salt and pepper"]
instructions: ["With a rolling pin, flatten each slice of bread.", "Set aside. Melt butter.", "Saute onions and mushrooms, salt and pepper.", "(I use only a dash of salt and pepper.)", "Add cream cheese.", "Blend and cook 15 minutes.", "Cool and refrigerate if you want to finish making them later."]

title: Cottage Cheese Fruit Salad
ingredients: ["1 large (16 oz.?) cottage cheese", "1 lb. can crushed pineapple", "1 small pistachio instant pudding", "1 (12 oz.) Cool Whip", "cherries"]
instructions: ["Drain pineapple; add to cottage cheese along with the whip cream and pudding.", "Garnish with cherries."]

title: Corn Curry
ingredients: ["1/4 c. margarine, melted", "2 (17 oz.) cans whole kernel corn", "2 Tbsp. green pepper, chopped", "3 Tbsp. pimiento, chopped", "3 Tbsp. onion, chopped", "1/2 tsp. curry powder", "1/4 c. sour cream", "1/2 tsp. salt", "freshly ground pepper"]
instructions: ["Combine margarine, vegetables and curry powder in a skillet. Cook over low heat for 8 to 10 minutes or until vegetables are tender.", "Stir in sour cream and pepper.", "Heat thoroughly, stirring often; do not allow to boil.", "Yields 6 servings."]

title: Baked Chicken(Low Cholesterol)
ingredients: ["4 chicken breasts", "1 stick margarine, melted", "1 c. fine cracker crumbs (no cholesterol)"]
instructions: ["Remove skin from chicken.", "Dip into margarine, then roll in cracker crumbs. Place in a pan at 350\u00b0 for an hour or until done. Serves 4."]

title: Chicken Chutney Salad
ingredients: ["2/3 c. mayonnaise", "2 Tbsp. lime juice", "2 Tbsp. chutney", "1/2 tsp. curry powder", "1/2 tsp. grated lime peel", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/4 c. sliced almonds or chopped salted nuts", "2 c. cooked, diced chicken", "1 (8 oz.) can crushed, drained pineapple", "1 c. chopped celery", "1/4 c. onion, chopped"]
instructions: ["Combine first 6 ingredients.", "Stir well.", "Combine remaining ingredients and toss with dressing.", "Chill 1 to 2 hours."]

title: Egg And Mushroom Soup
ingredients: ["5 pieces dried mushrooms", "2 eggs", "3 to 4 c. chicken stock", "1 1/2 tsp. soy sauce", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. ajinomoto", "1/2 Tbsp. cooking oil"]
instructions: ["Wash mushrooms and soak in a cup of hot water; set aside.", "Beat eggs, set aside.", "Boil chicken stock, add mushrooms with the water in which they were soaked.", "Boiled 5 minutes.", "Season with soy sauce, salt and Ajinomoto.", "Stir in the cooking oil and beaten eggs.", "Serve hot."]

title: Batter Dip From Pancake Flour
ingredients: ["1 c. pancake flour", "1 egg, beaten", "1 c. water"]
instructions: ["Beat together.", "Good for chicken, fish, pork chops, etc.", "Dip in wet batter and then roll in dry before frying."]

title: Turkey Hind Quarters With Mushroom Sauce
ingredients: ["1 pkg. turkey hind quarters", "1 can mushroom soup (concentrated)", "1 onion"]
instructions: ["Slice onion and place in bottom of baking pan.", "Place turkey on top of onion.", "Dilute mushroom soup with 1/2 can water.", "Pour the soup over all.", "Bake for 1 hour at 350\u00b0."]

title: Creamy Mushroom Sauce
ingredients: ["1/4 c. chopped onion", "2 Tbsp. butter", "1 Tbsp. flour", "1 (4 oz.) can sliced mushrooms", "2/3 c. milk", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/8 tsp. pepper", "1/2 c. sour cream"]
instructions: ["In a small saucepan, cook onion in butter until tender, but not browned.", "Stir in flour.", "Drain mushrooms.", "Stir in mushrooms, milk, salt and pepper.", "Cook and stir until thickened and bubbly. Cook and stir 1 to 2 minutes more.", "Stir in sour cream; heat through.", "Serve with poultry, beef, pork or burgers."]

title: Stuffed Mushroom Caps
ingredients: ["large mushrooms", "chopped onions", "garlic powder", "celery salt", "salt", "pepper", "1 stick butter", "Pepperidge Farm herb season stuffing"]
instructions: ["Soak mushrooms in cold water for a short time.", "Take out stems and chop in fine pieces.", "Lay caps on paper towels to dry.", "Saute onions, stems, garlic powder, celery salt, salt and pepper in butter.", "Add stuffing.", "Add enough herb seasoning to create the consistency or flavoring you desire.", "Mixture should be moist but not wet.", "Place caps on lightly buttered flat cookie sheet.", "Pack caps gently.", "Pour melted butter over all mushroom caps.", "Bake for 15 minutes in oven preheated to 350\u00b0."]

title: Pork Chops And Mushroom Gravy
ingredients: ["6 or 8 pork chops", "1 can mushroom soup", "1 can water"]
instructions: ["Brown the pork chops in frying pan.", "Pour mushroom soup with one can of water.", "Simmer until tender."]

title: Mushroom-Stuffed Chicken Breasts
ingredients: ["1/4 lb. plus 4 Tbsp. butter", "1/2 lb. mushrooms, chopped fine", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. freshly ground pepper", "1 1/2 c. fresh bread crumbs", "1/4 tsp. nutmeg", "4 chicken cutlets, pounded thin", "1 c. heavy cream"]
instructions: ["Preheat the oven to 350\u00b0.", "Melt 1/4 pound of butter in a skillet.", "Add the mushrooms, salt and pepper; cook stirring often, until the mushrooms turn very dark and absorb all the butter. Remove from the heat and stir in 3/4 cup of the bread crumbs and the nutmeg.", "Divide the mushroom stuffing into 8 portions and place a portion in the center of each chicken.", "Fold the chicken around the stuffing and place, seam side down, in a shallow casserole dish.", "Melt the remaining 4 tablespoons of butter and brush over the chicken.", "Sprinkle with the remaining 3/4 cup bread crumbs. Pour on the cream and bake for 30 minutes until lightly brown."]

title: Chicken Curry
ingredients: ["1/4 c. chopped onions", "1 Tbsp. butter", "1 can cream of mushroom soup", "1/8 c. milk", "1 c. sour cream", "1/2 tsp. curry powder", "2 c. cubed, boiled chicken", "rice", "golden raisins", "tops of scallions", "slivered almonds", "chutney (optional)"]
instructions: ["Cook chopped onions in butter.", "Add cream of mushroom soup and milk.", "Heat and stir in sour cream and curry powder.", "Add chicken. Serve over rice with golden raisins, tops of scallions, almonds and chutney.", "Serves 2 to 4."]

title: Broiled Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: ["2 Tbsp. butter", "24 large mushrooms, stems removed and chopped", "1/4 c. chopped onions", "1 1/2 c. flavored bread crumbs", "1 c. finely chopped cooked ham", "1/4 c. heavy cream", "1 1/2 tsp. mustard", "1/2 tsp. pepper", "2 Tbsp. butter, melted"]
instructions: ["Melt 2 tablespoons butter in small skillet. Add chopped mushroom stems and onion. Saute 4 to 5 minutes. Remove mixture to bowl. Add remaining ingredients except 2 tablespoons melted butter.", "Mix well and set aside. Dip mushroom caps into reserved melted butter. Spoon about 1 to 2 teaspoons of filling into each mushroom cap.", "Preheat pan with rack in high position.", "Place stuffed mushrooms on rack with stuffing up. Broil 10 to 15 minutes."]

title: Asparagus And Mushroom Chicken
ingredients: ["4 to 6 boneless chicken breasts, skinned", "1 large can asparagus", "1 can mushroom bits and pieces", "2 cans cream of mushroom soup", "1 pkg. egg noodles"]
instructions: ["Place chicken in casserole dish.", "Pour 1 can of mushroom soup over chicken with 1/2 can water.", "Cook for about 40 minutes.", "While waiting, cook noodles following package directions.", "Set aside. When chicken is done, place chicken on plate and mix noodles with cooked asparagus and mushrooms in casserole dish.", "Add chicken on top of noodles and add last can of soup.", "Heat in oven another 10 to 15 minutes at 350\u00b0."]

title: Self Rising Flour
ingredients: ["4 c. flour", "2 tsp. salt", "2 Tbsp. baking powder"]
instructions: ["Blend all ingredients and mix well. Store in tightly covered container."]

title: Marinated Mushrooms 2
ingredients: ["2 Tbsp. olive oil", "3 Tbsp. minced onion", "1 clove garlic, minced", "1 Tbsp. tomato sauce", "1/4 c. dry white wine", "1/4 c. water", "2 cloves", "1/8 tsp. saffron", "salt", "freshly ground pepper", "1/2 lb. very small mushrooms, washed and stems removed"]
instructions: ["Heat the oil in a small, deep casserole and saute the onion and garlic until onion is transparent.", "Stir in tomato sauce, wine, water, cloves, saffron, salt and pepper.", "Simmer, covered, for 45 minutes, adding more water, if necessary.", "Add the mushrooms to the cooking liquid and simmer 5 minutes more.", "Turn off heat, cover and let cool.", "Refrigerate overnight.", "Serve cold or at room temperature."]

title: Fried Mushrooms Parmesan
ingredients: ["1 c. all-purpose flour", "1/4 c. Parmesan cheese", "1/2 tsp. salt", "dash of garlic powder", "1 c. cold water", "2 Tbsp. shortening, melted", "1 egg, slightly beaten", "2 c. fresh mushrooms, sliced 1/4-inch thick"]
instructions: ["Heat 2 or 3 inches of shortening in deep frying pan.", "Combine flour, cheese, salt and garlic powder in medium bowl.", "Stir in water, 2 tablespoons melted shortening and egg.", "Beat until smooth.", "Dip mushrooms in batter, drain off excess.", "Fry in heated shortening, about 3 minutes or until golden brown.", "Turn as needed for even browning.", "Remove and drain on paper towels.", "Salt lightly.", "Serve immediately."]

title: No Cholesterol Honey Bran Muffins
ingredients: ["Mazola no stick corn oil cooking spray", "1 c. sifted whole wheat or all-purpose flour", "1 c. whole bran cereal", "2 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. raisins", "2 egg whites", "1 c. skim milk", "1/2 c. Mazola corn oil", "1/4 c. honey"]
instructions: ["Spray 12 large muffin cups with cooking spray.", "In large bowl, stir flour, bran cereal, baking powder, salt and raisins.", "In small bowl, stir egg whites, milk, corn oil and honey until well blended. Add to flour mixture, stirring until moistened.", "Let stand 3 minutes.", "Spoon into muffin tins.", "Bake at 400\u00b0 for 15 to 20 minutes or until lightly browned."]

title: Curry Dip For Raw Vegetables
ingredients: ["1 c. mayonnaise", "1/4 c. chili sauce", "1 tsp. lemon juice", "1 tsp. curry powder", "1/2 tsp. minced onion flakes", "1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1/2 tsp. Tabasco sauce (optional)"]
instructions: ["Mix all ingredients and chill before serving with raw vegetables."]

title: Asparagus, Petits Peas And Mushroom Casserole
ingredients: ["1 (15 oz.) can asparagus or 1 1/2 lb. fresh", "1 (17 oz.) can petits peas (LeSueur)", "1 can small mushrooms or 1/2 c. sliced fresh mushrooms", "1/2 c. sour cream", "1 can mushroom soup", "1 small onion, grated (optional)", "1/8 tsp. white pepper", "3/4 c. sharp Cheddar cheese, grated and packed", "1 c. soft white bread crumbs, tossed in 2 Tbsp. melted butter or 1 c. crushed potato chips"]
instructions: ["If using fresh asparagus, wash clean, cut spears into approximately 2 1/2-inch lengths.", "Cover with water and cook, just until tender, about 10 minutes.", "Drain.", "Arrange around the outer edges of a buttered casserole dish, stacking on each other.", "Drain peas and fill in the center of casserole.", "Mix grated onion, mushrooms, cream of mushroom soup, grated cheese and pepper.", "Pour over asparagus and peas.", "Toss crumbs or potato chips over top. Bake in 350\u00b0 oven for about 30 minutes or until crumbs are brown. May be made ahead of time and refrigerated until ready to bake."]

title: Wild Rice With Mushrooms And Almonds
ingredients: ["1 c. uncooked wild rice", "1/4 c. butter", "3/4 c. chopped onion", "1 can mushroom stems and pieces", "3 c. chicken broth", "1/2 c. slivered almonds"]
instructions: ["Melt butter in skillet. Add rice, almonds, onions and mushrooms. Cook and stir until almonds are brown, about 20 minutes. Pour rice into a baking dish. Heat broth to a boil. Stir broth into rice mixture. Cover tightly and bake for about 2 hours in a 325\u00b0 oven until all liquid is absorbed and rice is tender and fluffy."]

title: Greek Rotini Salad
ingredients: ["3 c. (8 oz.) uncooked pasta, cheese tortellini or spirals", "2 Tbsp. lemon juice", "1/2 c. olive oil", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. pepper", "1/4 tsp. oregano", "1 clove garlic, crushed", "2 tomatoes, cut into wedges", "1 cucumber, peeled and sliced", "1 c. diced green pepper", "12 black olives", "3/4 c. Parmesan cheese", "8 radishes, thinly sliced", "1/4 c. sliced green onion"]
instructions: ["Cook pasta and drain; cool.", "Combine lemon juice, olive oil, spices and garlic in container.", "Mix until well blended and of a thick and creamy consistency.", "Chill.", "Combine cooled pasta with rest of ingredients and large bowl.", "Pour dressing over salad and toss gently to coat evenly.", "Serve immediately."]

title: Manhattan Meat Roll
ingredients: ["2 c. all-purpose flour", "3 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/4 c. shortening", "2/3 or 3/4 c. milk", "1 lb. hamburger", "onion", "salt", "pepper", "Accent"]
instructions: ["Sift flour, baking powder", "and 1/2 teaspoon salt into a mixing bowl.", "Cut in", "shortening", "with", "pastry", "blender", "until mixture resembles a fine meal.", "Add", "milk", "all at once and mix to form a soft dough.", "Use a lightly floured board.", "Put dough on the floured board and", "knead lightly about 20 times.", "Place on ungreased cookie sheet.", "Bake", "in", "400\u00b0", "oven", "for 10 to 15 minutes."]

title: Italian Baked Mushrooms(A Family Recipe)
ingredients: ["1 lb. mushrooms", "8 canned anchovies, washed and chopped", "4 Tbsp. Italian parsley", "2 to 3 garlic cloves, chopped", "4 Tbsp. breadcrumbs", "4 Tbsp. good olive oil", "juice of 1 lemon", "1/4 tsp. pepper", "4 thin slices lemon"]
instructions: ["Wipe mushrooms with wet paper towels. (Do not wash.) Slice thin.", "Combine with next 7 ingredients.", "Place in casserole and top with lemon slices.", "Cover."]

title: Low Cholesterol Dip
ingredients: ["1 c. low-fat small curd cottage cheese", "2 c. reduced fat, cholesterol free mayonnaise", "1/4 c. finely chopped onion", "1/2 tsp. white pepper", "1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1/4 tsp. hot pepper sauce", "1/2 tsp. celery salt", "1/2 tsp. garlic salt", "fresh vegetables for dipping"]
instructions: ["In a medium mixing bowl, beat cottage cheese on low speed of electric mixer until smooth.", "Add mayonnaise, onion, white pepper, celery salt, Worcestershire sauce, garlic salt and hot pepper sauce.", "Mix well.", "Refrigerate, covered, at least 8 hours to let flavor blend.", "Serve with fresh vegetables such as carrot, celery sticks, broccoli and cauliflower."]

title: Curry Green Tomatoes
ingredients: ["2 green onions, sliced", "2 Tbsp. oleo, melted", "1 tsp. curry powder", "1/4 tsp. lemon pepper", "1/4 tsp. garlic powder", "1/4 tsp. Mrs. Dash original seasoning", "3 green tomatoes, sliced"]
instructions: ["Cook green onion in oleo in a large skillet over medium heat until tender.", "Stir in curry powder, lemon pepper, garlic powder and Mrs. Dash.", "Add tomatoes; cook over low heat until tender."]

title: Mushrooms
ingredients: ["1 pkg. fresh mushrooms", "2 Tbsp. butter", "1 tsp. garlic salt", "1/2 c. wine (red)"]
instructions: ["Soak mushrooms for a few minutes, then drain well and wash. Cut into pieces.", "In frying pan, melt butter. Add mushrooms and garlic salt. Cook, covered, about 10 minutes on low heat. Add wine; cook another 5 minutes.", "Serve."]

title: Fruit And Cottage Cheese Salad(Diabetic Recipe)
ingredients: ["1 lb. small curd cottage cheese", "1 (20 oz.) can chunk pineapple, drained (no sugar added)", "1 (3 oz.) pkg. sugar-free orange gelatin", "1 (8 oz.) container whipped topping (D-Zerta or Weight Watchers)", "1 tin mandarin orange slices, drained (no sugar added)"]
instructions: ["Fold together all ingredients.", "Do not add water to gelatin! Chill for 1 to 2 hours before serving.", "Change flavors by using another flavor of gelatin.", "Omit mandarin orange slices.", "You may fold in some of the fruit to match the jello flavor."]

title: Mushroom Roll-Ups
ingredients: ["12 to 18 oz. fresh mushrooms, chopped", "3/4 c. butter", "4 1/2 Tbsp. flour", "1 1/2 c. light cream or use 6 1/2 oz. evaporated milk and 5 1/2 oz. milk", "1 1/8 tsp. salt", "3/8 tsp. m.s.g. (Accent)", "1 Tbsp. chives", "1 1/2 tsp. lemon juice", "1 1/2 loaves bread", "butter, softened"]
instructions: ["Cut off crust from each slice of bread.", "Roll slices thin and flat with rolling pin.", "Saute mushrooms in butter for five minutes.", "Stir in flour until well blended.", "Stir in cream or milk; cook, stirring constantly, until thickened.", "Stir in salt, m.s.g., chives and lemon juice.", "Remove from heat.", "Place one to two teaspoons of the mixture on each slice of bread and roll up like a jelly roll.", "Butter the top side of each with the softened butter.", "Freeze.", "When ready to serve, cut in half and place on cookie sheet.", "Bake at 400\u00b0 for about 30 minutes or until light brown."]

title: Shrimp Curry
ingredients: ["2 Tbsp. butter", "1/2 c. chopped celery", "1/2 c. chopped green pepper", "1 (10 oz.) can condensed cream of shrimp soup (frozen)", "parsley salt", "1 (8 oz.) pkg. frozen shrimp, cooked", "1 1/2 c. cooked rice", "1/2 c. water", "1/4 tsp. curry powder", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. pepper", "1/2 c. sliced, ripe olives (optional)"]
instructions: ["Melt butter in skillet.", "Add celery and green pepper; cook until soft.", "Add soup, shrimp, water and rice; heat and add olives.", "Mix and serve."]

title: Vidalia Onion Casserole
ingredients: ["1 c. crushed Ritz crackers (for crust)", "2 medium onions, cut in rings", "3/4 stick margarine", "1 egg", "1 can cream of mushroom soup"]
instructions: ["Cover bottom of a 9 x 12-inch pan with crushed Ritz crackers. Saute onions in margarine; put on top of crushed crackers.", "Beat egg and pour into a 1-cup measuring cup.", "Fill remainder of cup with milk.", "Add this mixture to cream of mushroom soup; pour over onions.", "Sprinkle with crackers or cheese.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 3 minutes."]

title: Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: ["1 (3 oz.) can Spam spread", "18 to 20 mushrooms (fresh), with stems removed", "enough butter to brush caps lightly"]
instructions: ["Wash mushrooms under cold running water and dry on paper towel.", "Brush outside of caps lightly with butter; place on greased baking pan or cookie sheet.", "Fill each cap with Spam spread.", "Heat 5 to 8 minutes in 375\u00b0 oven."]

title: Wild Mushroom Gougere
ingredients: ["1 oz. dried Polish cepes or porcini", "1 1/4 c. water", "1/4 lb. sweet butter", "1 c. all-purpose flour", "8 oz. Swiss cheese, chopped", "4 eggs (room temperature)"]
instructions: ["Boil mushrooms for 10 minutes, reserve mushrooms and add butter to water used for cooking mushrooms.", "When butter melts, add flour and mix until ball forms off the heat.", "Add eggs, one at a time and beat well after each egg.", "Mix in cheese and reserved chopped mushrooms.", "Place on cookie sheet in two thin loaves and bake in 400\u00b0 oven for 35 to 45 minutes.", "Serve hot or room temperature, sliced.", "Omit mushrooms entirely for traditional gougere."]

title: Lime-Cottage Cheese Salad
ingredients: ["1 pkg. lime jello", "12 large marshmallows", "1 c. cottage cheese", "1 c. whipping cream, whipped", "1/2 c. pineapple juice", "1 c. crushed pineapple", "1/2 c. black walnuts"]
instructions: ["Boil together jello and pineapple juice.", "Stir in marshmallows until dissolved and add the rest of the ingredients.", "Let stand in refrigerator."]

title: Cottage Cheese Sandwich Spread
ingredients: ["1/2 c. chopped green pepper", "1/2 c. shredded carrot", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "2 Tbsp. chopped dill pickle", "1 c. low-fat cottage cheese"]
instructions: ["Makes enough for 4 sandwiches.", "Mix together all ingredients. Chill."]

title: Chicken Livers And Mushrooms
ingredients: ["1 slice bacon", "2 Tbsp. butter", "1/2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 lb. chicken livers", "2 Tbsp. flour", "chopped parsley", "1 c. beef bouillon", "1 tsp. lemon juice", "1/4 c. sliced mushrooms", "2 Tbsp. cooking sherry"]
instructions: ["Cook together for 5 minutes, bacon (cut in pieces) and butter. Remove bacon bits.", "Add chopped onion; cook 2 minutes and add chicken livers.", "Cook until light brown all over (until they look done).", "Add flour, beef bouillon, lemon juice and sliced mushrooms.", "Add cooking sherry; cook 2 minutes.", "Sprinkle with chopped parsley and serve on toast or rice.", "Serves 4."]

title: Cucumber Cottage Cheese Salad
ingredients: ["1 pkg. lime jello", "1 Tbsp. sugar", "3/4 c. hot water", "2 Tbsp. lemon juice", "1 c. cottage cheese", "1 c. salad dressing", "1 small onion, chopped fine", "1 medium chopped cucumber", "ground nuts (optional)"]
instructions: ["Dissolve jello, sugar and lemon juice in hot water.", "Add cottage cheese, salad dressing, onion, cucumber and ground nuts. Thoroughly mix all ingredients and place in mold.", "Chill several hours.", "Unmold before serving."]

title: Indiana Date Pudding
ingredients: ["2 c. brown sugar", "3 c. water", "1 c. sugar", "2 Tbsp. oleo", "1 c. milk", "2 c. flour", "4 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 c. nuts", "1/2 c. dates"]
instructions: ["Boil the brown sugar and water for 3 minutes.", "Pour into a 9 x 13 pan.", "Mix together the sugar and oleo, then add milk, flour, baking powder, chopped nuts and diced dates.", "Spoon batter mixture by spoonfuls into water/brown sugar mixture.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 until brown on top."]

title: Curry-Cajun Spiced Chicken
ingredients: ["1/3 c. honey", "3 Tbsp. water", "3 Tbsp. prepared mustard", "2 Tbsp. oleo, melted", "2 tsp. Cajun seasoning", "2 tsp. curry powder", "1 tsp. lemon juice", "1 clove garlic, minced", "6 skinless, boneless chicken breast halves"]
instructions: ["In a 9 x 13-inch pan, combine honey, water, mustard, melted oleo, Cajun seasoning, curry powder, lemon juice and garlic; mix well.", "Add chicken, turning to coat.", "Arrange in single layer. Bake, uncovered, in a 350\u00b0 oven for 30 minutes, or until chicken is tender and no longer pink."]

title: Scurry Supper Casserole
ingredients: ["1 lb. bag frozen Tater Tots", "1 lb. hamburger, browned and drained", "1 (16 oz.) can corn, drained", "1 (16 oz.) can green beans, drained", "1/4 c. chopped onions", "1 can mushroom soup"]
instructions: ["Brown and drain hamburger; place in large casserole dish for first layer.", "Layer 1 can drained corn, then 1 can mushrooms and onions.", "Then layer drained green beans.", "Next place frozen Tater Tots side by side, covering top of casserole.", "Bake in 350\u00b0 oven for 25 to 30 minutes.", "Serve with hot bread and butter."]

title: Curry-Cajun Spiced Chicken
ingredients: ["1/3 c. honey", "3 Tbsp. water", "3 Tbsp. prepared mustard", "2 Tbsp. margarine, melted", "2 to 3 tsp. Cajun seasoning", "2 to 3 tsp. curry powder", "1 tsp. lemon juice", "1 clove minced garlic", "6 skinless, boneless chicken breasts", "hot cooked rice"]
instructions: ["In a 3-quart rectangular baking dish, combine honey, water, mustard, margarine, Cajun seasoning, curry powder, lemon juice and garlic; mix well.", "Add chicken breast halves, turning to coat. Arrange in a single layer.", "Bake, uncovered, in a 350\u00b0 oven for 30 minutes or until chicken is tender and no longer pink.", "Serve chicken and pan drippings with hot cooked rice.", "Each serving contains 438 calories and 2 grams saturated fat."]

title: Mushrooms Filled With Blue Cheese
ingredients: ["24 small mushrooms", "lemon juice", "1/2 c. sour cream", "4 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1/2 tsp. (or to taste) curry powder", "4 oz. Blue cheese, grated", "2 tsp. grated onion", "1/2 c. chopped pecans", "watercress or parsley"]
instructions: ["Clean the mushrooms and remove the stems (save for another use or chop finely and add to filling).", "Dip quickly into about a 1/2 cup lemon juice and set aside on paper towels.", "Combine sour cream, curry powder and Worcestershire.", "Add cheese, onion and pecans.", "Mix well.", "Pipe into prepared caps with a pastry bag fitted with a star tube.", "Cover with plastic wrap and chill.", "Just before serving, garnish with sprigs of parsley or watercress."]

title: Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: ["2 lb. chopped mushroom stems", "1 medium onion", "1/2 lb. fried ground meat (ground chuck)", "2 sticks margarine", "1/2 lb. (8 oz.) bread crumbs", "1/2 c. Parmesan cheese", "1/2 tsp. garlic salt", "1/4 tsp. pepper", "2 Tbsp. cooking sherry"]
instructions: ["Fry ground meat.", "Add margarine in with meat.", "Then fry chopped mushrooms and onion in meat and margarine.", "When onion is tender, add Parmesan cheese, garlic salt, pepper and cooking sherry."]

title: Spicy Cranberry Chutney
ingredients: ["4 c. (1 lb.) cranberries", "1 c. seedless raisins", "1 2/3 c. sugar", "1 Tbsp. cinnamon", "1 1/2 tsp. ginger", "1/4 tsp. cloves", "1 c. water", "1 medium-sized onion, chopped (1/2 c.)", "1 medium-sized apple, pared and chopped", "1/2 c. celery, thinly sliced"]
instructions: ["Combine cranberries, raisins, sugar, cinnamon, ginger, cloves and water in a large saucepan.", "Cook 15 minutes, until berries pop and mixture thickens.", "Stir in onion, apple and celery; simmer 15 minutes longer, or until mixture is thick.", "Cool; refrigerate. Makes 4 cups.", "Serve with poultry or pork."]

title: Creole Chicken And Mushroom Salad
ingredients: ["1 lb. fresh mushrooms", "2 c. cherry tomatoes, halved", "2 c. chopped, cooked chicken", "2 small zucchini, sliced thin", "1 diced green pepper", "1 sliced scallion", "leaf lettuce", "1/2 c. olive oil", "2 Tbsp. red wine vinegar", "2 Tbsp. lemon juice", "1 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. pepper", "1/2 tsp. sugar"]
instructions: ["Line a bowl with lettuce.", "Toss the first 6 ingredients together and place in the lettuce-lined bowl.", "Mix the last 6 ingredients well.", "Pour over the salad and toss lightly."]

title: Baked Mushroom Squares
ingredients: ["16 oz. can mushrooms, drained", "2 Tbsp. minced onion", "2 Tbsp. butter", "1 tsp. lemon juice", "1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1/2 tsp. garlic salt", "1 (8 count) can refrigerator crescent rolls", "8 oz. cream cheese, softened", "1/4 c. Parmesan cheese"]
instructions: ["Preheat oven to 350\u00b0. Saute mushrooms and onion in butter in skillet. Add lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce and garlic salt. Cook until liquid is absorbed, stirring frequently. Chill in fridge, if desired."]

title: Chicken With Mushroom Sauce
ingredients: ["2 chicken breasts, split", "1 can cream of mushroom soup", "1/2 pt. sour cream", "dried chipped beef and bacon"]
instructions: ["Take skin off chicken.", "Wrap bacon around chicken.", "Place beef under each breast.", "Mix mushroom soup and sour cream together; spread over chicken.", "Bake at 250\u00b0 for 3 hours, at 300\u00b0 for 2 hours or at 350\u00b0 for 1 hour."]

title: Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: ["4 slices bacon, diced", "1/4 cup minced onion", "2 Tbsp. minced green pepper", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 lb. fresh small mushrooms", "1/2 c. soft bread crumbs", "1 Tbsp. butter or margarine"]
instructions: ["Combine bacon, onion, and green pepper in 4-cup measure. Cover with paper towel and cook by microwave for 4 minutes, stirring once.", "Remove from microwave; pour off fat.", "Mix in salt, Worcestershire and cream cheese.", "Wash and dry mushrooms.", "Remove stems.", "Chop stems and add to bacon mixture.", "Fill mushrooms.", "In 2-cup measure, heat bread crumbs and butter in microwave for 1 minute; stir until well mixed.", "Press buttered crumbs on top of stuffed mushrooms.", "place half the mushrooms in 6 x 10 inch baking dish, filling side up.", "Add 1/4 cup hot water to baking dish and cook 2 minutes. Repeat with remaining mushrooms.", "Makes about 50."]

title: Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: ["2 lb. large mushrooms", "1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese", "3/4 c. dry bread crumbs", "1/2 c. onions, grated", "2 cloves garlic, minced", "3 Tbsp. parsley, minced", "1 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. black pepper, freshly ground", "1/2 tsp. oregano", "3/4 c. olive oil"]
instructions: ["Wash mushrooms.", "Remove stems, chop.", "Mix chopped stems with cheese, bread crumbs, onions, garlic, parsley, salt, pepper and oregano.", "Stuff mixture in mushroom caps.", "Pour a little olive oil onto a baking pan.", "Arrange the mushrooms in oil.", "Pour the remaining oil over mushrooms.", "Bake in a 350\u00b0 oven for 25 minutes. Serves 6 to 8 people.", "Prep time:", "10 to 15 minutes.", "Baking time: 25 minutes."]

title: Chicken-Mushroom Casserole
ingredients: ["1/4 c. fresh mushrooms, diced", "1 1/2 c. bread crumbs", "1 1/2 c. cooked chicken", "1/2 c. canned chicken broth", "2 Tbsp. white cooking wine", "1/2 c. milk", "1 egg, beaten", "1 Tbsp. onion, chopped", "3/4 tsp. salt", "dash of pepper"]
instructions: ["Mix mushrooms, bread crumbs, chicken, broth, milk, egg, wine, onion, salt and pepper.", "Put into an ungreased 1-quart casserole. Cook, uncovered, in a 350\u00b0 oven about 1 hour.", "Serve with Mushroom Sauce."]

title: Classic Coffee Cake
ingredients: ["1 1/2 c. plain flour", "1/2 c. milk", "1 beaten egg", "1/4 c. melted shortening", "3/4 c. sugar", "2 tsp. baking soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 recipe topping"]
instructions: ["Combine oil, egg and milk.", "Stir dry ingredients together; add milk mixture and mix well.", "Pour into greased 9 x 9 x 2-inch pan or 9-inch round pan.", "Sprinkle topping over batter.", "Serve warm."]

title: Indian Pudding
ingredients: ["6 Tbsp. corn meal", "6 c. milk, scalded", "1/2 c. brown sugar", "1/4 lb. butter", "1 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. grated lemon rind", "1 tsp. ginger", "1/2 lb. raisins", "6 eggs, beaten whole"]
instructions: ["Combine the corn meal with the scalded milk.", "Add the sugar, butter and salt.", "Let the mixture cool, then add the lemon rind, ginger, raisins and eggs.", "Bake in a buttered 3-quart casserole, set in water, for 2 hours in a slow oven (300\u00b0).", "Very good!!"]

title: Sauteed Green Beans And Mushrooms
ingredients: ["1 (20 oz.) pkg. French-cut green beans", "1 large can mushroom stems and pieces with water", "1/2 to 1 stick margarine", "1 tsp. garlic powder", "1 medium onion, halved lengthwise and sliced", "1 Tbsp. Mrs. Dash or herb-type seasoning"]
instructions: ["Melt margarine in a 12-inch nonstick frying pan.", "Add onion and saute at medium temperature until clear.", "Add green beans, mushrooms, garlic powder and herb seasoning.", "Cover and cook at medium temperature for 15 to 20 minutes, stirring occasionally until green beans are cooked, but not limp."]

title: Quick Turkey Curry
ingredients: ["1/4 c. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. butter or margarine", "1 (10 1/2 oz.) can condensed cream of mushroom soup", "1/4 c. milk", "1 c. dairy sour cream", "1/2 tsp. curry powder", "1 c. cubed cooked turkey"]
instructions: ["Cook onion in butter or margarine.", "Add soup and milk; heat and stir until smooth.", "Stir in sour cream and curry powder.", "Add turkey; heat, but do not boil.", "Garnish with snipped parsley. Serve over hot cooked rice.", "If desired, offer curry condiments of chutney, raisins and toasted slivered almonds.", "Makes 4 servings."]

title: Mushroom Croissant Appetizer
ingredients: ["2 pkg. Croissants", "1-8 oz. pkg. Cream Cheese", "12 oz. Chopped Fresh Mushrooms", "1 tsp. Garlic Salt", "1 tsp. Onion Powder"]
instructions: ["Saute mushrooms in a small amount of butter and cool.", "Mix mushrooms with cream cheese and seasonings.", "Unroll croissants and cut each croissant in half long ways.", "Spoon a small amount of mixture onto large end of croissant.", "Roll up.", "Place in ungreased cookie sheet and bake 10-12 minutes at 350."]

title: Asparagus Mushroom Bake
ingredients: ["2 Tbsp. butter or margarine", "3/4 lb. fresh mushrooms, halved (4 c.)", "1 c. chopped onion", "3 Tbsp. butter or margarine", "3 Tbsp. flour", "1 tsp. instant chicken bouillon", "1/2 tsp. nutmeg (optional)", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/8 tsp. pepper", "1 c. milk", "2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen asparagus, thawed and drained", "1 1/2 tsp. lemon juice", "1/2 c. soft bread crumbs", "1 Tbsp. butter or margarine, softened"]
instructions: ["Melt 2 tablespoons butter in large skillet; saute mushrooms and onion until tender (15 minutes).", "Remove vegetables.", "Add 3 tablespoons butter to skillet; heat until bubbly.", "Combine flour, bouillon, nutmeg, salt and pepper.", "Stir into butter.", "Gradually stir in milk and cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until it boils; boil and stir 1 minute.", "Cut asparagus spears into thirds.", "Drain any liquid from mushroom mixture.", "Stir asparagus, mushroom mixture and lemon juice into sauce; pour into buttered 1 1/2-quart casserole.", "Combine crumbs and 1 tablespoon butter; sprinkle over vegetables.", "Bake, uncovered, in a 325\u00b0 oven until asparagus is tender, about 45 minutes.", "Let stand 5 minutes before serving.", "Makes 8 to 10 servings."]

title: Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: ["12 oz. fresh mushrooms", "1/2 lb. hot sausage"]
instructions: ["Remove stems from mushrooms and discard.", "Wash mushrooms. Stuff mushrooms with sausage.", "Put in baking pan.", "Bake, uncovered, for 30 minutes at 350\u00b0 or until sausage is brown."]

title: Peach Chutney
ingredients: ["1 (13 oz.) can peach halves, drained", "1/3 c. packed brown sugar", "1/3 c. honey", "1/2 c. apple cider vinegar", "1/2 tsp. mace", "6 whole cloves", "1 (3/4-inch) cinnamon stick, broken"]

title: Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: ["1 pkg. fresh whole mushrooms", "3/4 c. mayonnaise", "1 small bottle real bacon bits", "dash of minced onions to taste", "1/2 c. Cheddar cheese", "1/2 c. Jack cheese"]
instructions: ["Wash mushrooms and remove stems.", "Mix mayonnaise, bacon bits and minced onion together.", "Spoon into mushrooms, then sprinkle cheese mixture on top and bake at 425\u00b0 for 8 to 10 minutes."]

title: Richard Simmons' Classic Citrus Salad
ingredients: ["1 Tbsp. natural rice vinegar", "1/4 tsp. Dijon style mustard", "1/4 tsp. sugar", "dash each: salt and pepper", "1/2 tsp. olive oil", "2 c. fresh spinach leaves, washed, dried, torn and chilled", "1 small orange, peeled and segmented", "2 Tbsp. finely sliced red onion", "3 walnut halves, chopped coarsely"]
instructions: ["To make dressing, whisk together vinegar, mustard, sugar, salt, pepper and olive oil.", "To make salad, arrange remaining ingredients in serving bowl.", "Pour dressing over salad.", "Toss."]

title: Low-Fat And Low-Cholesterol Corn Bread Dressing
ingredients: ["4 c. bread crumbs (from leftover loaf bread)", "`4 c. corn bread (made with yellow cornmeal and 3 or 4 egg whites)", "1/2 c. chopped onion", "1/2 c. margarine (liquid vegetable oil)", "1 c. chopped celery", "pepper to taste", "salt to taste", "1 tsp. sage", "1 c. skim milk", "3 c. chicken or turkey broth, prepare, chill and thaw, remove fat before use"]
instructions: ["Toast bread crumbs.", "In large bowl, crumble corn bread and add toasted bread crumbs.", "Add onions, celery and seasonings.", "Add hot broth to make a soft moist mixture.", "Mix well.", "Add margarine and milk; mixture should be very soft to allow for loss of moisture during baking; add more broth if necessary.", "Spray 9 x 12-inch baking pan with vegetable spray.", "Pour mixture in and bake at 350\u00b0 for 1 hour."]

title: Angel Hair Pasta With Creamy Mushroom Sauce
ingredients: ["4 oz. angel hair pasta", "1 1/2 c. sliced fresh mushrooms", "1 medium onion, chopped", "1 Tbsp. butter or margarine", "1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, cut into cubes", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. pepper", "1/3 c. milk", "2 Tbsp. snipped chives"]
instructions: ["Cook pasta according to package directions; drain. Meanwhile, for sauce, in a medium saucepan cook the mushrooms and onion in the butter (or margarine) until vegetables are tender. Stir in cream cheese, salt and pepper. Cook and stir over low heat until cheese is melted. Gradually stir in milk and chives; heat through. Pour sauce over pasta. Toss to coat. Serve immediately."]

title: Fresh Mushroom Soup
ingredients: ["1 medium onion", "2 Tbsp. butter", "2 to 3 Tbsp. flour", "4 c. beef consomme", "3/4 lb. fresh mushrooms", "pinch of white pepper", "pinch of nutmeg", "1 1/2 c. heavy cream"]
instructions: ["Chop the onion fine and cook in butter until brown.", "Slice mushrooms and add.", "Stir until done.", "Add flour and stir to coat mushrooms.", "Continue cooking for 5 minutes at medium-high heat, stirring occasionally to keep from burning.", "Add beef stock, stirring continuously.", "Reduce to medium heat; cook ten minutes (do not boil).", "Add cream and spices.", "Stir and serve."]

title: Chicken Curry

instructions: ["Mix in first five ingredients for sauce.", "Boil chicken and cut into pieces.", "Clean and cut broccoli or use frozen package, thawed.", "Stir-fry broccoli.", "Mix chicken, broccoli and sauce.", "Top with cheese.", "Bake for 1/2 hour in 9 x 12-inch pan at 375\u00b0."]

title: Portobello Mushrooms
ingredients: ["4 large portobello mushroom caps", "2 Tbsp. lemon juice", "2 tsp. soy sauce", "2 tsp. mint fresh parsley", "2/3 c. chopped seeded tomatoes", "1/2 c. shredded Mozzarella cheese", "1 tsp. olive oil, divided", "1/8 tsp. dried rosemary", "1/8 tsp. pepper", "1 garlic clove, crushed"]
instructions: ["Combine tomatoes, cheese, 1/2 teaspoon oil, rosemary, pepper and garlic in small bowl."]

title: Chapati
ingredients: ["1 c. all-purpose flour", "1/2 c. water", "1/4 tsp. salt (optional)", "shortening or any kind of oil"]
instructions: ["Knead the dough as you would pizza dough, only this time with only flour and water.", "You may add or reduce the water or flour to make a soft nonsticky dough.", "The softer the better. Using a rolling pin, spread small piece of dough to make it flat and circular.", "Spread some oil on it, as we do donuts.", "After rolling, spread it again and lay it on a cooking pan (should be heavy). Cook one side until it has brown spots.", "Turn it and apply some oil.", "When the other side is brown, do the same.", "Turn again and cook both sides until golden brown.", "Store in a tight place.", "Keep them warm and soft.", "Serve warm with chicken or beef (or any) soup."]

title: Classic Potato Salad
ingredients: ["10 lb. white potatoes", "3 c. chopped celery", "2/3 c. chopped onion", "1 diced bell pepper (optional)", "4 boiled eggs, chopped", "dash of red pepper, garlic salt and celery seed", "1 pt. mayonnaise", "3 Tbsp. prepared mustard"]
instructions: ["Peel and dice potatoes. Add salt and cook for 20 minutes or until done, but not overdone. Cool slightly. Add other ingredients, adjusting amounts to individual taste.", "After potato salad is mixed, sprinkle with paprika and chill.", "Serves 20."]

title: Indian Fry Bread 2(Makes About 2 Dozen)

instructions: ["Put flour, baking powder and salt in a large bowl.", "Mix well. Add water and stir until dough begins to form a ball.", "On a lightly floured surface, knead dough lightly, 2 to 3 minutes.", "Do not over work.", "Place in a bowl and refrigerate 45 minutes."]

title: Mushroom Casserole
ingredients: ["1 can cream of mushroom soup", "1 lb. fresh mushrooms", "1/4 lb. butter, divided", "1 medium onion, chopped", "2 c. seasoned croutons", "grated Parmesan cheese"]

Place in 8 x 8-inch pan.", "Saute onion and cut up mushrooms in remaining butter.", "Spread evenly over croutons.", "Over this, spread the undiluted soup.", "Top with the mushroom caps.", "Sprinkle generously with Parmesan cheese.", "Bake uncovered at 350\u00b0 for 30 to 40 minutes.", "Good with steak."]

title: Indian Stew
ingredients: ["2 lb. ground beef", "3/4 c. chopped celery", "3/4 c. chopped onions", "3/4 c. chopped green peppers", "1 can corn", "1 can tomatoes", "2 cans tomato soup", "1 Tbsp. brown sugar", "1/3 c. Worcestershire sauce", "hot sauce to taste (about 1/4 c.)", "salt and pepper"]
instructions: ["Brown ground beef.", "Add all other ingredients; cook slowly, stirring to prevent burning, about an hour or cook in crock-pot. Serve over rice."]

title: Mushroom And Artichoke Chicken

Heat oil in skillet, add chicken, brown 3-5 minutes each side.", "Then arrange chicken in 2 quart baking dish.", "Tuck artichoke around chichen.", "In skillet add mushrooms, onions and saut 2-3 minutes.", "Add stock and sherry, bring to a boil.", "Combine flour and water.", "Reduce heat, add to skillet.", "Stir constantly 2-3 minutes at a simmer. Pour over chicken.", "Cover dish. Bake at 375 degrees for 40 minutes.", "Serves 2 or 4."]

title: Farfalle, Turkey Sausage, Peas And Mushrooms
ingredients: ["1/2 c. extra virgin olive oil", "1 lb. ground turkey sausage, removed form casing", "Sea salt", "Fresh ground black pepper", "10 oz. pkg. frozen peas, defrosted slightly", "1 lb. dried farfalle pasta", "1/2 c. freshly grated Grano Padano"]
instructions: ["In large pot, bring 6 quarts of salted water to a boil."]

title: Rice Pulao

title: Indian Squash

title: Mom'S Sugar Cookies(Canaan Elementary Favorite)

(8 oz.) shredded Cheddar cheese", "cherry tomato halves (optional)"]

title: Medallions Of Pork With Wild Mushrooms And Berries
ingredients: ["1 stick unsalted butter", "1 tsp. chopped garlic", "1 1/2 lb. assorted wild mushrooms", "1 c. cranberries", "1 c. blueberries", "2 c. title: Spinach And Mushroom Sauté
ingredients: ["2 Tbsp. unsalted butter", "2 Tbsp. minced shallot", "1 tsp. minced garlic", "1/2 lb. mixed wild mushrooms (chanterelle, shiitake, cremini or oyster), wiped clean and sliced or white button mushrooms", "1 (10 oz.) bag ready-to-use fresh spinach", "1/2 tsp. each coarse (kosher) salt and black pepper"]

title: Indian Corn Pudding

instructions: ["Mix in baking dish.", "Dot with bits of butter on top.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 1 hour.", "Can add layers of cracker crumbs."]

title: Stuffed Mushrooms With Sherry

instructions: ["Remove stems from mushrooms and chop finely.", "Melt 1/2 of butter and cook until tender.", "Add remaining ingredients with exception of lemon and sherry.", "Place into mushroom caps.", "Place on flat pan; add sherry, remaining butter and drop of lemon juice on each mushroom.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 15 minutes."]

title: Stuffed Turkey Mushrooms

Yields 20 stuffed mushrooms."]

title: Lite Mushroom Stuffed Potatoes
ingredients: ["4 medium potatoes (about 1 1/2 lb.)", "2 Tbsp. oleo", "1/2 lb. sliced fresh mushrooms", "1/2 c. chopped green onion", "1/4 c. plain yogurt (low-fat)", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/8 tsp. pepper", "1/4 to 1/2 c. skim milk", "crumbled bacon (optional)", "parsley (optional)", "shredded cheese (optional)"]
instructions: ["Wash potatoes; dry, prick with fork and bake in 425\u00b0 oven for 65 minutes or until soft."]

title: Flourless Peanut Butter Cookies
ingredients: ["1 egg, beaten", "1 c sugar", "1 c creamy peanut butter"]
instructions: ["In a large bowl, mix all ingredients. Roll level tbsp into balls. Place on an ungreased cookie sheet. Flatten with a fork. bake at 350\u00b0 for 10-12 min. makes about 2 dozen."]

title: Low Cholesterol Apple And Oat Bran Muffins
ingredients: ["1/4 tsp. baking soda", "1 1/4 c. whole wheat flour", "1 c. oat bran", "1/3 c. brown sugar", "2 1/2 tsp. baking powder", "1/4 tsp. nutmeg", "1/4 tsp. cinnamon", "1 c. buttermilk", "2 egg whites", "2 Tbsp. oil", "3/4 c. shredded and peeled apple", "nonstick coating"]
instructions: ["In a medium bowl, stir together flour, oat bran, brown sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt, nutmeg and cinnamon.", "Set aside. In a small bowl, combine buttermilk, egg whites and oil.", "Add to dry ingredients; stir just until moist.", "Stir in apple.", "Store batter tightly covered in refrigerator for 5 days.", "To bake, spray muffin cups with nonstick spray coating.", "Spoon about 1/4 cup batter into each muffin cup.", "Bake 375\u00b0 for 18 to 20 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean.", "Make 12 muffins. 124 calories per muffin."]

title: Rice, Sour Cream, Mushroom Pilaf
ingredients: ["1/2 lb. fresh mushrooms, sliced", "1/2 c. chopped green peppers", "1/4 c. butter", "3 c. hot water", "2 (7 oz.) pkg. chicken flavored rice mix", "1/2 pt. sour cream"]
instructions: ["Saute mushrooms and peppers in pot until tender, not brown. Add water. Stir in seasoning packet. Bring to a boil. Stir in rice and sour cream.", "Bring to a boil. Cover.", "Remove from heat.", "Let stand 1 minute.", "Stir before serving."]

title: Chicken Mushroom
ingredients: ["1 (5 lb.) box chicken thighs", "1 can cream of mushroom soup", "3 Tbsp. shoyu"]
instructions: ["Place", "chicken\tthighs\t(skin", "removed)", "in baking pan. Bake at\t350\u00b0", "for 1 hour.", "Mix can of cream of mushroom soup with", "3 tablespoons", "shoyu.", "Pour mixture over chicken thighs after 1 hour, then cook 15 minutes more."]

title: Cottage Cheese Luncheon Salad
ingredients: ["1 1/2 lb. (about 3 c.) cottage cheese", "2 tsp. salt", "few grains pepper", "1 c. chopped radishes", "1/4 c. cut fine chives", "4 Tbsp. mayonnaise"]
instructions: ["Season cottage cheese with salt and pepper.", "If very moist, drain.", "Add radishes, chives and mayonnaise.", "If too dry, moisten with a little cream or extra mayonnaise.", "Mix well.", "Chill."]

title: Cottage Cheese Cookies
ingredients: ["1 lb. cottage cheese", "1 lb. butter or oleo", "4 c. flour"]
instructions: ["Mix all together very well.", "Roll out on floured board very thin.", "Cut in squares, 2 1/2 x 2 1/2-inches.", "Fill each square with your favorite Solo fillings.", "Fold in triangle; place on ungreased cookie sheet and bake for 10 to 12 minutes at 350\u00b0."]

title: Parmesan Chicken Picatta
ingredients: ["6 boneless, skinless chicken breasts", "1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese", "2 Tbsp. dry bread crumbs", "3 Tbsp. olive or vegetable oil", "1/2 c. dry wine"]
instructions: ["Rinse chicken pieces with water; do not dry.", "Coat chicken with combined Parmesan cheese and bread crumbs.", "Heat oil in skillet over medium-high heat.", "Brown chicken for 5 minutes on each side or until lightly browned and tender.", "Remove chicken to platter.", "Keep warm.", "Reduce heat to medium.", "Add wine to skillet; stir to loosen drippings.", "Remove from heat and serve over chicken."]

title: Mushroom Casserole
ingredients: ["2 c. rice, cooked", "1 lb. fresh mushrooms, quartered", "1 can cream of celery soup", "1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained", "3/4 c. shredded sharp Cheddar cheese"]
instructions: ["Cook mushrooms in butter.", "Add rice.", "Heat on low for 3 minutes.", "Remove from heat.", "Stir in soup, spinach and cheese. Pour into 1 1/2-quart casserole dish.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 10 minutes.", "Stir before serving.", "Top with extra cheese.", "Makes 5 cups."]

title: Mushroom And Spinach Soup
ingredients: ["1/4 c. vegetable oil", "1 medium onion, minced", "2 garlic cloves, minced", "3/4 lb. mushrooms, sliced", "6 oz. fresh shiitake mushrooms, stemmed and sliced", "1 tsp. dried thyme, crumbled", "4 c. chicken stock or canned broth", "2 c. sliced fresh spinach leaves", "1 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley"]
instructions: ["Heat vegetable oil in heavy large saucepan over medium-low heat. Add minced onion and garlic; saute until onion is tender, about 8 minutes.", "Increase heat to high. Add all mushrooms and thyme and saute until mushrooms release their liquid, about 5 minutes. Add chicken stock and bring to a boil. Reduce heat, cover and simmer 20 minutes.", "(Can be prepared 1 day ahead.", "Cover and refrigerate.", "Bring to simmer before continuing.)", "Add spinach and parsley to soup and stir until wilted. Season soup to taste with salt and pepper.", "Ladle into bowls and serve.", "Makes 6 servings."]

title: Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: ["1 lb. mushrooms", "2 Tbsp. oil", "1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen, chopped spinach", "2 cloves garlic, minced", "2 egg whites, slightly beaten", "freshly ground black pepper", "1/2 c. Italian seasoned bread crumbs"]
instructions: ["Wipe mushrooms and remove caps.", "Saute whole caps in oil. Chop mushroom stems. Cook spinach according to package directions along with chopped mushrooms. Drain and squeeze to eliminate excess water. Combine with egg whites and bread crumbs. Fill mushroom caps with spinach mixture.", "Place caps in an oiled ovenproof dish and bake at 350\u00b0 for 10 to 15 minutes.", "Use as garnish around roast meat or chicken. Also may be served as an appetizer."]

title: Stuffed Mushrooms
ingredients: ["1/4 Parmesan cheese, grated", "1 lb. whole mushrooms, remove stems, chop fine and set aside", "2 green onions, chopped fine", "1 garlic clove, chopped fine", "1/4 c. Italian breadcrumbs", "1 Tbsp. fresh parsley, chopped fine", "1 Tbsp. olive oil", "1 Tbsp. white wine"]
instructions: ["Place olive oil in hot skillet, saute onions and garlic.", "Add chopped mushroom stems and saute.", "Add breadcrumbs, parsley and wine.", "Lay mushroom caps stem end up in ungreased baking sheet. Heap teaspoon of filling in each mushroom.", "Top with cheese.", "Bake at 375\u00b0 for 8 minutes."]

title: Noble'S Sicilian Mushroom Sauce
ingredients: ["3 medium onions, finely chopped", "1 Tbsp. olive oil", "1 1/2 tsp. butter", "1 (6 oz.) can tomato paste", "1 to 2 c. dry red Italian wine", "1 (28oz.) can plum tomatoes with juice", "1 (28 oz.) can pureed tomato", "1 lb. mushrooms, cleaned and sliced", "ground pepper", "salt and pepper to taste", "1 green pepper, chopped", "1 tsp. thyme", "1 Tbsp. dried oregano", "1 tsp. crushed hot pepper flakes"]
instructions: ["Saute onions in oil and melted butter 5 to 8 minutes until soft.", "Add tomato paste.", "Stir until blended.", "Add 1 cup wine and stir.", "Pour in the 2 cans tomatoes with juices.", "Stir in mushrooms and pepper.", "Bring to a boil and reduce heat to low.", "Add herbs and red pepper.", "Simmer until sauce thickens to preferred consistency, adding more wine if you like.", "Season with salt and sugar.", "Serve hot over chicken or pasta.", "Makes about 2 1/2 quarts, about 165 calories per cup."]

title: Cottage Cheese Dip
ingredients: ["1 (24 oz.) carton cottage cheese", "1 envelope Herb-Ox dry broth mix", "1/3 c. milk"]
instructions: ["Blend all ingredients.", "Chill and serve with chips or fresh vegetables."]

title: Seashells And Mushrooms And Basil Cream Sauce
ingredients: ["8 oz. macaroni shells", "4 c. sliced mushrooms", "2 tsp. dried basil", "1/4 tsp. garlic powder", "1/8 tsp. pepper", "1 Tbsp. all-purpose flour", "1 c. evaporated skim milk", "3/4 oz. Parmesan cheese (3 Tbsp.)"]
instructions: ["Cook macaroni according to package directions.", "Drain.", "While pasta is cooking, heat a nonstick skillet over high heat.", "Add mushrooms.", "Sprinkle with basil, garlic powder and pepper.", "Cook 5 minutes or until mushrooms are tender, stirring frequently."]

title: Mushroom Sauerkraut Soup
ingredients: ["1 c. dried mushrooms", "1 c. sauerkraut juice", "1 small onion, chopped", "1 Tbsp. flour", "2 Tbsp. oil", "1 qt. water", "1 potato, diced", "salt and pepper"]
instructions: ["Soak dried mushrooms in cold water for 2 hours.", "Drain and cut into small pieces.", "Add with the water, sauerkraut juice and onion; cook slowly for 1 1/2 hours.", "Add potatoes, brown flour in oil.", "Stir constantly or the flour will scorch.", "Add about a cup of the soup to the flour mixture and stir constantly to make zaprashka, add to the soup.", "Cook slowly for another 2 to 4 minutes."]

title: Indian Succotash
ingredients: ["1 (1 lb.) can green limas, drained", "1 (12 oz.) can whole kernel corn, drained", "2 Tbsp. butter", "1/2 c. light cream"]
instructions: ["Combine ingredients, season and heat.", "Makes 6 servings."]

title: Manhattan Clam Chowder
ingredients: ["2 medium onions", "1 c. celery", "6 Tbsp. flour", "5 c. water", "2 large tomatoes", "pinch of: black pepper, cayenne, marjoram, thyme and salt", "2 large green peppers", "8 Tbsp. butter", "2 small cans minced clams", "3 c. diced potatoes", "6 Tbsp. catsup"]
instructions: ["Dice vegetables and saute in butter; add flour and stir thoroughly. Add clams. Gradually add water and let mixture come to a boil. Add potatoes and simmer for 15 minutes. Add tomatoes, catsup, spices and let simmer for additional 30 minutes or until done."]

title: Indian Corn Stew
ingredients: ["2 medium onions, chopped", "1/2 green pepper, chopped", "2 cans whole kernel corn", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "1 lb. ground beef", "2 Tbsp. butter", "1 can tomatoes", "1 tsp. salt", "2 Tbsp. flour", "2 Tbsp. cold water"]
instructions: ["Saute onions and pepper with butter for 5 minutes.", "Add ground beef and brown.", "Add corn, sugar, salt and tomatoes; simmer for 30 minutes.", "Stir in blended flour and water; cook for 15 minutes. Serve with salad, corn muffins and mixed fruit."]

title: Cream Cheese And Chutney
ingredients: ["8 oz. cream cheese", "1/4 c. Major Grey's chutney", "1 or 2 tsp. curry powder (to taste)"]
instructions: ["Blend together and serve with sesame crackers."]

title: Blueberry Cottage Cheese Muffins
ingredients: ["1/4 c. low-fat cottage cheese", "1 egg", "3/4 c. all-purpose flour", "1 1/4 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 Tbsp. sugar or sugar substitute", "1/3 c. skim milk", "3/4 to 1 c. blueberries"]
instructions: ["Fold cottage cheese and egg together.", "Add the flour, salt, baking powder and sugar.", "Stir to combine.", "Add milk and stir lightly, then gently stir in the blueberries.", "Spoon into muffin pan.", "Bake in preheated 425\u00b0 oven for 15 to 18 minutes."]

title: Sweet And Spicy Curry Dip
ingredients: ["1/4 c. fruit chutney", "1 Tbsp. curry powder", "1 c. yogurt cheese", "1/8 tsp. hot pepper sauce"]
instructions: ["In a 1-quart saucepan, heat the chutney and curry powder for 1 minute, stirring frequently.", "Cool slightly.", "In a small bowl, combine curry mixture and pepper sauce.", "Makes about 1 cup."]

title: Chutney Glaze
ingredients: ["2 Indian mangoes, peeled and chopped", "1 c. honey", "1/2 to 1 c. pineapple juice", "1 tsp. ground cloves", "1 tsp. nutmeg", "1/4 c. chopped red pepper", "1 mango, pureed", "1 c. brown sugar", "raisins", "1/2 tsp. cinnamon", "1/2 tsp. white pepper"]
instructions: ["Combine all ingredients.", "Baste on ham last 45 minutes of baking, basting frequently."]
